","Our campaign has ended - we have ordered product and it is on the way! Go to www.bluvos.com to learn more or to get Bluvos and start supercharging your life!
Bluvos is a natural alternative to energy drinks that also provides a boost in mental performance!
Bluvos is a naturally derived energy supplement in pill form designed to temporarily Enhance Cognitive Performance, Sharpen Mental Focus and Boost Energy.
We have changed our packaging to a 30 count bottle instead of the 10 count blister pack. Which means more bang for your buck!
For anyone who orders:
2 Pack (20 capsules) - You will receive - 1 bottle (30 capsules)
4 Pack (40 capsules) - You will receive - 2 bottles (60 capsules)
8 Pack (80 capsules) - You will receive - 4 bottles (120 capsules)
You'll never see Bluvos at these highly discounted prices again! You only have a few more days to purchase!
Here is a rendering of what the bottles will look like!

We created Bluvos with gamers in mind. As players ourselves, we understand the significant amount of focus and energy required to perform at a top level during intense gaming sessions. We hand-picked ingredients with specific qualities to create a potent, healthy and effective energy formula.

The idea for Bluvos began with our interest in supplements that enhance energy as well as mental focus and ability. We were curious whether the concepts in movies such as Limitless and Lucy, where individuals activate greater cognitive abilities through supplements, had any practical value? It is through such curiosity that our research brought us to learn about Nootropics, naturally occurring substances that have been shown to enhance cognitive function.

After years of relying on countless energy drinks to keep us alert during our gaming sessions and everyday life, we realized there had to be a better alternative. We realized there were no mainstream energy products that also contained nootropics as an all-in-one energy/cognitive improving solution. Thus, Bluvos was born. We have worked with professionals in the industry to create carefully designed, safe and effective formula to boost energy and focus. Furthermore, we chose to utilize capsules instead of beverages in an effort to eliminate unnecessary sugars, preservatives and flavours that are often found in energy drinks. We use veggie capsules (cellulose) because they are a healthy alternative to the standard gelatin pill capsules.
Bluvos improves upon typical energy products in several ways:
1) By designing Bluvos in pill form, we eliminate the harmful sugars, flavorings and preservatives found in most energy products, while still keeping the full focus and energizing effect!
2) The herb Rhodiola actually helps to relieve mental fatigue, keeping you clear and refreshed.
3) Now that you're feeling energized and refreshed, the Nootropics kick in to enhance cognitive function, providing a mental boost in ADDITION to energy. This is why we call it ""Smart Energy"".
Merriam Webster defines Nootropics as:
a substance that enhances cognition and memory and facilitates learning.""

In order to be classified as a true Nootropic, a substance must be approved as safe for human consumption. No, you did not read that wrong. Nootropics are classified as a harmless substance that can actually improve brain function! We added Nootropics so that Bluvos can help your brain kick into overdrive - so you can call that early GG with confidence.

The main difference between Bluvos and the majority of Nootropic products on the market is that all of our ingredients can be found in nature. Many of the other Nootropic ""stacks"" contain certain man-made ingredients. In addition, our claims have been reviewed by a governmental agency (Health Canada). Very few supplements have ever been reviewed which makes Bluvos a rare product in the energy supplements market.

Bluvos compliments any gamer’s arsenal by keeping them attentive and alert, as well as providing a mental edge. A slight boost in performance can help you carry games further and could be the difference between victory and defeat. Removing your focus for even a split second at the wrong time could cost you a valuable game or get you killed! The carefully selected ingredients in Bluvos work to ensure that your attention never leaves the screen, and keeps you in the zone for extended sessions.
We designed Bluvos with gamers in mind.. However, anyone who requires focus and energy can benefit from Bluvos! We have had so much positive feedback from people in all walks of life
column2: from athletes, to students, to entrepreneurs
column3: from truck drivers, cyclists, nurses, blue collar workers, and the list goes on! Bluvos truly is the healthy future of personal energy!

column1: We worked with professionals in the industry to create the perfect formula for what we wanted from Bluvos. After dozens of revisions, we finally settled on this balanced blend of energy, herbs, nootropics and vitamins:
Gaming is a professional sport now - it should have its own supplements! Look at bodybuilding 20 years ago, there was nothing. Now it is a multi-billion dollar industry.
We really want to grow WITH the gaming community – that is why we plan to sponsor eSports teams, tournaments and twitch/ YouTube streamers.

We feel that eSports are experiencing a massive growth phase. Where 10 years ago gaming was somewhat frowned upon, now it's becoming a way of life, a source of income and a way to connect with friends (old and new) and we are really excited to help fuel the revolution!

A: We wanted a product that we could use safely every day, that was healthy and would boost energy/ focus. We personally didn’t drink energy drinks because they made us feel sick, and there was nothing on the market that provided clean energy with a cognitive boost.
Q: What are Nootropics and why are they in Bluvos?
A: Nootropics are a class of substance that boost cognitive function. We added Nootropics to Bluvos so that it would provide a Cognitive Boost as well as Energy!

Hello folks,

I am Gerard, registered Haitian Emergency Medical Technician Instructor and CEO of the Haitian Emergency Group a grass-root EMS based organization.

Long story short, we have the blessing of Jetblue that donated 1 Airline ticket (city to city).
This campaign is to help us moving forward with our current project which is to create an effective, reliable and 24/7 Emergency Call Center for Haiti.

Seriously, everybody knows that 5K is not only what it takes to create such thing, but it's the minimum for us to invest for a modest start. Getting to the final destination will have a serious impact in many ways, such as
column2:
1. creating new jobs
2. improving our emergency response delay
3. reliable and effective communication between different agencies
Etc..

What We Need &
column3:
What You GetThis is an ambitious project if we dare compare it to the US 911 Call Center and for that it will require thousands of dollars. Here is a short list of what we need in the next 3 months and about how much they cost:

1. Rent or Secure a facility to launch the office
Rental Cost: $2.000.00 US/Month
Purchase cost: $60K - $70K

2. Office Supplies: $15K - $20K
3. I.T Supplies (Computer, IP Telephone, Internet devices, headset Mic, Etc.): $45K
4. Diesel Generator:  $5K
5. Other formalities and Taxes: $2K

The only perks we can offer for now is the  Jetblue Airline Ticket (any city to city) free of charge.

If we go above the goal, it's fantastic, if it's just it, we'll work with it, if it's under it, we'll use the funds to buy some equipments in the States and have them shipped here in Haiti before March 15th 2015 and of course, pay the rent which is a must.

column1: The Impact
We invite all of you, who's currently reading this, to visit our facebook page, just type: Haitian Emergency Group or the creole translation: Gwoup Ayisyen pou Ijans.
On the page you will be able to see all what we have done so far as training and realisation.

Since 2010 to date, we can proudly count 551 graduated EMTs and First Responders, training has been done by some Haitian and US EMTs, paramedics, Nurses and Veterans from different 501c3 organizations such as: Empact Northwest, Team Rubicon, Banshee Association, LAHAF and supported by: JP/HRO, Project Medishare/Hospital bernard Mevs, Hopital Adventiste de Diquini, Hopital des Enfants, Jetblue Airlines, some individuals, Etc.
Creating this call center will automatically create:
1. more than 50 jobs for EMTs and First responders
2. more than 20 jobs for community leaders.
3. improve the delay of our responsiveness to emergencies
4. give people access to receive first care at their home whenever it's needed.
Risks &
column2:
ChallengesCan't say this is a risk free process, as most of everything here you want to do, you need a specific contact, and the entire system has this lake of communication, you are just not sure about where to go, with what, when to do it, when you need information.
The sadden part of it is that most of the time the entity that is here to help you with the process is the one who's slowing it down by trying to sniff  extra money from you for things that you already paid for.

That's why we have created a solid relationship with some community leaders who will be used as facilitators to help us get through  some steps easier.

column1:
Other Ways You Can Help

There's so many ways that you can help out, of course the funds will having things done here in Haiti, but remember that we are an  Emergency Medical Group, so any medical supplies is welcome and medical personal volunteer as well.

If you want to donate any medical supplies, such as a Trauma/ Medical Kit, First responders supplies, from a pair of gloves to a long-board, everything is welcome. And you don't have to ship all the way to Haiti, just send your letter of recommendations, advices, guidances, references, medical or I.T supplies or whatever else you think will be helpful and useful to:

Gerard Junior Prevot
6736 Arabian Terrace
Atlanta. Georgia 30038

As everybody knows, we can't make it alone no matter how big is our faith, that is why we are confident that you will help us spreading the word very loud. Use this to see how much you friends and relatives trust you, share it to show them how much you are involve in a social teamwork for Haiti.

P.S: Do not forget that you can use the Indiegogo share tools!
And remember, sharing the campaign is another way to help!

If we go above the goal, it's fantastic, if it's just it, we'll work with it, if it's under it, we'll use the funds to buy some equipments in the States and have them shipped here in Haiti before March 15th 2015 and of course, pay the rent which is a must.

column1: The Impact
We invite all of you, who's currently reading this, to visit our facebook page, just type: Haitian Emergency Group or the creole translation: Gwoup Ayisyen pou Ijans.
On the page you will be able to see all what we have done so far as training and realisation.

Since 2010 to date, we can proudly count 551 graduated EMTs and First Responders, training has been done by some Haitian and US EMTs, paramedics, Nurses and Veterans from different 501c3 organizations such as: Empact Northwest, Team Rubicon, Banshee Association, LAHAF and supported by: JP/HRO, Project Medishare/Hospital bernard Mevs, Hopital Adventiste de Diquini, Hopital des Enfants, Jetblue Airlines, some individuals, Etc.
Creating this call center will automatically create:
1. more than 50 jobs for EMTs and First responders
2. more than 20 jobs for community leaders.
3. improve the delay of our responsiveness to emergencies
4. give people access to receive first care at their home whenever it's needed.

Risks & ChallengesCan't say this is a risk free process, as most of everything here you want to do, you need a specific contact, and the entire system has this lake of communication, you are just not sure about where to go, with what, when to do it, when you need information.The sadden part of it is that most of the time the entity that is here to help you with the process is the one who's slowing it down by trying to sniff  extra money from you for things that you already paid for.That's why we have created a solid relationship with some community leaders who will be used as facilitators to help us get through  some steps easier.

Other Ways You Can Help There's so many ways that you can help out, of course the funds will having things done here in Haiti, but remember that we are an  Emergency Medical Group, so any medical supplies is welcome and medical personal volunteer as well.

If you want to donate any medical supplies, such as a Trauma/ Medical Kit, First responders supplies, from a pair of gloves to a long-board, everything is welcome. And you don't have to ship all the way to Haiti, just send your letter of recommendations, advices, guidances, references, medical or I.T supplies or whatever else you think will be helpful and useful to:
Gerard Junior Prevot6736 Arabian TerraceAtlanta. Georgia 30038

As everybody knows, we can't make it alone no matter how big is our faith, that is why we are confident that you will help us spreading the word very loud. Use this to see how much you friends and relatives trust you, share it to show them how much you are involve in a social teamwork for Haiti.
P.S: Do not forget that you can use the Indiegogo share tools!And remember, sharing the campaign is another way to help!",0.0,0,"2 Campaigns
|","Port-au-Prince, Haiti",https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/haitian-medical-emergency-call-center-911/pica

<span style=""color: rgb(0, 0, 0)
column6: >We are facing a major

column1: Our waterways are suffering from frequent and growing toxic algae blooms caused by phosphorus pollution.  These blooms create significant dead zones, kill our fish and seafood supplies, and contaminate our water supplies.
How big is the problem?

All 50 States and more than 80% of our waterways, especially the Great Lakes, Mississippi River Basin, the Everglades, and the Chesapeake Bay watersheds  are suffering this problem and it's getting worse.
The City of Toledo Ohio was forced to
shut down it municipal water system for several days last summer because of
toxic algae blooms.  Some 500,000 people were without usable drinking
water.  The situation created panic and instances of civil unrest.
These blooms were caused by phosphorus run-off into the lake.
If
the problem is not corrected quickly, we will continue to lose our drinking
water supplies, our fish and seafood, and experience significantly higher food
prices.
Why is phosphorus a big deal?
Phosphorus
is critical for every biological and manufacturing process on earth.  Without it, nothing will live.  Phosphors is
essential in everything we use and consume.  Without it, we would not exist.
Massive Algal Bloom in the St. Johns River, Florida. Photo by Bill Yates.
Who's at fault?
We all are.
Excess phosphorus comes from everywhere, industry, power
plants, municipal waste treatment, storm water run-off, real estate
development, and agriculture, just to
name a few.
The government has stepped in and dictated mandates,
rules, and regulations requiring clean-up without providing guidance or common
sense solutions. Government has placed the burden on us through taxes and user
fees to resolve the situation without providing solutions.
The government has gone further by dictating draconian
rules and regulations to farmers without providing any support for our farming
community.  Our famers have been left to deal
with their portion of the problem on their own.
Our farmers are in a “no win” situation.  They are doing more than anyone
to resolve their part of the problem.  Unfortunately agriculture and our farmers
are being blamed for the entire problem.
<b>This is completely false and
totally untrue.
<b>Our farmers are our strongest environmental
stewards.
No one works harder to maintain a
healthy environment than our farmers.
Without a healthy environment, they can’t produce the quantities and
quality of food we expect.  Without a
healthy environment, farmers don’t have jobs.  Without a healthy environment,
farmers will lose the way of life that they love.
What most people don’t realize is that animal
manure is nature’s highly effective fertilizer.  Animal manure contains the essential
nutrients necessary to grow the food we need.
It is also the most inexpensive fertilizer that farmers can use.  Unfortunately many farms have too much phosphorus and are now, or soon will be
prevented from using their animal manure as a fertilizer and will have to find
some way to dispose of it.  The majority of our farmers has no other outlet.
We are all Environmental Advocates
We are all environmentalists,
advocates and stewards of the environment.
We all want clean water but also the products and food that phosphorus
produces.  In advocating for our
environment, we do so without the benefit of knowing how to remove and recover
the phosphorus that enters our waterways.  So we have to find ways to provide the
food and products we want and need while removing and recovering phosphorus and
eliminating it from running into our waterways.
<h3><b style=""color: rgb(106, 106, 106)
<h2><b style=""color: rgb(106, 106, 106)
do about the situation?
What is needed is a common sense technology that will remove
and recover phosphorus at the source so that it never makes it into our
waterways.
The Solution
I'm Chris Haug, CEO of Triea Technologies - and I'm on a
personal and professional mission to help solve the phosphorus pollution
problem in the agriculture industry, to support our farmers, help them prosper,
continue to expand food production, and protect their way of life.
The good news is that
this problem can be solved quickly using technology. Triea Technologies has a
process called Agra-NRS™, the Phosphorus Pollution Solution.
Our process
<b>removes and recovers 90+% of the phosphorus from all forms of animal manure,
creates three highly valuable products for the farmer, and produces near
zero waste.
Agra-NRS™ provides an immediate
solution to the agriculture contribution to the phosphorus pollution problem.
Our process doesn’t solve all of the
phosphorus issues.  It is specifically
focused on the agriculture industry.  It
is a highly powerful tool that will help farmers continue to be the top
stewards of our environment and make it easier for them to continue to do what
they do best.
When our Agra-NRS™ process is coupled
with existing nutrient management tools, we will start to correct the phosphorus
pollution problem immediately and in years instead of decades.
Agra-NRS™ is a win for everyone.  Everyone wins because
we get all of the benefits that reduced phosphorus pollution provides while
continuing to receive the food at prices we expect.
EVERY POUND OF PHOSPHORUS WE REMOVE AND
RECOVER IS A POUND THAT WILL NEVER ENTER OUR WATERWAYS.
How much manure are we talking about?
The U.S. agriculture industry
produces about 9 billion animals (poultry, swine, cattle, and lamb), producing
approximately 1.6 billion tons of manure annually. This manure contains
approximately 112 billion pounds (56 million tons) of phosphorus EVERY YEAR.
approximately 1,275 tons of manure per year that contains about 89,250 pounds
(approximately 45 tons) of phosphorus. The
Agra-NRS™ will remove and recover 90+% of this phosphorus - meaning we will
recover 80,000 pounds (40 tons) of phosphorus each year.
<ul>
<div>
What products are produced by Agra-NRS?
valuable products.
Calcium phosphate.  Calcium phosphate is one of the most widely used chemicals
in all forms of manufacturing in the U.S.  Everything from fertilizer, to
fillers, food additives, medical and dental products, and general manufacturing
needs it.  There is a large and growing market for this product.
Low or no phosphorus manure solids.  Because the Agra-NRS™ process removes and recovers
90+% of the phosphorus in animal manure, the remaining solids can be land
applied and used as a fertilizer without the worry of compliance with
regulations.  The solids can also be composted and used or sold as a high
quality mulch and soil amendment.
Low or no phosphorus enriched liquid
fertilizer.  The wash water used in the
process is recycled many times.  In the recycling, the nitrogen and
potassium removed with the phosphorus becomes concentrated.  When we are done with the wash water, the
farmer can use it as an enriched nitrogen/potassium fertilizer which will
replace a significant amount of fertilizer the farmer has to purchase to
provide these nutrients.  The farmer can
also choose to sell this liquid to others and generate additional income.
How will our system be used?
There are four ways that the
Agra-NRS™ will be put into the field:
First is to put our system on farms
where there is enough volume of manure to justify it.
Second,
build mobile platforms that will go farm to farm for those farms that don’t
have sufficient manure volume to justify an on-farm system.
Three, where possible, build area-wide
or regional systems where the manure comes to us for processing.
Finally, connect the Agra-NRS™
process to manure-to-energy processes and extract the phosphorus prior to
generating energy.
Is the Agra-NRS™ process ready to go?

Yes, we are ready to move into the real world.  The process has been proven and we have conducted as much laboratory commercialization work as we can.  We now need large, farm scale systems to identify and solve problems that simply can’t be done in the lab.
Recyclable Resource
The big benefit and beauty of
Triea's Agra-NRS™ process is that it recovers phosphorus in a form the makes it
a highly recyclable resource.  The U.S. consumes approximately 45 million
tons of raw phosphorus rock each year.  2 million tons come from mining in
the U.S.  The balance comes from
imports.  Right now, none of this phosphorus is recovered and
recycled.  When the Agra-NRS™ process is fully implemented, we will
recover about 67% of the phosphorus we consume.  This means that our recovered phosphorus would
replace a significant amount of mined phosphorus.
Why Indiegogo?
Several reasons.  First, we are under so much pressure to get
our Agra-NRS™ process into the field that we simply aren't willing and can't
wait for traditional capital sources.  Banks and traditional investors are
highly conservative and take an incredible amount of time to make a decision.  We have too much important work to do to help
our farmers and the environment to wait for traditional capital sources to come
through.
We believe that crowdfunding through
Indiegogo is the quickest and most efficient way of raising the funds we need
to get our systems operational and do so as quickly as possible.
In addition, we are not just looking
to raise money, we are looking to build and grow a true grass roots movement
that recognizes the problem and wants to be part of the solution.
How much money are looking to raise?
Our minimum goal is $500,000.  However, we want to raise as much as
possible.  $500,000 will help us design,
construct, and operate two full-scale on-farm systems.  With two systems, we will be able to remove
and recover about 175,000 pounds of phosphorus (88 tons) per year.  This
is a great start.  We would love to raise
as much as $1,500,000.  This gives us the
ability to put as many as 6 systems on farm and recover about 550,000 pounds of
phosphorus (275 tons) per year.
In addition, crowdfunding is our way
to do well for the environment and build a grass roots movement to solve a
major environmental problem.
YOU
RECEIVED A GRANT, WHY DO YOU NEED MORE MONEY?
The grant, $250,000, was from the Maryland Department of Natural Services and
was for the sole purpose of funding our laboratory research and development of
the process.  This includes verifying the
basic chemistry and physics and begin to develop a commercial system in a
laboratory environment so we can identify and resolve as many problems as
possible before we move into the field.
The grant does not include money for in-field R &amp
system.
We need the money to move from the laboratory to on-farm systems in order to
begin to verify our laboratory results, work out normal glitches  and issues that can only be done in the field,
and begin recovering phosphorus in the process.
Recognitions
As a show of confidence in our technology - we have been blessed with the following awards and recognition.
<h1>Successes &amp
About two years ago, we realized the extent of the
phosphorus pollution problem.  I saw the
parallels between my education and prior work in environmental pollution
control and began researching potential technologies that could offer tangible
solutions.  Based on my work, and
educational experience (BS in Environmental Science / minor Environmental
Chemistry) at Purdue University, I realized that I had worked with similar
technologies while working in the pollution control industry with Nalco
Chemical Company.
I assembled a group of scientists, engineers, and business
development professionals to research and analyze the options.  We found what we consider to be the best
technology for the agriculture industry - which is now the Agra-NRS™
system.  To move development forward as
quickly as possible, we applied and were awarded, a $250,000 grant from the
Maryland Department of Natural Resources to take the base technology and do the R&amp
column2: D necessary to get to commercialization.  We partnered with Dr. Lee Blaney, professor

column1: in the School of Chemical, Biochemical, and Environmental Engineering at the
University of Maryland - Baltimore County to conduct the research.  We found
that the lab results produced better results than we had anticipated.  With that, we began commercialization work which
brings us to today.  The next step is to put systems on farms and begin
processing manure.
To do so, we have conducted an extensive marketing and
public relations campaign to inform and educate the industry and industry
stakeholders.  As a result, the following is a partial list of those that have
expressed interest in or are direct supporters of Triea and the Agra-NRS
process.
<ul>
• Chesapeake Bay Foundation
• Sustainable Chesapeake
• Maryland Dept. of Natural Resources
• Maryland Dept. of Agriculture
• University of Maryland Agriculture Service
• University of Delaware Agriculture Service
• Maryland Dept. of the Environment
• Maryland Clean Energy Center
• Environmental Protection Agency
• USDA
• North American Manure Managers Association
• U.S. Poultry
• Perdue Farms
• Maryland House and Senate Legislature Environmental Matters Committee's
• Maryland and Delaware Secretaries of Agriculture
• Richardson Farms
• Ellis Farms
<li>E &amp
• Star Rock Farms
• Walk Stock Farms
• Cottage Hill Farms
• Miller Farms
• Thompson Farms
• Murphy Brown
• Mountaire
• Pilgrims Pride
• Delmarva Poultry Association
• National Fish and Wildlife Association
In two short years, we have gone from concept, to lab scale pilot testing, to building support for our technology.  Now we are ready to take that giant leap into full scale, on-farm operation.
Your Impact
<div>
<div>
OK, “so what impact will my contribution make?”
The short answer is - your contribution will help the Agra-NRS™ become the ""Phosphorus
Pollution Solution""
our farmers continue providing affordable food, and most importantly, give our
future generations a cleaner, healthier environment.
<b style=""color: rgb(0, 0, 0)
column6: >With your help, we will achieve our goal.

column1: Other Ways You Can Help
<div style=""font-weight: bold
<span style=""background-color: initial
column2:
>Won't you be part of our grassroots movement to clean up our waterways?  Grass roots movements take a lot of effort to build.  Therefore, your help is critical to continue the movement.

Your contribution is important.  Your social media outreach is equally critical and we would love your help in spreading the word.
column3: >We ask that, in addition to contributing, you like us on social media, reach out to your friends and social media contacts and ask them to visit our campaign
column4:
>, contribute, and like us, tweet about us, talk about us, anything that gets our message to the masses. 

Our success, in part, will be based on how much we can raise and get social media exposure.  Would you spend 10 minutes to help play an important role in helping us achieve the success that the environment and the American Farmer need so desperately? We thank you in advance for your support.

column1: <div>
PERKS

Below are Perks you will receive, based on monetary donation amounts.  These accumulate with each succeeding level of donation.  We appreciate your support of this worthwhile effort to protect the environment and preserve our farmers' way of life!
Use of Funds
Our overriding goal is to keep the cost as low as possible to make each system as affordable as possible for the farmer.  Here is the current estimate of our budget.
<b style=""letter-spacing: 0px
column5: >Join our movement.  Be the solution.
column9: >  Together we can clean up our waterways, help our farmers and feed a hungry planet.  Become a supporter.  Tell your friends and family, share your Facebook and LinkedIn pages, Tweet about us.  Do everything you can to help get the word out.

column1: <div>
FAQ’s
What makes you qualified to take on this project?
I grew up in rural Indiana, in the middle of the farming
community and thousands of acres of nature around me.  I have always loved and have a real passion
for the outdoors and the environment.  I
took that love and passion to Purdue University and received a BS in
Environmental Science in 1978 (minor in Environmental Chemistry).  While at Purdue, I worked extensively with
the fundamental chemical principals that have formed the basis of our process.

column4: >Upon graduation, I went to work for Nalco Chemical Company, which is a world leader in the water and waste water treatment industry.  While with Nalco, I worked extensively with

column1: water and waste water treatment plants in their efforts to remove phosphorus in
the liquid phase of waste water.  Part of
my work involved using the fundamental principles contained in our

column5: >At the time that I worked in the environmental pollution

column1: control industry, all of the work was on removing phosphorus from municipal
water and waste water.  It has only been
in the last decade that the focus has moved from the municipal industry
to the agriculture industry.
With our Agra-NRS™ process, I saw the
opportunity to bring a groundbreaking technology to market.  I then assembled a diverse and highly qualified team to help get the technology commercialized - coming full circle.
Please join me on his journey.
your data?

column5: >Our data and information come first, from our research, and second, from a wide variety of

column1: agriculture, phosphorus, mining, farming, environmental, and governmental
sources.  We have attempted to cross
reference and corroborate all of our data.
Here is a link to Agra-NRS™  literature for additional data.
<span style=""color: rgb(0, 0, 0)
updates?
Our plan is to post regular updates on our progress on our
website, http://www.agranrs.com.
out personal electronic messages on a quarterly basis to each of our
contributors that will provide complete updates on our progress.  Once we have the system installed on site, we
will make a video of the start-up and post it to our website for all to see.
<h3>Additional Contact
Information
You can always contact me personally at chris@agranrs.com.  Depending on the volume of messages, I will
do my best to respond within 48 hours of receipt.  You can also call me at 866-620-9245.
If you choose to contribute by check, you can send your contribution to:
Triea Technologies,
LLC,   <span style=""letter-spacing: 0px

basic chemistry and physics and begin to develop a commercial system in a
laboratory environment so we can identify and resolve as many problems as
possible before we move into the field.
The grant does not include money for in-field R & D or an on-farm
system.
We need the money to move from the laboratory to on-farm systems in order to
begin to verify our laboratory results, work out normal glitches  and issues that can only be done in the field,
and begin recovering phosphorus in the process.
Recognitions
As a show of confidence in our technology - we have been blessed with the following awards and recognition.
Successes & Support
About two years ago, we realized the extent of the
phosphorus pollution problem.  I saw the
parallels between my education and prior work in environmental pollution
control and began researching potential technologies that could offer tangible
solutions.  Based on my work, and
educational experience (BS in Environmental Science / minor Environmental
Chemistry) at Purdue University, I realized that I had worked with similar
technologies while working in the pollution control industry with Nalco
Chemical Company.
I assembled a group of scientists, engineers, and business
development professionals to research and analyze the options.  We found what we consider to be the best
technology for the agriculture industry - which is now the Agra-NRS™
system.  To move development forward as
quickly as possible, we applied and were awarded, a $250,000 grant from the
Maryland Department of Natural Resources to take the base technology and do the R&D necessary to get to commercialization.  We partnered with Dr. Lee Blaney, professor
in the School of Chemical, Biochemical, and Environmental Engineering at the
University of Maryland - Baltimore County to conduct the research.  We found
that the lab results produced better results than we had anticipated.  With that, we began commercialization work which
brings us to today.  The next step is to put systems on farms and begin
processing manure.
To do so, we have conducted an extensive marketing and
public relations campaign to inform and educate the industry and industry
stakeholders.  As a result, the following is a partial list of those that have
expressed interest in or are direct supporters of Triea and the Agra-NRS
process.
Chesapeake Bay Foundation
Sustainable Chesapeake
Maryland Dept. of Natural Resources
Maryland Dept. of Agriculture
University of Maryland Agriculture Service
University of Delaware Agriculture Service
Maryland Dept. of the Environment
Maryland Clean Energy Center
Environmental Protection Agency
USDA
North American Manure Managers Association
U.S. Poultry
Perdue Farms
Maryland House and Senate Legislature Environmental Matters Committee's
Maryland and Delaware Secretaries of Agriculture
Richardson Farms
Ellis Farms
E & J Farms
Star Rock Farms
Walk Stock Farms
Cottage Hill Farms
Miller Farms
Thompson Farms
Murphy Brown
Mountaire
Pilgrims Pride
Delmarva Poultry Association
National Fish and Wildlife Association
In two short years, we have gone from concept, to lab scale pilot testing, to building support for our technology.  Now we are ready to take that giant leap into full scale, on-farm operation.
Your Impact
OK, “so what impact will my contribution make?”
The short answer is - your contribution will help the Agra-NRS™ become the ""Phosphorus
Pollution Solution""
our farmers continue providing affordable food, and most importantly, give our
future generations a cleaner, healthier environment.
With your help, we will achieve our goal.
Other Ways You Can Help

Won't you be part of our grassroots movement to clean up our waterways?  Grass roots movements take a lot of effort to build.  Therefore, your help is critical to continue the movement.Your contribution is important.  Your social media outreach is equally critical and we would love your help in spreading the word.  We ask that, in addition to contributing, you like us on social media, reach out to your friends and social media contacts and ask them to visit our campaign, contribute, and like us, tweet about us, talk about us, anything that gets our message to the masses.  Our success, in part, will be based on how much we can raise and get social media exposure.  Would you spend 10 minutes to help play an important role in helping us achieve the success that the environment and the American Farmer need so desperately? We thank you in advance for your support.
PERKS

Below are Perks you will receive, based on monetary donation amounts.  These accumulate with each succeeding level of donation.  We appreciate your support of this worthwhile effort to protect the environment and preserve our farmers' way of life!
Use of Funds
Our overriding goal is to keep the cost as low as possible to make each system as affordable as possible for the farmer.  Here is the current estimate of our budget.

Join our movement.  Be the solution.   Together we can clean up our waterways, help our farmers and feed a hungry planet.  Become a supporter.  Tell your friends and family, share your Facebook and LinkedIn pages, Tweet about us.  Do everything you can to help get the word out.
FAQ’s
What makes you qualified to take on this project?
I grew up in rural Indiana, in the middle of the farming
community and thousands of acres of nature around me.  I have always loved and have a real passion
for the outdoors and the environment.  I
took that love and passion to Purdue University and received a BS in
Environmental Science in 1978 (minor in Environmental Chemistry).  While at Purdue, I worked extensively with
the fundamental chemical principals that have formed the basis of our process.
Upon graduation, I went to work for Nalco Chemical Company, which is a world leader in the water and waste water treatment industry.  While with Nalco, I worked extensively with
water and waste water treatment plants in their efforts to remove phosphorus in
the liquid phase of waste water.  Part of
my work involved using the fundamental principles contained in our process.
At the time that I worked in the environmental pollution
control industry, all of the work was on removing phosphorus from municipal
water and waste water.  It has only been
in the last decade that the focus has moved from the municipal industry
to the agriculture industry.
With our Agra-NRS™ process, I saw the
opportunity to bring a groundbreaking technology to market.  I then assembled a diverse and highly qualified team to help get the technology commercialized - coming full circle.
Please join me on his journey.
What is the source of
your data?
Our data and information come first, from our research, and second, from a wide variety of
agriculture, phosphorus, mining, farming, environmental, and governmental
sources.  We have attempted to cross
reference and corroborate all of our data.
Here is a link to Agra-NRS™  literature for additional data.
How will I get
updates?
Our plan is to post regular updates on our progress on our
website, http://www.agranrs.com.   We also are planning to send
out personal electronic messages on a quarterly basis to each of our
contributors that will provide complete updates on our progress.  Once we have the system installed on site, we
will make a video of the start-up and post it to our website for all to see.
Additional Contact
Information
You can always contact me personally at chris@agranrs.com.  Depending on the volume of messages, I will
do my best to respond within 48 hours of receipt.  You can also call me at 866-620-9245.
If you choose to contribute by check, you can send your contribution to:
Triea Technologies,
LLC,   573 Lancaster
Place, Frederick, Maryland, 21703",15.0,2,"1 Campaign

In July, 2015, in just 4 ½ months, I embark to become the first American woman to solo sail the world non-stop. My campaign is to raise $50,000 to allow me to focus on preparation, update my equipment, and have the technology to stream live from my sailboat. Finally, I will write my story. I will test new safety equipment, do marine surveys, Celestial Navigate only. Follow me...Financially support me. Become a sponsor. Thank you

Short Summary
Everyday People Yoga (EPY) is a donation-based yoga studio in Eugene, Oregon that
is run by its teachers. Our community has grown leaps and bounds over the past few years, but that has presented new challenges, such as coming up
with the necessary funds to improve everyone's experience.
We have put lots of love and effort into building a beautiful
space for students. Still, there is so much more we want to do to better serve the yoga community
in Eugene, and we need your help!
What We Need
All of the money raised for this campaign will be poured
into 4 major improvements that directly benefit students.
Bike Rack Outside EPY
The City of Eugene has kindly approved a bike storage carousel in the street facing EPY
racks, which will remove one car space and create 10 more bike parking spaces.
Student Equipment - $500
With class sizes steadily growing, we don’t have enough props
to help everyone as they practice. Straps, blankets, blocks, bolsters, mats,
and chairs are a few examples.
Outdoor Lighting - $1000

To enhance safety and visibility at night, we need more lighting outside, on the walkways near the entrance. We would like to install energy efficient lights that protect students and teachers. They would also serve to discourage vandalism and bike theft.
Indoor Signs - $200
Since we don’t have a receptionist to guide newcomers
as they enter the building, we would like to create clearer signs that navigate
students through the lobby and hallway, explaining the process of taking a yoga
class.
<b>Fundraising Campaign
We’ve included some buffer room above our studio improvement
costs to make sure we can pay for fundraising fees that go to Indiegogo,
Paypal and credit card processing fees, taxes, and other service providers who are helping us run this campaign.
What You Get
We have a number of rewards you'll receive if you choose to help us with our cause.
$5 - We sincerely thank you for your contribution.
$8 - We'll mail you our bumper sticker: ""Hold your heart above your head.""

$12 - Come on down for a free class of your choice.

$25 - Receive two free classes and a bar of organic hemp seed oil soap from Hemple Soaps.

$50 - Receive two free classes, a bar of organic hemp seed oil soap from Hemple Soaps, and a tasty bar of chocolate! (10 available)

$100 - Receive a one month unlimited membership or two private lessons with EPY teachers of your choice. Also receive a gift bag with organic items from supporting local businesses, including tea, incense, chocolate, and soap! (10 available)

$200 -  Receive a two month unlimited membership or four private lessons with EPY teachers of your choice. In addition, receive a gift basket with organic items from supporting local businesses, including tea, incense, chocolate, and soap!  (10 available)
The Impact
It is well known that practicing yoga has many physical and mental benefits. It’s important
for the health of our community that yoga be readily accessible through a
donation-based studio that is run by its teachers.
All of the funds raised will go toward specific improvements to the facility that
will enhance everyone's experience at
EPY. Each donation pays it forward for future students to experience the benefits of yoga in a safe, supportive environment that truly caters to their needs<span style='color: rgb(106, 106, 106)
<ul>
Other Ways You Can Help
Please share this link: http://igg.me/at/epyogaeugene
with friends and family, both through email, and on social media platforms such as
Facebook, Pinterest, Twitter, Intagram, etc.
If you are in Eugene, check out a class at EPY and then tell

your friends about your experience and how we are raising money to make it even better!

More Information

Class information is found here: http://www.epyogaeugene.com/schedule/ and http://www.epyogaeugene.com/yoga-classes/ 

Teacher bios are here: http://www.epyogaeugene.com/teachers/

Short Summary

We are a team of researchers who have band together to launch our own start up company focusing on improving overall health by targeting the human microbiome. The co-founders include Aly Burtch, with a BSc in Biology from Ryerson University, and Alejandro Saettone, who is currently working on his PhD in Molecular Science at Ryerson. Thanks to the support and mentorship from our supervisors at Ryerson University, as well as access to lab space, we have been able to design, test, and manufacture our kits over the past year and we are almost ready to launch! We are also members of the Science Discovery Zone at Ryerson University, which provides us with the mentorship and expertise to grow and develop our business.

Microbiome research is exploding in popularity and is providing key insights to many unanswered questions about human health and our overall genome!  There is an abundance of evidence that links our communities of gut bacteria with short and long term health conditions, however there is not enough action being taken to ensure our bacteria are healthy and happy! By looking at individual microbial communities, we are able to provide individuals with a complete analysis of their microbiome supplemented with the probiotics they need to restore their microbiomes to a healthy state. 

We are very fortunate to have already received a small grant that has allowed us to have our kits tested and manufactured. We are currently hoping to raise funding to enable us to purchase a large quantity of probiotics to supply to our clients. Once uBioDiscovery increases in popularity and begins to generate revenue, our goal is to design custom probiotics to target specific problem areas (such as weight loss and mood disorders),

Any contributions to this project would be genuinely appreciated, and would go towards helping our scientists create a kit that is designed to improve your health and quality of life. If you are not able to donate, please feel free to send ideas or questions our way! 

 

We are starting to compile our list of pre-sale clients! If you are interested in being one of the first to have your microbiome sequenced, send an email to: contact@ubiodiscovery.com

We will be sure to add you to our pre-sale list and contact you as soon as the kits are launched.

We hope to hear from you soon!

Aly and Alejandro

<h4>Anti-Aging Secrets Exposed: <span style=""font-size: 30px

2. FLORAL OIL CLEANSER [DIY Cube] - $40
BENEFITS:

In chemistry we learn that “like dissolves like.” The oil cleansing method uses oil to dissolve oil that has hardened with impurities stuck in your pores. This floral oil cleanser rids your skin of dirt and bacteria (without harsh chemicals) while nourishing your face with nutrient-rich oils extracted from flowers. It's designed to boost your complexion, smooth wrinkles, and fight acne.
3. EYE ESPRESSO [DIY Cube] - $65 (one for you + a friend)
BENEFITS:

A caffeinated drink for under eye bags and dark circles. This eye serum diminishes the appearance of circles and reduces puffiness by improving your circulation. It's a morning pick-me-up that's packed with antioxidants and soothing natural moisturizers.
Applied topically caffeine works as a vasoconstrictor (narrows the blood cells) and diuretic (helps the body get rid of excess fluid). This serum also helps headaches.

column1: FAQs
<h3><b style=""font-size: 16px
column4: >Q: ARE THE DIY RECIPES EASY TO MAKE?

column1: <div>

A: Yes! We specifically chose recipes that require minimal effort but still deliver spectacular results. No oven or stove is required. In addition to the how-to instructions included in your cube, you may visit our YouTube channel for easyfollow along videos posted on the 10th day of each month.
Q: WHAT KIND OF INGREDIENTS CAN I EXPECT?

A: Only the best kind. We choose our ingredients based on their natural healing and restorative properties. When it comes to body care we believe that less is more. That’s why we choose our ingredients in their most natural state – organic &

A few of our favorites are: Himalayan Sea Salt, Jojoba Oil, Coconut Oil, Rosehip Oil, Marigold, Aloe Vera, Vitamin E, Activated Charcoal, Apple Cider Vinegar, Beeswax, and a long list of aromatherapeutic essential oils like Lavender, Sandalwood, Ylang Ylang, Rosemary, and Bergamot.
Q: ARE YOUR PRODUCTS VEGAN?

A: Some are while others are not. Please read the project details to find out if a DIY product is vegan. The only non-vegan ingredient we use (and love) is honey! Raw honey (honey that hasn’t been pasteurized or heated) is full of antioxidants &
column2: enzymes to slow down aging as well as boost your complexion. It’s also a humectant, which means it attracts and retains moisturizer. Honey’s antibacterial properties prevent and treat acne by eliminating the bacteria that causes it. Also, honey never spoils. SAVE THE BEES!

column1: Q: HOW DO I KNOW THESE PRODUCTS WILL WORK? ARE YOU DOCTORS?

A: Nope. We’re just sisters who come from a long line of homeopathic remedies and natural ways to care for yourself. Our 77 year old grandmothers don’t look a day over 60 and we’ve been calling our dad the Witch Doctor since ’95.

We create all of these recipes in our own kitchen before sharing them with you. They’re based on our own knowledge and research of natural ingredients. There’s no guarantee that anything in life “will work” but we’re confident that your skin will love naturally nutrient-rich products more than it loves the toxic ones you’re putting on your body now.
Q: WHY SHOULD I SIGN UP FOR THE CRAFTY CUBE WHEN I CAN BUY MY OWN INGREDIENTS FROM THE STORE?

A: For the same reasons you go out to eat even though you probably know how to cook. We've done the heavy lifting for you by researching recipes and pre-measuring every ingredient. You don't have to search for information or wonder why your body scrub or face wash contains a certain ingredient. Our how-to recipes are packed with helpful information.

“Would you put Teflon on your face? Did you know some anti-aging creams & face powders use the same chemical that creates a nonstick surface on cookware to create a smooth finish to makeups & lotions? That’s a recipe for concern, because of a potential contaminant of PTFE called perfluorooctonoic acid (PFOA). PFOA is a toxic chemical linked to cancer, endocrine disruption & reproductive harm. PTFE is the same chemical known by the trade name Teflon.”

Of the 137 chemicals found in total, 132 are reported to cause cancer in humans or animals, 110 are considered toxic to the brain and nervous system and 133 cause developmental and reproductive problems in mammals.""

We grew up with holistic and homeopathic skincare remedies. Our parents taught us to feed our skin nature’s nutrients with ingredients we can pronounce in their most natural state – ORGANIC & RAW.

But it wasn’t until a trip to Greece in the summer of 2015 that the idea for The Crafty Cube was born. We exfoliated in natural salt deposits. We walked into local stores, picked up their products, and read how pure and simple their ingredients were…and we thought – EVERYONE’S BODY DESERVES THIS!

“Healthcare” shouldn’t always mean a trip to the doctor. It means caring for your body in a healthy way. By teaching you how to create your own body care products with natural ingredients we're empowering you to take an active role in your health.

Plus, learning is interactive. Not only will you learn why each color-coded ingredient is beneficial for you, but you'll be more aware of nature's healing powers. And we hope that'll make you think twice (okay, maybe three or four times) before you buy products filled with toxic chemicals.
SIMPLE HOW-TO RECIPES + COLOR-CODED INGREDIENTS
1. Two EDIBLE LIP SCRUBS - $15 (for both)
BENEFITS:

These delicious and moisturizing scrubs heal dry, chapped lips by gently removing dead skin. Both scrubs feature raw honey (honey that hasn’t been pasteurized or heated), which is full of antioxidants & enzymes to naturally nourish your lips. Raw honey is also a humectant and that means it attracts and retains moisturizer.
When your lips are smooth your lipstick will last longer and shine brighter. Give your lips a kissable makeover with scrub that tastes good enough to eat...because it is!
1 BROWN SUGAR LIP SCRUB
INGREDIENTS: organic raw honey, brown sugar, coconut oil, vitamin E
SIZE: 1/2 oz
1 PEPPERMINT LIP SCRUB
INGREDIENTS: organic raw honey, sugar, coconut oil, vitamin E, peppermint essential oil
SIZE: 1/2 oz
DETAILS: This is not a DIY project. These scrubs are handmade with love.
2. FLORAL OIL CLEANSER [DIY Cube] - $40
BENEFITS:

In chemistry we learn that “like dissolves like.” The oil cleansing method uses oil to dissolve oil that has hardened with impurities stuck in your pores. This floral oil cleanser rids your skin of dirt and bacteria (without harsh chemicals) while nourishing your face with nutrient-rich oils extracted from flowers. It's designed to boost your complexion, smooth wrinkles, and fight acne.
SIZE: 4 oz
DETAILS: How-to Instructions + color-coded ingredients
3. EYE ESPRESSO [DIY Cube] - $65 (one for you + a friend)
BENEFITS:

A caffeinated drink for under eye bags and dark circles. This eye serum diminishes the appearance of circles and reduces puffiness by improving your circulation. It's a morning pick-me-up that's packed with antioxidants and soothing natural moisturizers.

Applied topically caffeine works as a vasoconstrictor (narrows the blood cells) and diuretic (helps the body get rid of excess fluid). This serum also helps headaches. We'll send one DIY Eye Espresso to you and one to a friend.
*Best GIFT option!
SIZE: 2 oz
BONUS PRODUCT:

Each cube contains a 5 ml Aromatherapy Roll On Blend designed to relieve stress and anxiety. This combination of naturally sedative oils calms your mood by stabilizing your body's central nervous system.
DETAILS: How-to instructions + color-coded ingredients
4. FLORAL OIL CLEANSER + EYE ESPRESSO [DIY Cubes] - $100
BENEFITS:
Get BOTH projects (+ 2 BONUS products) over the course of two months with this deluxe package. This is our BEST DEAL!
BONUS PRODUCTS:
You'll receive a 5 ml Aromatherapy Roll On Blend with your Floral Oil Cleanser and a 4 oz Himalayan Salt Scrub with your Eye Espresso.

The Himalayan salt exfoliator sloughs off dead skin cells to make way for hydrated nourished ones. Why is the salt pink? Because it's loaded with minerals and energy-rich iron. Himalayan salt contains at least 80 minerals (many of which promote healthy skin regrowth). Exfoliating with this scrub is the perfect way to naturally detox your body.
DETAILS: How-to instructions + color-coded ingredients for 1 Eye Espresso and 1 Floral Oil Cleanser

This is equivalent to a 2-month subscription. In the first month's cube you'll get 1 DIY Eye Espresso + 1 Aromatherapy Roll On Blend. In the second month's cube you'll get 1 DIY Floral Oil Cleanser + 1 Himalayan Salt Scrub.
Receive a SELF-LOVE sticker in your 1st cube!

Hello and welcome, I am Joseph Hickey, Vice President of The HempStars and also the manager of this Indiegogo campaign. My co-Founder, Mike Clarke and I started The HempStars about a year ago. We have seen the company through to the production stage. Mike has been in the hemp industry for nearly 20 years and a family history in the farming of hemp since the mid 19th century. He has created the product from recipes to labels. We are currently working as a two man team making each and every product by hand. I, Joseph Hickey, have been in charge of the company’s web presence, marketing, and investor relationships.

In just a year, we have been able to produce well over 20 products with another 100 under development and are able to ship across the United States any product ordered online. We are currently engaging in this fundraising campaign to raise awareness about our line, raise capital for our planned expansion into retail stores and recruit future representatives and employees to meet the needs of that expansion. We have a clear and open shot at bringing our products into some high profile retail locations.

TheHempStars is a small company that has been given a big opportunity. We have been selling over the internet and in small roadshows. Now we have been asked to give a presentation in front of several of the largest warehouses in America as well as a professional sales organization.

With the funds that are raised we will be able to produce and share our product throughout the country! Our quality hand-made organic hemp products are exceedingly nourishing when consumed either orally or transdermally. We call this approach 'Whole~ism' because it is designed to allow your entire body every chance at a better life through nourishing every facet of your being. Lets make the world and our bodies our number one priority with the Hempstars!

$50,000.00 is necessary in order to ramp up our production to have enough product for the stores that we will soon be entering. The capital raised will be spent on ingredients, packaging materials, production equipment and storage, as well as marketing.

PERKS


As part of the funding, we are offering the majority of our products at a discount including Hemp oil, Hemp shampoo, Hemp Salsa and much much more! This way everyone can feel and use the products that we are offering. Each of the products have gone through extensive testing and reworking to make them amazing. Each bottle contains organic hand harvested ingredients that are just right for you!

HISTORY OF HEMP

Hemp has been harvested since ancient times, mostly as a fiber producing plant, to make rope, clothing, sail cloth, food, oil, medicines, paper products as well as many other items. More recently it is being used to produce bio fuel, lubricants, plastics, livestock feed and bedding, construction materials, paint and so much more. Today, hemp is used in the manufacture of all of the above and more in nearly every nation in the world.

THE IMPORTANCE OF HEMP

Organically grown hemp and other foodstuffs is a healthy natural way to help rebuild our environment. The richness and health benefits of our food products are perfect for people hoping to create or maintain healthy diets and lifestyle.  While, our skincare line helps your skin repair itself from the harmful products that we have been using our entire lives. 

Challenges


We need more equipment in order to produce the amount of product for the stores that we will be entering! We also need to expand the Hempstars staff and that includes partners and employment. If you or anyone you know is interested please visit Thehempstars.com!

OTHER WAY YOU CAN HELP

Spread the word too anyone you know that is interested in healthy living to look at our page, as mentioned earlier all of the products that we are offering are at a reduced price and any help is greatly appreciated.

And be sure to follow us on social media! Like, Share, and Subscribe!

I am flipping and re-purposing a 1987 Fleetwood Bounder Motorhome to in order to bring people wellness ""on wheels"" via massage therapy.

The idea is to provide a unique therapeutic experience, where you can slip away from your everyday activities, and fully immerse yourself amongst beauty, comfort, and personalized attention in a Zen environment—an environment that we bring to you.
Many independent massage therapists are mobile and have the ability to travel to clients, events, and businesses
column2: however may lack the physical environment that goes hand in hand with a spa, by only having on hand the basic atmospherics such as a massage table or chairs, and items they can physically carry in order to not be worn out before the session(s) begin. If they're lucky the location in which they are practicing massage is free of distraction--such as people walking around, people watchers, and loud music from an expo, party, or farmer's market.  While great exposure to potential clients, it can also take away from the current client's overall experience by maintaining a personalized experience in a privatized setting.

column1: Additional advantages for the clients are, the modalities to be offered between overall wellness and relaxation to therapeutic bodywork in a spa like atmosphere without the hassle of travel, taking time off from work, and making space for an at-home or on-site massage therapist at small office, non-profit, college campus, or wedding party!

It is also practical, innovative and rewarding experience to provide for teachers, and employee appreciation -- not to mention those involved in physically demanding activities such as military service members, first responders, athletes and dancers/fine arts participants.
Short Summary
The concept of this mobile massage practice came to me in January 2017. The start up cost was low and pretty doable, so I ran with it.
After all the food truck trends, mobile pet grooming, and car detailing services. I said, WHY NOT!?

A few months prior I was looking into buying a townhouse in Tampa FL, and was adamant that it had enough rooms so I could dedicate one for personal wellness. -- a room for meditation, prayer, something that made all the stresses of my day go away, some place for relaxation and rejuvenation. A place where I could even have a dedicated massage therapist come to me.

At that moment I also realized that the room could also be utilized as my own in-home massage practice. The healing of mind, body, and soul was something I was passionate about but never really pursued.

Long story short, things fell through with the townhouse BUT they HADN’T fallen through with the idea. It morphed and even though I could not have my physical wellness room, I could have wellness on wheels and thus reach out to an even larger market and community. So I bought an RV from a wonderful couple who did missionary work with only 40,000 miles on it, and enrolled in a 7 month licensing program for massage therapy at Cortiva Institute.
<h2><strong>What We Need &amp

Of course traveling to people's homes with an RV can be fairly inefficient due to time and gas, which is one of the reasons, I feel this masseuse-mobile will have it's biggest impact being parked in high- foot traffic zones such as military bases, downtown, business districts, parks, convention centers, and college campuses.

The plan is to launch The Masseuse Mobile in fall of 2017 once I receive my massage therapist license. The holiday season is the perfect time to de-stress and give back to your employees, teachers, first responders, military members, veterans, senior citizens, community organizations and even students cramming for those final exams.

My way to say thank to any investments will be complementary sessions equivalent to the amount given. The goal set to $25,000, is enough to give it the unique and chic spa experience I want to provide to my guests outside of basic upgrades including, but not limited to:
<ul>
• Outdoor touch screen for booking appointments and displaying wait times
• Indoor iPads for medical intake forms and session customization
• Upgrades for the bathroom fixtures
• Any physical changes to the interior, such as kitchen tiling
• AND - Here’s the fun part—Wrapping the vehicle and having it PROFESSIONALLY designed
• Installing Solar Panels for efficiency
• And my favorite, the electric InkBed

The newly patented electric ink bed provides a more beneficial experience to corporate and event chair massage by making parts of the body more accessible that would not normally be worked, but also gives the option to recline the client both prone and supine as not to take away from the overall experience of have to readjust mid-session.

Of course the more money raised, the more vehicles we are able to flip and the more therapists we can hire to not only maintain current clientele, but also increase it! This would allow us to meet the demand throughout the community and beyond...Additionally, donating a set of sessions to a community organization is a great way to say thank you!
Who knows, The Masseuse Mobile may be coming soon to a city near you
The Impact
Corporate Massage

Data from the American Productivity Audit, found that in a survey of nearly 30,000 people, thousands were losing productive time due to headache, arthritis, back pain, and an assortment of other musculoskeletal conditions.
Overall, the survey found that workers lost an average of 4.6 hours per week of productive time due to a pain condition
column2: and age, believe it or not, was not a factor!

column1: Because we live in a world where time is money, the America Productivity Audit took their study a step further and equated the amount of time lost to be equivalent to 61.2 BILLION dollars, not just by absenteeism but reduced work performance by 76.6%.

It's no wonder corporations and small businesses are putting a larger emphasis on the wellness of their employees! Reserving a massage therapist once a week to come their place of work can cost as little as $15/person. That's a huge return and it shows your employees that you care.
Massage for PTSD and Emotional Release

Giving back to the community and serving those who have served or gone through a traumatic event is important to me, so not only is this a fund for flipping but an opportunity to serve those who may not be able to afford it, or don't have time, and simply truly need it. Which is why I set up this campaign with the ability for contributors to donate sessions to organizations (non-profits, treatment centers, VA centers, etc.).

Massage Therapy is a holistic way of approaching Post Traumatic Stress Disorder by providing both physical and health benefits without any of the harmful side effects that medication may have. The best way to short-circuit these endless trauma effects is to treat the traumatized mind, emotions and body as a whole.

In Western medicine, the symptoms of PTSD are the result of chemical imbalances in the brain triggered by emotional stress that affect behavior, feelings and cognition. By reliving the traumatic event, the brain is unable to turn off the “Fight or Flight” response, and thus constantly flooding their bodies with stress hormones that cause not only emotional, but physical pain, as the muscles are constantly tensed for action.
Massage therapy can not only relax tensed muscles and ease the physical pain
column2: they can trigger the body’s relaxation response, ultimately breaking the cycle of fight or flight. Providing a massage experience with a 'mobile wellness center provides the full 'zen' experience and allows you to not have to worry about inviting the therapist into your home, essentially making the full experience available in a mobile format!

column1: Massage for Healthcare
According to the American Massage Therapy Association, people spend between $4 billion and $6 billion annually on massage therapy and make 114 million visits each year.

In fact, studies show 27 percent of adults in the United States report having massages in the past five years. That’s a little over one in four. Not bad, but once every five years, or even once a year is NOT enough. That's like working out for a year while constantly eating junk food the rest.
Most people think massage is a luxury or just for athletes, but in reality it is a therapeutic need that aids our Mind, Body, AND Soul.
<ul>
• 71% of consumers agree that massage therapy should be considered a form of healthcare
<li>Over 50% of people have received a massage for other reasons other than relaxation. And were often referred by their physicians, chiropractors, or physical therapists for:<ul>
<li>headaches &amp
• pregnancy
• stiffness or spasms
• circulatory problems
• neuromuscular issues (numbness, tingling)
• cancer
• digestive problems
• injury recovery or rehabilitation
• anxiety
• insomnia
• basic disease control
So many different treatments for massage therapy, that insurance agencies are beginning to include massage as preventative healthcare option!
<h2>Risks &amp

480.046(1)(n) Grounds for disciplinary action by the board include ""practicing massage at a site, location, or place which is not duly licensed as a massage establishment, except that a massage therapist, as provided by rules adopted by the board, may provide massage services, excluding colonic irrigation, at the residence of a client, at the office of the client, at a sports event, at a convention, or at a trade show.
**For events, fairs, conventions, permission must be obtained by the event manager or property owner.

In other words you can't just set up shop in a parking lot, one must have written permission. For example, I cannot just set up at the Tampa Convention Center and wait for attendees to come out for a massage, it must be a pre-coordinated and synergistic effort -- and that always works out better for everyone.
Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, there are still ways to make sure that this masseuse mobile get's out on the road and reaches those who need it most! One of those ways is sharing with your friends and family, and even more so community partners and the businesses you work for. Simply inviting us to your office of employment allows your co-workers, clients and guests the ability to receive and pay for services individually without reserving actual office funds.

Also, referrals for the upgrades and installments allow me to make contacts I might not have known I have in the industry (i.e. auto paint and body shops, solar panel installers, electricians, software designers, etc!)
","I am flipping and re-purposing a 1987 Fleetwood Bounder Motorhome to in order to bring people wellness ""on wheels"" via massage therapy.

The idea is to provide a unique therapeutic experience, where you can slip away from your everyday activities, and fully immerse yourself amongst beauty, comfort, and personalized attention in a Zen environment—an environment that we bring to you.
Many independent massage therapists are mobile and have the ability to travel to clients, events, and businesses
column2: however may lack the physical environment that goes hand in hand with a spa, by only having on hand the basic atmospherics such as a massage table or chairs, and items they can physically carry in order to not be worn out before the session(s) begin. If they're lucky the location in which they are practicing massage is free of distraction--such as people walking around, people watchers, and loud music from an expo, party, or farmer's market.  While great exposure to potential clients, it can also take away from the current client's overall experience by maintaining a personalized experience in a privatized setting.

column1: Additional advantages for the clients are, the modalities to be offered between overall wellness and relaxation to therapeutic bodywork in a spa like atmosphere without the hassle of travel, taking time off from work, and making space for an at-home or on-site massage therapist at small office, non-profit, college campus, or wedding party!

It is also practical, innovative and rewarding experience to provide for teachers, and employee appreciation -- not to mention those involved in physically demanding activities such as military service members, first responders, athletes and dancers/fine arts participants.
Short Summary
The concept of this mobile massage practice came to me in January 2017. The start up cost was low and pretty doable, so I ran with it.
After all the food truck trends, mobile pet grooming, and car detailing services. I said, WHY NOT!?

A few months prior I was looking into buying a townhouse in Tampa FL, and was adamant that it had enough rooms so I could dedicate one for personal wellness. -- a room for meditation, prayer, something that made all the stresses of my day go away, some place for relaxation and rejuvenation. A place where I could even have a dedicated massage therapist come to me.

At that moment I also realized that the room could also be utilized as my own in-home massage practice. The healing of mind, body, and soul was something I was passionate about but never really pursued.

Long story short, things fell through with the townhouse BUT they HADN’T fallen through with the idea. It morphed and even though I could not have my physical wellness room, I could have wellness on wheels and thus reach out to an even larger market and community. So I bought an RV from a wonderful couple who did missionary work with only 40,000 miles on it, and enrolled in a 7 month licensing program for massage therapy at Cortiva Institute.
What We Need & What You Get

Of course traveling to people's homes with an RV can be fairly inefficient due to time and gas, which is one of the reasons, I feel this masseuse-mobile will have it's biggest impact being parked in high- foot traffic zones such as military bases, downtown, business districts, parks, convention centers, and college campuses.

The plan is to launch The Masseuse Mobile in fall of 2017 once I receive my massage therapist license. The holiday season is the perfect time to de-stress and give back to your employees, teachers, first responders, military members, veterans, senior citizens, community organizations and even students cramming for those final exams.

My way to say thank to any investments will be complementary sessions equivalent to the amount given. The goal set to $25,000, is enough to give it the unique and chic spa experience I want to provide to my guests outside of basic upgrades including, but not limited to:
Outdoor touch screen for booking appointments and displaying wait times
Indoor iPads for medical intake forms and session customization
Upgrades for the bathroom fixtures
Any physical changes to the interior, such as kitchen tiling
AND - Here’s the fun part—Wrapping the vehicle and having it PROFESSIONALLY designed
Installing Solar Panels for efficiency
And my favorite, the electric InkBed

The newly patented electric ink bed provides a more beneficial experience to corporate and event chair massage by making parts of the body more accessible that would not normally be worked, but also gives the option to recline the client both prone and supine as not to take away from the overall experience of have to readjust mid-session.

Of course the more money raised, the more vehicles we are able to flip and the more therapists we can hire to not only maintain current clientele, but also increase it! This would allow us to meet the demand throughout the community and beyond...Additionally, donating a set of sessions to a community organization is a great way to say thank you!
Who knows, The Masseuse Mobile may be coming soon to a city near you

Overall, the survey found that workers lost an average of 4.6 hours per week of productive time due to a pain condition

column2: >Pollution is deteriorating your skin.  What are you doing to protect it?
column3: >Environmental pollutants including cigarette smoke, exhaust fumes, and heavy metals generate free radicals that induce oxidative damage and put skin cells in a state of stress. Constant exposure to pollution can lead to dry skin and even premature aging. Pollution causes not only inflammation and dehydration, but also a cellular-level reaction that breaks down the barrier function of the skin and fur­ther damages the DNA.
column7:
>
Our world’s cities are polluted on a massive level.
column11: >We will contribute trees for every product purchased by backers. This is the unique opportunity not only to protect your skin from the pollutants but also get involved and make a positive influence on our planet.
column12: >Set your ideas free by using colour pens to fill the package of Daily Defender for Kids.
column17: '>Reforestation campaign with Earth Day Network
column18: >Earth Day Network is the world’s largest recruiter to the environmental movement, working with more than 50,000 partners in nearly 195 countries to build environmental democracy. The goal is to plant 7.8 billion trees – one for every person living on the planet by 2020 – with the help of governments, corporations, NGOs, and individuals. Trees provide oxygen, a home for the world’s biodiversity, and a wealth of health and economic benefits, and we need more of them. Even if the world’s economy became fossil free overnight, large-scale global reforestation would still be needed to absorb the current excess and harmful CO2 from the environment. Planting trees also improves our communities, providing economic and social benefits beyond carbon sequestration.
column22: >Breezie Daily Defender range is anti-pollution moisturizer which aims to protect your skin against oxidative stress and providing healthy skin free of the irritants pollutants.
column23: >They are made out of organic and natural ingredients, and formulas are lightweight for all skin tones and types at any time of day. Breezie Daily Defender fights back against urban pollution, smog, heavy metal, hydrocarbon, and PM2.5. In addition, it is dermatologist tested and a member of Australian Made Campaign.
column38: >Exo-P™  is a transparent and non-occlusive protective shield that acts as a buffer between your skin and the pollutants, allowing your skin to breathe while stimulating its natural defense mechanisms in the process.
column47:
> 

Why and When should I use the Breezie Daily Defender?

 

Breezie Daily Defender is not a cover-up skin care product - it’s a natural daily defense solution for skin which passed the sensitive skin test. It can be used as an alternative moisturiser in daily skincare routine and whenever needed. Apply a generous amount evenly over entire face, neck and hands.

We have consulted with environmental and health organization such as WHO, the Department of Health, and pharmacists, chemists and dermatologists in Sydney and New York.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

 

In addition to making a monetary contribution, you can help us by sharing our campaign with all your friends and family, especially those people who live in an urban setting.  Let’s spread awareness of this campaign together.

For a long term, we would like to work with distributors(online and offline) to build up their green communities in different regions and countries. For more information, you can click on www.breezie.com.au or http://www.earthday.org/campaigns/ 

 

Campaign supporters

 

 and other supporters: https://www.earthday.org/earthday/

 

Stay in Touch

Thank you for all the backers and we appreciate your support to get trees planted globally. 

Please share our project with friends and family

Have a question or a suggestion? We would love to hear from you.  You can email us at info@breezie.com.au

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BreezieAU/

or follow @breezieau on Instagram

Products are available in pharmacies in Australia.

 

FAQ

1.Can Breezie Daily Defender act as a replacement of my regular moisturizer ?

Yes. it is intended to be used as your regular daily moisturizer. Apply it twice a day after washing your face and your skin.

2. Is Breezie Daily Defender safe for women who are pregnant or nursing?

Organic and natural ingredients contained in the product formulas have not been found to cause any side effects on pregnant or nursing women, we recommend that you consult your doctor prior to using it.

 

Risks and challenges

 

Though the product formulation is complete and our manufacturing partner is about as experienced as they come
column48:
unforeseen issues may still arise. Our packaging manufacturing partner is 100% committed to delivering our project, however, manufacturers have their own process of prioritising the order of projects they work on based on production capacity and scheduling conflicts at the time of our actual order.

 

We appreciate all contributions, monetary and non-monetary, and we thank you sincerely for your time.
