column2: >Snowfox Trackerphone is designed for 4 to 8 year old kids. We combined a phone and a GPS locator so that kids can learn independence in a safe way and communicate with their parents without the harmful extras of smartphones.

column1: <ul>
<li>
No screen. Kids get to play for real.
• Long battery life. Use the device for the whole week with a single charge.
• Voice call. Be there for your child and call her at all times.
• Powerful antenna provides realtime connectivity.
• Play proof for everyday use.
• Free smartphone application with child´s location on map, voice call and smart notifications on familiar places.
Getting started with Snowfox is easy:
<ul>
<li>
Ready out-of-box. No need for additional operator plans. Add the trackerphone to your Snowfox smartphone application and start making calls and getting location updates straight away.
<li>

Only 9.90 USD/EUR per month. The fixed monthly subscription price includes a local phone number and a mobile plan with all-you-can-eat data and voice calls. Billed monthly on your credit card and payments are securely processed with Stripe
• Snowfox Trackerphone connects to all major 3G and 2G networks in your country.
• First production batch now available via Indiegogo to 10 countries with a local call-in number: USA, Canada, UK, Germany, The Netherlands, Spain, Denmark, Sweden, Norway and Finland.

column2: >Snowfox Trackerphone allows you to call your child at anytime. There is only one button on the device so kids learn easily to use Snowfox. The child can press the button and the parents will get a call-me notification.
>Every Snowfox device has an embedded SIM and local operator subscription inbuilt, so getting started is easy. You simply add the device to your application and you are good to go.
>The World is a magical place for children. They need to explore and play to learn the necessary skills for the life ahead. Snowfox brings extra comfort to the first steps of independence.

column1: With Snowfox you are in the know of your child´s whereabouts. Snowfox sends smart notifications to your smartphone from designated places and you can also see the current location on the child on Snowfox smartphone application.

column2: >When you were a child, there were no personal screens causing problems at home. Children spent remarkable time playing, exploring the neighborhood and visiting friends.
column3: >Snowfox lets your kids play and explore, while maintaining a direct line to mum and dad. Kids feel safe and happy having Snowfox with them on their small adventures.

column2: >Q: Does the device work in my country?

column1: We have selected ten countries where we will ship the devices with a local number. column2: Canada and 9.90€ EUR per month for the rest. The subscription includes all data and calls for one Snowfox Trackerphone.

column1: Snowfox Trackerphone uses the latest SIM card technology which can use various local operators based on their network performance.
Q: What is the local operator used in my country?

A: Snowfox Trackerphone can connect to various operator networks in each country to always provide the best coverage. The selection of the currently used mobile network is defined by the device based on network performance.

<h3><span style=""font-weight: normal
<div><span style=""font-weight: normal

Snowfox trackerphone is now fully designed and certified for sales start. We have the data and voice call subscription agreements in place for the planned global rollout. However, there are a couple of items that might have an impact to our delivery schedule, as well as the service performance in certain countries.
<div>

1. Schedule risk in regards of hugely successful campaign: If we need to suddenly increase the planned production volume, we might need to order new batches of components, which will take time. The estimated delivery for longest lead time components is 21 weeks. This means that in the worst case the final shipments to our contributors will take place in early 2017. In every case the first devices will ship starting in October 2016.
<div>

2. New way to provide the data and voice connectivity: The approach we have taken to provide the easiest possible means for getting started with Snowfox means that there is still some uncertainty on the global performance of the backend. We are continuosly testing our solution in the target markets and so far the results look good. However, making things for the first time can bring  surprises. In this case we are prepared to work with you to solve any arising issues.
We have on average over 15 years of mobile devices design experience and we have done over 10 products to our customers at Haltian.

","Snowfox Trackerphone is designed for 4 to 8 year old kids. We combined a phone and a GPS locator so that kids can learn independence in a safe way and communicate with their parents without the harmful extras of smartphones.
No screen. Kids get to play for real.
Long battery life. Use the device for the whole week with a single charge.
Voice call. Be there for your child and call her at all times.
Powerful antenna provides realtime connectivity.
Play proof for everyday use.
Free smartphone application with child´s location on map, voice call and smart notifications on familiar places.
Getting started with Snowfox is easy:
Ready out-of-box. No need for additional operator plans. Add the trackerphone to your Snowfox smartphone application and start making calls and getting location updates straight away.

Only 9.90 USD/EUR per month. The fixed monthly subscription price includes a local phone number and a mobile plan with all-you-can-eat data and voice calls. Billed monthly on your credit card and payments are securely processed with Stripe
Snowfox Trackerphone connects to all major 3G and 2G networks in your country.
First production batch now available via Indiegogo to 10 countries with a local call-in number: USA, Canada, UK, Germany, The Netherlands, Spain, Denmark, Sweden, Norway and Finland.
NowThis Mashup (video)

Snowfox Trackerphone allows you to call your child at anytime. There is only one button on the device so kids learn easily to use Snowfox. The child can press the button and the parents will get a call-me notification.
Every Snowfox device has an embedded SIM and local operator subscription inbuilt, so getting started is easy. You simply add the device to your application and you are good to go.
The World is a magical place for children. They need to explore and play to learn the necessary skills for the life ahead. Snowfox brings extra comfort to the first steps of independence.

With Snowfox you are in the know of your child´s whereabouts. Snowfox sends smart notifications to your smartphone from designated places and you can also see the current location on the child on Snowfox smartphone application.

When you were a child, there were no personal screens causing problems at home. Children spent remarkable time playing, exploring the neighborhood and visiting friends. Snowfox lets your kids play and explore, while maintaining a direct line to mum and dad. Kids feel safe and happy having Snowfox with them on their small adventures.
Snowfox Trackerphone is designed and manufactured in Finland.

Every Snowfox Trackerphone includes an embedded SIM which comes with a monthly pay-as-you go plan for €9.90EUR for EU and $9.90USD for US & Canada, which includes unlimited data and voice calls for one Snowfox Trackerphone in your country. Monthly billing for the plan happens handily on the app via credit card. We use Stripe for payments processing.

Snowfox first use experience and backend services has been carefully designed to provide a seamless start into connecting your family. It is the first trackerphone that can be sold in every store. We use multiple mobile networks in each country to make sure Snowfox has the best connectivity at all times!

We have taken the end-to-end quality of the product a focus area for our design & engineering project. To reach the target quality we have been doing user testing & co-creation with prototype devices for more than 6 months. Working directly with customers has given us many insights on how to improve the product, as well as given us the opportunity to polish the device behavior prior to sales start. We are now pretty confident the device will work as intended.

At the beginning of the campaign we have selected 10 countries where Snowfox Trackerphones can be shipped. At first you can get the trackerphone to following countries: USA, Canada, UK, Germany, The Netherlands, Spain, Norway, Denmark, Sweden and Finland. More countries might be added during the campaign.
You will decide which countries we target next!

We are really looking forward to seeing how Snowfox Trackerphone is received  around the world. Currently we have the connectivity agreements to 32 countries and counting. If the campaign goes well, there might be some countries added during our campaign. Please share the message and get a supporter perk to influence our decision!
Haltian is a design services house, currently designing and engineering
ground breaking products to large and small customers around the world. Haltian Products, a subsidiary to Haltian is responsible for driving Haltian product businesses, such as Snowfox and Thingsee.

Haltian has helped many companies globally  by designing & engineering beautiful new products. Our team of really talented engineers, designers and mobile business experts can execute even the most challenging product plans. Our team is mostly ex-Nokians with more than 15 years of experience in mobile devices design and we have done tens of phones in the past.
Follow links for more information

Oura – World´s first wellness ringQuieton – Silence with active sound cancelling earplugsOmata – Analogue design on a powerful GPS computerThingsee - New Internet of Things products & services faster, easier and at a fraction of the cost
Join us today and contribute to
Snowfox campaign to make kids active and to give peace of mind for families!
Frequently asked questions:
Q: Does the device work in my country?

We have selected ten countries where we will ship the devices with a local number. If you live in the following countries you can get the device with a local number, all data and calls included with a  monthly subscription: USA, Canada, UK, Germany, The Netherlands, Spain, Sweden, Norway, Denmark and Finland.
The monthly Pay-as-you-go subscription price is 9.90$ USD per month for USA & Canada and 9.90€ EUR per month for the rest. The subscription includes all data and calls for one Snowfox Trackerphone.
Snowfox Trackerphone uses the latest SIM card technology which can use various local operators based on their network performance.
Q: What is the local operator used in my country?

A: Snowfox Trackerphone can connect to various operator networks in each country to always provide the best coverage. The selection of the currently used mobile network is defined by the device based on network performance.
List of supported local operator networks:
USA:
AT&T and T-Mobile US
Canada:
Rogers, Telus, Bell, SaskTel and MTS
UK:
EE, o2, Vodafone and 3
Germany:
o2, Telekom and Vodafone
The Netherlands:
KPN, Vodafone and T-Mobile
Spain:
Movistar, Vodafone, Orange and Yoigo
Denmark:
TDC, Telenor, Telia and Hutchinson
Norway:
Telenor and Telia
Sweden:
Telia, Tele2, Telenor and Three
Finland:
Sonera, Elisa and DNA
Q: Why is Snowfox Trackerphone not available for my country?

A: Snowfox Trackerphone has an inbuilt SIM card module, and we need to set up the connectivity for each country or region separately. The devices will work in many countries, however, we want to provide our customers with local call-in numbers.

This means we need to take the global rollout step-by-step.  The best way to make sure your country gets Snowfox Trackerphone faster is to contribute to our campaign with a supporter perk and share our campaign in social media.
Q: Why does Snowfox Trackerphone require a monthly subscription?

A: Snowfox Trackerphone is no different from phones. There are both data and voice calls available, so we need to use the mobile networks to get the service working. We have put a lot of extra effort to make the taking-into-use and continuous usage effort free for our customers. From pricing point of view we believe the cost to be competitive when compared to getting a smartphone for your child.
Q: How do I make calls with Snowfox?

A: The kid presses the button on Snowfox Trackerphone which sends a notification to all guardians´ smartphones. Any guardian can call back  to the child. The child can answer the incoming call with a press of a button. The application notifies the other guardians about the call with a profile timeline event & notification.
Known Risks:

Snowfox trackerphone is now fully designed and certified for sales start. We have the data and voice call subscription agreements in place for the planned global rollout. However, there are a couple of items that might have an impact to our delivery schedule, as well as the service performance in certain countries.

1. Schedule risk in regards of hugely successful campaign: If we need to suddenly increase the planned production volume, we might need to order new batches of components, which will take time. The estimated delivery for longest lead time components is 21 weeks. This means that in the worst case the final shipments to our contributors will take place in early 2017. In every case the first devices will ship starting in October 2016.

2. New way to provide the data and voice connectivity: The approach we have taken to provide the easiest possible means for getting started with Snowfox means that there is still some uncertainty on the global performance of the backend. We are continuosly testing our solution in the target markets and so far the results look good. However, making things for the first time can bring  surprises. In this case we are prepared to work with you to solve any arising issues.
We have on average over 15 years of mobile devices design experience and we have done over 10 products to our customers at Haltian.",34.0,1,"1 Campaign

Voici 7 ans qu'Aquatic Rando fait découvrir le monde sous marin à un large public, tu fais peut être parti de ceux avec qui nous avons eu la chance de palmer.

Aujourd'hui, notre bateau a bien triste allure alors que sa coque est en parfait état et que son moteur 250 cv a été changé il y a 2 ans. Ses boudins sont devenus poreux et il ne tient plus le gonflage.
Ceux qui me connaissent savent que ma préoccupation première est de toujours apporter le meilleur, et là, avec un pneumatique dans cet état, ce n'est plus le cas.
d'où mon action aujourd'hui.
Pour remettre à neuf le bateau, j'aurais besoin d'un peu plus de 12000€, et cet argent, je ne l'ai pas. C'est pour cela que je fais appel à toi pour participer à son financement.

Bien sur, en plus de mes remerciements et de ma gratitude, je te renvoie l’ascenseur avec des prestations et des cadeaux que je t'offre en retour. (des formations plongée, des activités aquatiques, des articles de ma boutique ...)
Grâce aux fonds récoltés, le bateau partira sur un chantier naval vers Marseille pour refaire peau neuve. (et ce sera grâce à tous ceux qui m'auront suivi dans cette aventure)
Dés que le bateau reviendra, il pourra à nouveau nous aider à partager notre passion et nous comptons bien t'y accueillir.
Merci d'avance et n'hésite pas à faire passer le mot et partager cette requête.
Alain

Swim in the warm blue calm sea or dip into the pool. Kayak.

column2:
>Obesity is one of the biggest causes of preventable chronic diseases and health care costs in the United States. Similarly, diabetes and hypertension epidemics are increasing worldwide. It is estimated that one in three Americans will eventually develop diabetes and over 3 million people a year will be diagnosed with hypertension. Most medical doctorate degrees do not require exercise science nor nutrition to be a mandatory part of their curriculum. Due to this, your doctor may not have the right tools needed to prescribe the right plan of action for a patient to combat these illnesses. It is not the patient’s fault that they do not follow the doctor’s advice to exercise and eat healthier, due to the lack of prescription specificity and community support.  

By improving nutrition and increasing activity we can lower healthcare costs through fewer doctor's visits, less medical tests needed, decrease prescription drug usage, and lower the risk for a wide range of diseases. Health-E-Matrix is designed to assist individuals in reducing their dependency on medications needed for diseases and illnesses caused by unhealthy lifestyles.
column4:
/>

By simply reducing the body weight of an individual with type 2 diabetes by 10%, it reduces the amount of medication they need or eliminating it completely.  If 1/4 of the percentage of individuals who have Type 2 diabetes were able to reduce their weight, not only would it positively impact their health, but eventually affect the healthcare market.  This effect would resonate beyond themselves and help the ones they know and love and even those individuals they don’t.
column7:
>Healthcare needs a Hero...You​​

With your donation,  we will use exercise as medicine in order to make prevention profitable in the interest of individuals, doctors, trainers, and health insurance companies. The bottom line is, physicians do not always have the time or resources needed to spend with each individual patient to provide them the proper guidelines on diet and exercise. This by no means is a fault of theirs, but the demand of an ever-increasing patient count due to obesity related health issues means more patients for each doctor and less time dedicated to each patient.
column9:
/>

We have created HEALTH-E-MATRIX, a medical fitness system that engages, educates, and empowers doctors and qualified fitness professionals to collaborate together. This system facilitates collaboration through electronic health records, practice management software and social networks to build trust management, accountability and quality control to disseminate useful information to its applicants and patients.
column14:
>As a result of our system, individuals will:

  • gain access to protocol-based fitness services
column15:
>to increase appropriate physical activities

  • make better-informed lifestyle choices based on
column16:
>a doctor’s prescription for exercise

  • motivate users to take responsibility for their
column17:
>health and health information

Teamwork Approach to Healthcare
column18:
>

At Rise to Purpose, we have a unique team of individuals ranging from fitness professionals, nutritionists and insurance experts who each bring their own set of exemplary skills to the table. With more and more baby boomers outliving their children, factors such as less activity due to more demanding job and personal lives contribute to the percentage of the population becoming increasingly overweight will not only contribute to the rise in obesity but the risk of developing diabetes and other obesity related health issues, as shown in graphic below. Your contribution will not only help the lives of your family and friends, but will also help change the lives of those you don't know and generations to come. Here at Rise to Purpose we strongly believe in people helping people
column19: with your donation to Health-E-Matrix, you are helping someone you may never know live a longer, healthier life for their children and their family.
column22:
/>

How much does it cost to change our nation’s healthcare?

In order to get HEALTH-E-MATRIX running we need to raise $100,000. Your support for this campaign will help us cover the costs of:

column1: • The hiring of an app and web designer to create communication between our program and your mobile device
• Creating the app on several different platforms to connect your physician and personal trainer
• The hiring and training of fitness professionals in over 40 states
• Rise to Purpose support staff
• Marketing campaign and press packet for the insurance companies, presenting information to market our technology and on-boarding process of our product

column4:
>(In Addition to the Warmth in Your Heart)

Be sure to check out the perks we're offering our HEALTH-E-MARTIX supporters for donations (large and small)! We'll be adding cool new perks later, too.

Investing in people who are driven with the vision and opportunity to make a change and difference in our Nation and getting them in front of top insurance companies is good for everyone. If you are able to, please support this cause today. 

Bridge Builder Badge and Social Media Shoutout: $10

Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need &
column2:
What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks &
column3:
Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

Summary

Turn up the heat with VENUS-PRO Thermo Slim Shake - a scientifically engineered combination of advanced high proteins, fat burning system, fibre and healthy fats. It's time to make every meal healthy and nutritious. 

The new force in weight loss

For us, weight loss is about being able to eat healthy and nutritious food to achieve your goals, not starving to lose weight. With VENUS-PRO Thermo Slim Shake you now have the flexibility to achieve your goal without yo-yo effect. 

VENUS-PRO thermo slim shake is not another protein shake. It is the future. You are no longer limited to a shake. With VENUS-PRO you can bake food, take it after workout, as a snack, or make most delicious healthy desserts.

And it's getting people excited... like: 

Suli on VENUS-PRO

What I think about VENUS-PRO by SportySuli from Info@venusarmy.com on Vimeo.
Julia on VENUS-PRO
Vegetarian trying the VENUS-PRO for the first time from Info@venusarmy.com on Vimeo.

Today we are making history by introducing VENUS-PRO Thermo Slim Shake. A slim shake supercharged with powerful Thermo Blend to turn fat into energy.

Take after your workout, in the morning, make dessert, bake food - Enjoy Limitless. Taste Delicious! 

Stop wasting time in the kitchen and stop buying unhealthy fast food! With VENUS-PRO Thermo Slim Shake you can enjoy limitless food combinations. From effective post workout shakes, healthy snacks to delicious desserts. 

We create a super shake that is:
• Taste delicious
• Scientifically proven weight loss ingredients
• Perfect for shakes, baking and desserts
• Keep you full for longer
• Helps to burn fat and energize your day

VENUS-PRO is ideal first thing in the morning, before and after training session, as a snack. It is perfect for your favourite protein dessert as well. Featuring 6-in-1 SHRED matrix VENUS-PRO is the most innovative weight loss and muscle toning protein shake in the market. 

The “VENUS-PRO Thermo Slim Shake“ is your ticket to long-lasting and successful fat loss, without having to starve yourself or experiencing any yo-yo effects whatsoever.

Super Ingredients

Special Features
• Less than 75 calories per shake
• 5 fat busting ingredients
• 4 delicious flavours
• Less than 0.5g of fat per serving
• Mix really easy and taste amazing
PROBLEM &
column3:
Weight Loss

Classic weight loss shakes have too much calories, high in carbs, less protein and they taste really bad. And they are no different to most protein shakes in the market. We knew this is something we need to address and we really wanted to develop something for women. Most importantly it needs to taste great.

A single scoop of VENUS-PRO deliver 15.5g of lean protein and thermo blend with only 74 calories per serving. The perfect companion for weight loss and lean protein desserts. 

It's Super Easy to Make Your VENUS-PRO

2. Nutritious

Unlike other weight loss shakes, VENUS-PRO is low in carbs and high protein. This concentrated formula can keep your hunger at bay for longer and keep you away from unhealthy food.  

Our VENUS-PRO  is made with lean whey protein and nutritious soybean plant protein for maximum absorption and benefits. It is also infused with antioxidant-rich nature's superfood acai berry extract &
column5:
energy-boosting properties. 

 

3. Taste

Most weight loss shakes taste like batter and awful. Too many protein supplements or food-replacement drinks taste bland and earthy. We know this is something we have to fix. So for over 6 months we worked with our manufacturers to perfect 4 delicious flavours for you. If you don't believe us, check-out below reviews. 

With your support, we want to introduce 4 great tasting flavours to our range. 

- Toffee Popcorn Swirl

- Mint Chocolate Cookie

- Vanilla Cheesecake

- Double Chocolate Brownies

 

HOW VENUS-PRO CAN CHANGE YOUR LIFE.

THERMO SLIM SHAKE –Green

We're so excited to announce that not only is VENUS-PRO happening, but Thermo Slim Shake Green version already on the move. This new formula contains 100% plant based protein, thermo blend, added probiotics &
column6:
vitamins to accommodate those following a paleo, vegetarian, or vegan diet.

VENUS Story

VENUS-PRO thermo slim shake is not another protein shake. It is the future. You are no longer limited to a shake. With VENUS-PRO you can bake food, take it after workout, as a snack, or make most delicious healthy desserts. After 16 years of experience I realised that how important it is to base our formula based on current science and nutrition demand. 


My Story

I started Venus Nutrition (VENUS ARMY) International in 2015 with the goal of providing dynamic and innovative fitness and nutrition movements for women around the world. ‘A complete tool box for women.’

However, I don’t want to tell you how great our brand is or why we want to help end world hunger and make a difference in those areas that we are concerned about. Today I want to share a story, a story that can change the way you look at things. And it is my story. Everything you read from here on began with a dream to make a difference in the world that we all share.

Before VENUS was born I went through a life changing transformation
column7:
from a divorce to becoming homeless to losing my first business idea and going completely bankrupt. At one time I had only £5 to eat for 3 weeks. Often I ate only one meal a day. Most people who face these similar situations would give up and take the exit route because it is too painful to experience this, why would anyone want to put themselves in a situation like this.

I realised that if I could somehow connect my passion, with a global movement and build a company, my dream can become a reality. A company powered by its staff members, customers and fans.

Today Venus is ready to expand its wings across the USA, UK, Australia and Europe. We are inviting passionate people to join us and we hope to build the most powerful movement in the fitness world. We want to re-invent the fitness industry with great stories of our time.

With VENUS-PRO Thermo Slim Shake you now have the flexibility to achieve your goal without yo-yo effect. VENUS-PRO thermo slim shake is not another protein shake. It is the future. column3: >We're not happy with the current headache and migraine relief options offered today. We believe that the last thing this world needs is another pill that come with a bunch of unpleasant side effects. Especially when there are natural options available!
column5: >Is your product FDA approved?
column7: >A: Our products are GRAS approved, no product in dietary supplements have “FDA Approvals”. Products in this category must meet GRAS to be accepted safe and marketable in the United States.
column9: >Do I need my doctor's approval to take HeadAid?
column11: >HeadAid does not require a prescription. However, it is recommended that you speak with your physician or headache specialist regarding drug interactions if you are taking any other medications.
column13: >I want to start the HeadAid Daily formulation preparation, but is it OK --- if needed—to combine it with the Fast-Acting formulations in the same 24 hours?
column15: >It is safe to combine HeadAid Fast Acting formulas with the HeadAid Daily formula. The amount of magnesium within one dose of HeadAid Daily was chosen so no one would risk too high of levels when combining with other HeadAid products.  Assuming the patient has no end stage renal disease (in which case it is not recommended that they take any Magnesium supplements).
column17: >Can I take HeadAid while pregnant or breastfeeding?
column19:
>It is recommended that one should consult with their physician prior to using HeadAid if they are breastfeeding or pregnant.

","We're not happy with the current headache and migraine relief options offered today. We believe that the last thing this world needs is another pill that come with a bunch of unpleasant side effects. Especially when there are natural options available!     Is your product FDA approved?A: Our products are GRAS approved, no product in dietary supplements have “FDA Approvals”. Products in this category must meet GRAS to be accepted safe and marketable in the United States. Do I need my doctor's approval to take HeadAid?HeadAid does not require a prescription. However, it is recommended that you speak with your physician or headache specialist regarding drug interactions if you are taking any other medications. I want to start the HeadAid Daily formulation preparation, but is it OK --- if needed—to combine it with the Fast-Acting formulations in the same 24 hours?It is safe to combine HeadAid Fast Acting formulas with the HeadAid Daily formula. The amount of magnesium within one dose of HeadAid Daily was chosen so no one would risk too high of levels when combining with other HeadAid products.  Assuming the patient has no end stage renal disease (in which case it is not recommended that they take any Magnesium supplements). Can I take HeadAid while pregnant or breastfeeding?It is recommended that one should consult with their physician prior to using HeadAid if they are breastfeeding or pregnant.",35.0,0,"1 Campaign

column1: UPGRADE / ACTUALIZACIÓN:

Good news! You will not have to wait until March to receive your EPICON!
The SUPER EARLY BIRD EPICON will receive you in a few days!

Buenas noticias! No vais a tener que esperar a marzo para recibir vuestros EPICON!
Los SUPER EARLY BIRD EPICON los recibiréis en pocos días!
UPGRADE 2 / ACTUALIZACIÓN 2:
Racket Tennis assembly / Montaje sobre raqueta de tenis:

You must follow absolutely the same steps as if you were assembling a regular paddle racket.
Owing to a tennis racket has a wider hand-grip than it has a paddle one, EPICON, in this case it is composed by a double intensity intelligent micro-urethane, in addition, it is also half thick.
After you have chosen your reward, we will mail you asking if you prefer buying a tennis or a paddle one.

Hay que seguir exactamente los mismos pasos que con las palas de pádel.
Debido a que la empuñadura de las raquetas de tenis son de mayor diámetro, EPICON, en este caso, se compone de un microuretano inteligente de doble densidad, pero de la mitad de grosor.
Después de que elijas tu recompensa, te enviaremos un mail para que nos indiques si deseas EPICON para tenis o pádel.
Un abrazo, Juan.

<h3>About Sweet Cream &amp
Link to short clip of my body butter
Instagram

Hiya! Thank you for taking a peek at my campaign page. As a contributor to a number of gofundme asks, I recognize it really is a community effort to support people in getting the help they need during crises or in achieving their dreams through necessary funding. I am a university graduate with a passion for skincare and products that are not only beneficial for your body, but also the environment, and the folks who provided the labor to make it possible!
After spending years using products that are basically water &
column2: preservatives, I began to finally experiment with making my own formula. My goal was to find the right ratio that could moisturize, soften, rejuvenate, and most importantly, lock in that moisture. The added perk was creating scents that are unique and memorable. Last year I started my first line under the name Hellebore Satin, an homage to some of my favorite flowers, to great reception and reviews:

column1: This year, I'm changing up the name to something a bit more fun to say: Sweet Cream. Alongside that change, I've learned even more about skincare and will be altering my recipe for even better benefits!
Sweet Cream Body Butters
<ul>
• No fillers, no preservatives, no added water
<li><i>The butters are all natural &amp
• Scents are essential oils, there are a few artificial blends (like dark chocolate)
• Sent to you in glass jars that are securely packed
• Ingredients are recognizable
• Can be customized for allergens
Why am I here?

I believe that skincare should be good for you, good for the environment, and good for everyone involved in the process! Unfortunately, I don't have the funds for the quality ingredients and tools  needed to get Sweet Cream off the ground. Your generous contributions will enable me to purchase oils, butters, containers, tools, labels, and shipping materials at wholesale which is much more cost effective.
Current Lines:
1.Wordsmith:

Back to Basics: this unscented butter highlights the gentle nut and chocolate aroma of cocoa butter and slides on like velvet to leave your skin soft and nourished. Works well for those with scent sensitivities.
Appetence (an attraction or natural bond): this bergamot based melody is a nostalgic return to summer nights with a warm lavender undertone.

Quaintrelle (Emphasizing a life of passion and cultivation of life’s pleasures): dive into a  resonant earthy seduction. Hints of  amber, dark chocolate, oats and honey intertwine in this memorable scent. Lasting throughout the day, this experience transforms to complement your own natural allure.

Kairos (the perfect delicate crucial moment. The Fleeting rightness of time and space): light and delicate, Kairos is an interplay of cucumber, holly-berry, and green tea, and just a touch of honey sweetening this teasing flirtation.

Numinous (the powerful personal experiencing of feeling overwhelmed and inspired): allow the muses of citrus and ginger to inspire you. Discover  moments of intimate potential layered between notes of sweetness and spice.
Derive (a spontaneous journey leaving ones life behind): take a heady journey and lose yourself in an otherworldly blend of bergamot, rose, and lemon verbena.
2. Astro-Butter
This line will be a series of 12 astrology inspired scents for the celestially inclined among us.
<h3>3. <i>Grin &amp

Introducing my  line of nourishing beard oils that will include some traditional woodsy scents as well as tantalizing treats such as pumpkin spice.

 

Your Generous Contribution:
In order to get started I am asking for $5000. This will go towards wholesale purchase of:
<ul>
<li>organic fair trade oils &amp
• essential oils: ($60-150) for 8 oz
<li>Containers &amp
• Shipping materials (boxes, recycled corrugated packing bubble) : ~$300
• Labels: ~$300
<h3>Risks &amp
If I receive more orders than anticipated or my suppliers are out of stock there may be a delay in shipping products, but it will get to you! My goal is to make sure you are happy and satisfied :D
Other Ways You Can Help
Please share on social media and by word of mouth! Thank you so much for reading, sharing, and contributing!

A 7-Part Docuseries - The Message
The Truth About Aging is a ground breaking docuseries from award-winning filmmaker, John Dahlgren &
column2: Optimal Health Practitioner, Jason Prall, that takes you on an exciting journey to the world's Blue Zones on a mission to uncover secrets of the longest-lived, documented populations around the world.
>The Blue Zones have been studied for more than 40 years and while a few of their healthy habits
column3: > have been identified, the underlying biological mechanisms that explain WHY these groups live so long &amp
column4: exactly how their lifestyle translates to health have yet to be effectively communicated to the public. Our film series plans to do just that!

column1: What separates this film is our focus on HEALTH.
This is not a film about how to treat disease. Rather, our message will concentrate on dietary and lifestyle measures that build and maintain health as we age.
The Harsh Truth
<ul>
• The percentage of American children and adolescents who are considered overweight or obese has tripled since 1970.
• Over 1/3 of American children are overweight or obese.
• Columbia University researchers project that there will be $48 – $66 billion added to current health care costs each year between now and 2030.
• More than 70% of adults across the United States are already being diagnosed with a chronic disease.
• The treatment of the seven most common chronic diseases, coupled with productivity losses, costs the U.S. economy more than $1 trillion dollars annually.

In the last 70 years, the modern world has taken a turn for the worse. Our food, water, air, and soil are poisoned with toxins. Our atmosphere is blanketed in electromagnetic (EMF) waves. And our society is fixated on technology while community dissolves.
Research has shown that diet &
column2: exercise contribute to health in profound ways. But could there be more? Undoubtedly...

column1: But is it really as simple as applying the lessons of the Blue Zones?

In short, no. We'll never be able to ditch modernity and precisely model life in the Blue Zones. In fact, evidence suggests the Blue Zones aren't quite the Blue Zones they used to be...longevity is diminishing in many of them too!
In order to reduce chronic disease and increase longevity, we must investigate our modern environment and lifestyles and find out how we can optimize them to improve health as society progresses.
Not only will this film detail the factors that contribute to health, but we'll show and explain the avoidable environmental &
column2: lifestyle factors responsible for the drastic rise in chronic diseases like Alzheimer's, Diabetes, Autoimmunity, Cancer, and much more as we interview top scientists, researchers, healers, medical professionals, pediatricians, and gerontologists around the world.

column1: This is an extremely urgent message and we need your help in spreading the word.
Topics We'll Be Covering
<ul>
• Diet &
• Exercise &
• Circadian Biology &
• Toxins &

This project will only happen if we successfully crowdfund it. It will be funded $25, $100, $500 at a time. This means we desperately need you to support and share this campaign with the world!

I'm going to be honest...I'm a little nervous that we won't raise enough money to be able to tell the story we need to tell. And if we don't, how will this message get out??
There is no money in the health message we're promoting. It involves no drugs, no supplements, no technology, and no fancy programs. In fact, our message detracts from all those industries.

So thank you for you support!
","A 7-Part Docuseries - The Message

The Truth About Aging is a ground breaking docuseries from award-winning filmmaker, John Dahlgren & Optimal Health Practitioner, Jason Prall, that takes you on an exciting journey to the world's Blue Zones on a mission to uncover secrets of the longest-lived, documented populations around the world.

The Blue Zones have been studied for more than 40 years and while a few of their healthy habits have been identified, the underlying biological mechanisms that explain WHY these groups live so long & exactly how their lifestyle translates to health have yet to be effectively communicated to the public. Our film series plans to do just that!
What separates this film is our focus on HEALTH.
This is not a film about how to treat disease. Rather, our message will concentrate on dietary and lifestyle measures that build and maintain health as we age.
The Harsh Truth
The percentage of American children and adolescents who are considered overweight or obese has tripled since 1970.
Over 1/3 of American children are overweight or obese.
Columbia University researchers project that there will be $48 – $66 billion added to current health care costs each year between now and 2030.
More than 70% of adults across the United States are already being diagnosed with a chronic disease.
The treatment of the seven most common chronic diseases, coupled with productivity losses, costs the U.S. economy more than $1 trillion dollars annually.

In the last 70 years, the modern world has taken a turn for the worse. Our food, water, air, and soil are poisoned with toxins. Our atmosphere is blanketed in electromagnetic (EMF) waves. And our society is fixated on technology while community dissolves.
Research has shown that diet & exercise contribute to health in profound ways. But could there be more? Undoubtedly...
But is it really as simple as applying the lessons of the Blue Zones?

In short, no. We'll never be able to ditch modernity and precisely model life in the Blue Zones. In fact, evidence suggests the Blue Zones aren't quite the Blue Zones they used to be...longevity is diminishing in many of them too!
In order to reduce chronic disease and increase longevity, we must investigate our modern environment and lifestyles and find out how we can optimize them to improve health as society progresses.

Not only will this film detail the factors that contribute to health, but we'll show and explain the avoidable environmental & lifestyle factors responsible for the drastic rise in chronic diseases like Alzheimer's, Diabetes, Autoimmunity, Cancer, and much more as we interview top scientists, researchers, healers, medical professionals, pediatricians, and gerontologists around the world.
This is an extremely urgent message and we need your help in spreading the word.
Topics We'll Be Covering
Diet & Nutrition
Exercise & Movement
Circadian Biology & Sleep
Toxins & Detoxification
Water Chemistry & Physics
Biophysics of Meditation
How Purpose Affects Cell Function
Technology & Nature
Immune System Health
DNA & Epigenetics
Effects of Community on Health
Gut Microbiome
Mitochondrial Function
Music & Dance
Birthing Practices & Vaccines
Childhood Development & Trauma
Elderly Care
& Much More...

RUGBY
TACKLING LIFE  REACHES OUT TO RUGBY PLAYING GIRLS AND WOMEN IN UGANDA TO EMPOWER THEM TO MAKE
THEIR LIFE CHOICES AND SUPPORT THEM IN EVERY ASPECT OF LIFE. THROUGH THE SALE
OF OUR VERY OWN COOFFEEE WE ARE AIMING TO SUSTAINABLY FINANCE RUGBY TACKLING LIFE .
column4:
>


As a group of women rugby players

column1: deeply involved with girls and women's rugby development in Uganda we felt that
we needed to offer more to our fellow players around the country so  5 of
us founded  RUGBY TACKLING LIFE .
Imagine you are 14 year old girl and your parents want to marry
you off. There is no money for school fees for you or for your other 6
siblings. You went to school for 7 years if you were lucky but spent most of
your childhood digging gardens, growing food or attending to goat. That sounds very much like a different world
to most of us but unfortunately for many Ugandan girls, it is the
reality.
With Rugby we found a way to get the girls together and impact
their lives in all aspects.  Whether it is finishing school, becoming a
teenage mother, being selected to represent Uganda, landing a great job... At RUGBY TACKLING LIFE  we do not choose
a path for the girls and young women to take but equip them with skills and
confidence so they can take the right path that suits them and will help them
tackle life
rugby pitch.
This is the first year that we are
rolling out  RUGBY TACKLING LIFE.  We currently have 2000 girls
and women playing Rugby in Uganda. We have identified 3 students in each of our
Rugby regions and we want to ensure that we keep them in school. We also
need to carry out rugby training clinics in various regions and hold rugby
tournaments. As much as we believe in women empowerment, we also include
boys and men who stand out in supporting us. For empowerment can only be
sustainable and a reality if all members of the society contribute.
How we are financing
RUGBY TACKLING LIFE?
In cooperation with Great Lakes Coffee Ltd, we developed our
very own COOFFEEE brand. For every bag we sell Great Lakes Coffee donates a
specific amount to us. The more bags we sell, the bigger our funds are to run
our programme.
We have already started selling
COOFFEE in Uganda but we think that we should not stop here because COOFFEEE is
super delicious AND everyone should have the opportunity to drink as much of it
as we do.
With this campaign we are aiming to raise the funds for our
RUGBY TACKLING LIFE  and start the distribution for COOFFFEEE so
that we are able to sustain our work.
MAKE YOUR DONATION, DRINK COOFFEEE, SUPPORT RUGBY TACKLING LIFE AND ALL RUGBY PLAYING GIRLS AND WOMEN IN UGANDA TO MAKE THE RIGHT CHOICES IN THEIR LIFES.

The gym and the project

Since 2007 I had a vision to set up a  rock climbing gym in Yerevan, so we would have a place to keep on climbing during winter season, as well to attract more people into climbing.  And finally, my friend Daniel Domingo supported my inspiration and we opened ""Boulder Town"" on Oct 2015 in downtown of Yerevan!

This was the greatest experience for rock climbing we ever had in Armenia. The efficiency of indoor climbing was obvious: youth who where already in climbing got significantly improved during this year, and the most important - more and more kids and youth came to try and got involved in Climbing Activity!
<div><span style=""background-color: initial
column2: >On the other hand the Armenian Alpine Club, which is a member federation of IFSC (International Federation of Sport Climbing) and UIAA, has counted on the gym where to prepare an Armenian National Climbing Teams (both for youth and adult), which would be representing Armenia in international competitions!

column1: <div><span style=""background-color: initial
column2: >Initially, when with Daniel we were planning the project, we knew that rock climbing is very new in Armenia, we would start hard and won't get a benefit from this project, or even bring back the investment. We considered that even if the gym covers its monthly expenses then we just would be happy that it exists and we have an indoor place to climb! :)

column1: <div>But for some reasons it didn't, and we had to close the gym on past Nov, after a year of working..  But it's OK, we gained a LOT!!!  Now we have an experience of building, managing and running a <span style=""background-color: initial

But it was not, so we know that we must work properly on advertisement in general, as well to collaborate with schools and universities.

Other Ways You Can Help

","The gym and the project

Since 2007 I had a vision to set up a  rock climbing gym in Yerevan, so we would have a place to keep on climbing during winter season, as well to attract more people into climbing.  And finally, my friend Daniel Domingo supported my inspiration and we opened ""Boulder Town"" on Oct 2015 in downtown of Yerevan!

This was the greatest experience for rock climbing we ever had in Armenia. The efficiency of indoor climbing was obvious: youth who where already in climbing got significantly improved during this year, and the most important - more and more kids and youth came to try and got involved in Climbing Activity!

On the other hand the Armenian Alpine Club, which is a member federation of IFSC (International Federation of Sport Climbing) and UIAA, has counted on the gym where to prepare an Armenian National Climbing Teams (both for youth and adult), which would be representing Armenia in international competitions!

Initially, when with Daniel we were planning the project, we knew that rock climbing is very new in Armenia, we would start hard and won't get a benefit from this project, or even bring back the investment. We considered that even if the gym covers its monthly expenses then we just would be happy that it exists and we have an indoor place to climb! :)

But for some reasons it didn't, and we had to close the gym on past Nov, after a year of working..  But it's OK, we gained a LOT!!!  Now we have an experience of building, managing and running a climbing gym in Armenia! And thanks to this first step we already know the local specifics and how it must be done, for which we only need your excitement and support to our project!
Analyzing: what we learned and what do we plan to do!

Rock climbing in Armenia is very new, especially as an indoor activity. But it must pass this natural period of enthusiasm and initiatives, after which indoor climbing will get popular and grown up! That shows the increasing feed back we have through fb messages and calls, people asking how can they come into our gym and about our conditions.

Lack of advertisement. We thought that a ""facebook group"" promotion would be enough as the most of youth hang out in internet today. We didn't even spend money to use fb ad service, thinking just tagging our visitors in pictures would be enough. But it was not, so we know that we must work properly on advertisement in general, as well to collaborate with schools and universities.

Small climbing surface (construction wall) and few climbing holds. The resources of our first step was merely enough to build a good climbing wall with overhanging and positive relief, although over 60sc/m is too small for the leisure visitors. As well very few 250 repetitive climbing holds get boring after 2-3 months climbing. So here is where we think the most of raised fund must go - for making the climbing wall larger around and on sealing, and to buy new climbing holds!

The high entrance fee. We had set up a flexible entrance fee: from 10.000 to 20.000 AMD for monthly fee and from 1.000 to 3.000 per day entrance. But the feed back from our visitors and from our social surveys showed that the entrance fee must be even less and more flexible, like 15.000 max and 2.000 max for monthly and daily fees.   As well for stimulating the visits we will have a special day in a week to open the doors for visitors free of charge!

Our gym was the first in Yerevan and it was not popular. But now they build another gym in State University and we heard that the other universities are also planing to do so. This fact for sure will stimulate the culture of indoor climbing and make it popular, interest to our business will grow among the society!
How will we use the money you have donated
If we inspired you enough to get our claimed sum, then:
The 8% + $25 will go for IndieGogo platform and bank transfer fees.
40% of the fund will go to climbing wall construction and crash pad (sponges & blanket) expenses.
35% of the fund will go for buying and importing new climbing holds.
The 10% of the fund will go to assistant workers (the main constructing I (have done) and will do myself volunteering).
And around 7% will go to advertising campaign such as facebook ads, brochures, TV or radio ads.

What if we get more than we claimed? It's fuckin amazing!!! we will have money to cover our regular expenses during first months such as: taxes, gym rent, salaries for gym manager and cleaner, communal expenses. Or to build some more climbing surfaces and get some more climbing holds!
column2: )What if we get less than we claimed?  Don't panic, it's still fine! We can still build some climbing sc/meters, buy some holds and our visitors will be even more happy

column1: How can ""Boulder Town"" make Armenia better if it starts working again?

The youth in Yerevan will have another option for amazing leisure, the kids will get involved in rock climbing and they will go for outdoors next. They will love the nature of Armenia, will take care of it. We will build together a nice climbing community with manures of respecting each other, responsibility for teamwork and team-safety. Tomorrow's athletes will born in this community who will go to IFSC international climbing championships with Armenian Alpine Club SNGO. Climbing and Mountaineering is our trade, so we try to make better Armenia this way, is't it amazing?
Risks & Challenges Our project has as much risks as anybody or any project else in this crazy world..))
Other Ways You Can Help Only share our project with people who know what is passion, pursuit, hard work and LUCK, and they will donate for us, be sure!

What is Yoke Fitness?

Yoke means connection

“To yoke” is the very definition of yoga. It means getting connected — to your body, your breath, your community, yourself. There are no limits. 

Right now, Yoke Fitness is a dream. With your support, it will become a Saint Paul-based fitness studio staffed by devoted, inclusive teachers that offers community- and self-empowering yoga and barre classes.

The word ""yoga” in Sanskrit translates to “to yoke” in English. We want students to “yoke” or connect to themselves, and to build connections outside themselves any way that they wish.

Yoke to your health

How do yoga and barre classes cultivate connections? At Yoke, we’re a community focused on more than pure athleticism or six pack abs: we want our yogis and barre-istas to feel physically strong and capable of anything they wish. That can translate into carrying in all the groceries in one trip, making it up the stairs more easily, and holding both children/grandchildren/furry-pet-children at the same time. Deeper connection to their physical body may help any student in our community create more connections to their minds, their emotions, and to others.

 

 

What will I experience at Yoke Fitness?

Our Space

Our single-room studio encourages connection to teachers and to other students. Our community is inclusive and encourages effort, understanding, acceptance, humor, curiosity and a welcoming group dynamic.  You’ll make many human connections here! Come upstairs, take off your coat, set aside your to-do list, and talk with the teacher about what you want to do in class.
The Experience

The way we all manage ourselves during physical challenge offers valuable insight to our coping mechanisms in other areas of life.  Yoke's classes will challenge your physical limits, and provide you with a safe space to reflect on your self-talk and knee-jerk responses during challenging moments.  Classes will move mindfully, intentionally, and specifically for each student.  Prior to class, our teaching staff will take requests from our students. Whether you have a specific request or not, our teachers will encourage you to try out different options and tailor class to your needs.

Our hope is that pairing improved physical fitness with greater self-understanding may lead you to improved connections in all areas of life. One connection often leads to another and another! #getyoked

 

 

What classes can I take at Yoke?

Yoga

We feature a non-religious, vinyasa-based practice at Yoke Fitness. You'll flow, balance, build strength, flexibility and spend focused time being still, and breathing. You're encouraged to reflect or concentrate if you wish to build a meditation practice — or to simply enjoy stillness in the midst of your busy day. At Yoke we're practicing moving with intention to facilitate greater health and strength!

Yoga offerings

Meld
• Slower-moving yoga class will feature minimal flow, longer holds, and the support of yoga props to enable you to customize your experience in postures.
• Class will include at least 10 minutes focused on breathing and reflection.
• Ideal for students who are new to yoga, and those who enjoy the discipline of holding postures longer.
Connect
• A more athletic yoga class that will flow!
• Class features balance, strength, and surrender in a faster-paced format.
• You'll be able to grow foundational knowledge you’ve gained in Meld, and find ways to challenge your physical abilities and mental focus.
• Ideal for those who wish to flow faster. Students of all levels are welcome — you're encouraged to modify class to meet your needs!

Barre

Experience the exhilarating feeling of hard work in this full-body workout.  This group fitness class will get your muscles trembling and help grow your strength based on your specific physical needs and wants. Barre is a fantastically accessible class format
column2:
triathletes and non-athletes with joint restrictions can practice side-by-side.

Barre offerings

Cleave

column1: • Based on a traditional barre class, this total body workout focuses on isolating muscle groups, with limited range of motion. You'll use light weights, a ballet barre and other accessories to fatigue all of your muscles while protecting your joints.
• Classes will include sections focused on lower body, upper body, core, stretching, and stillness.
• The limited range of motion and low-impact nature of this class makes it ideal for students of all experience and fitness levels.

What is my money funding?

We've worked hard to find the perfect space for Yoke Fitness! But we still need some things to make it into a beautiful, functional yoga and barre studio. When you contribute to this campaign, you're funding:

 

 

Why Yoke Fitness?

Yoke Fitness is a simple idea that grew into a big dream: an intimate, Saint Paul-based yoga and barre studio where students of all experience levels, body types, ages, and passions could come together to connect with each other and themselves. If you watched our campaign video (check it out above!), you've already met founder Lauren – with her skills and experience, our beautiful space, and the community of instructors and students-to-be that's already beginning to form, we believe now is the perfect time to make this dream a reality.

The Yoke Fitness Timeline

 

Meet the team

Lauren Hopps, Owner &
column2:
Founder

Hi! I’m Lauren. Long time athlete, and fitness enthusiast. I’m an MN native, and transplanted to St. Paul in 2013 and instantly fell in love with the ‘small town’ feel and community of St. Paul. I graduated from the University of Minnesota with a degree in clothing design (believe it or not) and took a job soon out of school at Target Corp. I learned the details of Excel grids, business analysis, and corporate politics there. I made many valuable human connections, developed lots of business and financial skill – and learned that big companies are not for me. During that time, I participated in my first 200hr RYT program. I had very little yoga experience and no intention of teaching, but thought that learning something new would add some fun back into my weekly routine. I discovered that I loved teaching! I love encouraging students and watching them expand their capabilities! While teaching, I slowly made a transition from my corporate job to yoga studio management. At the end of my tenure as a manager, I was overseeing goal setting and staff development of 9 studios, 21 managers, and nearly $4 million in revenue annually. I left to follow a dream – this dream – of opening a studio I could run myself. I’m passionate about creating a small, connected community of students and teachers.

 

Marisa Benasutti

Watching students learn to listen to themselves - finding modifications, knowing when to move deeper into or out of a pose - thrills me.

Vinyasa flow, barre, and barre fusion

  • Why I love teaching:

I love that yoga and barre are accessible to EVERYONE and my goal is to help clients achieve things they did not think they could because of various aches, pains or injuries.

  • Catchphrase:

Give yourself Grace

Molly Prokott

  • Training &

Formats:

200 hr RYT, Barre, Yoga Sculpt

  • Why I love teaching:

I have been practicing yoga for years, coming from a background in distance running and racing. As a teacher, my goal is to make classes accessible to everyone and to guide students to find and build strength, while at the same time having fun.

Amanda Napoles

column9:
formats:

Yoga, Barre, Cycle

  • Why I love teaching:

I love teaching because group fitness/classes have brought me so many benefits and I want to share those with my community. Fitness is important to me because it helps me feel confident in my skin. 

  • Catchphrase:

Your mind will quit before your body.

Drew Benson 

 

Molly Maher 

 

 

","What is Yoke Fitness?Yoke means connection“To yoke” is the very definition of yoga. It means getting connected — to your body, your breath, your community, yourself. There are no limits. Right now, Yoke Fitness is a dream. With your support, it will become a Saint Paul-based fitness studio staffed by devoted, inclusive teachers that offers community- and self-empowering yoga and barre classes.The word ""yoga” in Sanskrit translates to “to yoke” in English. We want students to “yoke” or connect to themselves, and to build connections outside themselves any way that they wish.Yoke to your healthHow do yoga and barre classes cultivate connections? At Yoke, we’re a community focused on more than pure athleticism or six pack abs: we want our yogis and barre-istas to feel physically strong and capable of anything they wish. That can translate into carrying in all the groceries in one trip, making it up the stairs more easily, and holding both children/grandchildren/furry-pet-children at the same time. Deeper connection to their physical body may help any student in our community create more connections to their minds, their emotions, and to others.  What will I experience at Yoke Fitness?Our SpaceOur single-room studio encourages connection to teachers and to other students. Our community is inclusive and encourages effort, understanding, acceptance, humor, curiosity and a welcoming group dynamic.  You’ll make many human connections here! Come upstairs, take off your coat, set aside your to-do list, and talk with the teacher about what you want to do in class.

column1: The Experience

The way we all manage ourselves during physical challenge offers valuable insight to our coping mechanisms in other areas of life.  Yoke's classes will challenge your physical limits, and provide you with a safe space to reflect on your self-talk and knee-jerk responses during challenging moments.  Classes will move mindfully, intentionally, and specifically for each student.  Prior to class, our teaching staff will take requests from our students. Whether you have a specific request or not, our teachers will encourage you to try out different options and tailor class to your needs.Our hope is that pairing improved physical fitness with greater self-understanding may lead you to improved connections in all areas of life. One connection often leads to another and another! #getyoked  What classes can I take at Yoke?YogaWe feature a non-religious, vinyasa-based practice at Yoke Fitness. You'll flow, balance, build strength, flexibility and spend focused time being still, and breathing. You're encouraged to reflect or concentrate if you wish to build a meditation practice — or to simply enjoy stillness in the midst of your busy day. At Yoke we're practicing moving with intention to facilitate greater health and strength!Yoga offeringsMeld
Slower-moving yoga class will feature minimal flow, longer holds, and the support of yoga props to enable you to customize your experience in postures.
Class will include at least 10 minutes focused on breathing and reflection.
Ideal for students who are new to yoga, and those who enjoy the discipline of holding postures longer.
Connect
A more athletic yoga class that will flow!
Class features balance, strength, and surrender in a faster-paced format.
You'll be able to grow foundational knowledge you’ve gained in Meld, and find ways to challenge your physical abilities and mental focus.
Ideal for those who wish to flow faster. Students of all levels are welcome — you're encouraged to modify class to meet your needs!

BarreExperience the exhilarating feeling of hard work in this full-body workout.  This group fitness class will get your muscles trembling and help grow your strength based on your specific physical needs and wants. Barre is a fantastically accessible class format
column2: triathletes and non-athletes with joint restrictions can practice side-by-side.Barre offeringsCleave

column1: Based on a traditional barre class, this total body workout focuses on isolating muscle groups, with limited range of motion. You'll use light weights, a ballet barre and other accessories to fatigue all of your muscles while protecting your joints.
Classes will include sections focused on lower body, upper body, core, stretching, and stillness.
The limited range of motion and low-impact nature of this class makes it ideal for students of all experience and fitness levels.

What is my money funding?We've worked hard to find the perfect space for Yoke Fitness! But we still need some things to make it into a beautiful, functional yoga and barre studio. When you contribute to this campaign, you're funding:  Why Yoke Fitness?Yoke Fitness is a simple idea that grew into a big dream: an intimate, Saint Paul-based yoga and barre studio where students of all experience levels, body types, ages, and passions could come together to connect with each other and themselves. If you watched our campaign video (check it out above!), you've already met founder Lauren – with her skills and experience, our beautiful space, and the community of instructors and students-to-be that's already beginning to form, we believe now is the perfect time to make this dream a reality.The Yoke Fitness Timeline Meet the teamLauren Hopps, Owner & FounderHi! I’m Lauren. Long time athlete, and fitness enthusiast. I’m an MN native, and transplanted to St. Paul in 2013 and instantly fell in love with the ‘small town’ feel and community of St. Paul. I graduated from the University of Minnesota with a degree in clothing design (believe it or not) and took a job soon out of school at Target Corp. I learned the details of Excel grids, business analysis, and corporate politics there. I made many valuable human connections, developed lots of business and financial skill – and learned that big companies are not for me. During that time, I participated in my first 200hr RYT program. I had very little yoga experience and no intention of teaching, but thought that learning something new would add some fun back into my weekly routine. I discovered that I loved teaching! I love encouraging students and watching them expand their capabilities! While teaching, I slowly made a transition from my corporate job to yoga studio management. At the end of my tenure as a manager, I was overseeing goal setting and staff development of 9 studios, 21 managers, and nearly $4 million in revenue annually. I left to follow a dream – this dream – of opening a studio I could run myself. I’m passionate about creating a small, connected community of students and teachers. Marisa BenasuttiTraining & formats:200 hr RYT, Yin Yoga, BarreWhy I love teaching:I'm passionate about teaching yoga because it brings many people together on their journey of reclaiming their own health.Catchphrase:Find a place that's comfortably uncomfortableKate JahnkeTraining & formats:Vinyasa, barreWhy I love teaching:My classes are upbeat and challenging, while still making each student feel they are just where they should be on their own journey. I hope that you leave your mat feeling stronger and more grounded than when you arrived. Alyssa AdkinsTraining & formats:200 hr RTY-Power YogaWhy I love teaching: As a teacher, I try to create a brave, supportive space for students to take risks. In class, I will encourage each student to explore not just their physical body but their mental and emotional bodies as well. Watching students learn to listen to themselves - finding modifications, knowing when to move deeper into or out of a pose - thrills me. Darcy MeyerTraining & formats:Vinyasa yogaWhy I love teaching:Each journey to my mat brings a sense of achievement, which is something I hope to share with others through leading practice. I enjoy keeping class high energy and fun!Catchphrase: It is time to get a little bit stubborn!Krista BednarTraining & formats:Vinyasa flow, barre, and barre fusionWhy I love teaching:I love that yoga and barre are accessible to EVERYONE and my goal is to help clients achieve things they did not think they could because of various aches, pains or injuries.Catchphrase:Give yourself GraceMolly ProkottTraining & Formats:200 hr RYT, Barre, Yoga SculptWhy I love teaching:I have been practicing yoga for years, coming from a background in distance running and racing. As a teacher, my goal is to make classes accessible to everyone and to guide students to find and build strength, while at the same time having fun.Amanda Napoles Training & formats:Yoga, Barre, CycleWhy I love teaching:I love teaching because group fitness/classes have brought me so many benefits and I want to share those with my community. Fitness is important to me because it helps me feel confident in my skin. Catchphrase:Your mind will quit before your body.Drew Benson  Molly Maher",15.0,0,"1 Campaign

About Co-Inventors – Brothers Mike
and Chris Trifaro
We began our quest to build an adult
size tricycle so people of all ages could share riding with their family
safely, and comfortably.  Mike and
Chris met with Arnold Kamler, President of Kent Bicycles. who helped bring their
prototype to what is now the NuvoTrike.

Mike is a Physical Therapist who believes that all individuals should maintain mobility and enjoy exercise throughout their lifetime.  Mike brought the idea of the trike to Chris who is a Grade A Mechanic/Auto Machinist.  Chris machined the parts, which  allowed for the assembly of the prototype.
We need contributors to assist us
with the funding for the first round of production.  This will help us to make our trike available to the public
as soon as possible.
What is special about our trike?
·
Our trike has a unique, patented
suspension system that minimizes shock and gives riders a more comfortable
riding experience over a variety of surfaces.
·
Our trike has the maneuverability
allowing navigation through tight surfaces.  This is because our design has a front wheel that is 1.5x
the diameter of the rear wheels.
Also is front wheel drive.
·
Our trike has a front, free wheel
mechanism that allows for coasting – making the ride easier and more accessible
for a variety of ages, sizes, and ability levels.
·
Our trike has the ability to fold, making it easy to put into a car for transport to your adventure of choice.
It is everything above, and MORE!
·
We made it AFFORDABLE!!
This
way many more people will be able to enjoy the benefits of our one of a kind design!
Any amount of money will make a
difference for our cause.
For a donation of:
$15 – you will get a water
bottle
$35 – you will get a promotional T-shirt
$199 – you will get your own NuvoTrike!
and

shipping within the United States is FREE!  

     * contact us regarding international shipping rates *

Help support our cause...  We need you!
If our goal of $100,000 is not met,
we will put whatever monies we raise toward producing as many trikes as we can.
Thank you :D
