SUMMARY
HI My name is David Wilson, after many years in production engineering in many countries I have finally settled in Vietnam.
Vietnam grows some of the finest dragon fruit in the world, when dragon fruit is processed into concentrate it makes a refreshing and enervating drink with many health benefits.
We are producing concentrate for the local market and it is already well received.
We wish to expand our facilities to enable us to enter the global market and this project will create many jobs for local people and help the farmers to sell their products locally.
We are totally committed to this project because it will help the the local population and increase the quality of their lives as well as giving an exotic new taste to the world.

Contributors will enable an impoverished workforce to advance themselves and better provide for their families, it will also help in education as we are offering services freely to the local agricultural college in the form of engineering safety and basic English language courses.
We need to raise $300.000 to buy land build and equip the plant,
This may not seem much but fortunately we have been offered very good terms on the land by the local government
We will purchase production equipment in country, use local labour for the build and installation.
Marketing will be a priority during the lead time in the plant

When we start to produce in quantity we will issue gifts in the form of thank you certificates, T-shirts, delicate 3d greetings cards suitable for birthdays anniversaries etc, limited edition dragon fruit red or white wine and for donations over a certain amount the opportunity to become a stakeholder in the new company.
If we do not reach our entire goal the plan is to rent a factory until we are in a position to buy.

For the people of the dragon fruit growing area this project represents a major boost to the local economy, the world at large will benefit from and enjoy a unique new tropical taste that is beneficial on so many levels.
The product is totally natural and its manufacture poses no threat to the ecology of the earth
Risks &
column2:
Challenges

As with all investments there are risks but by purchasing the land for this project the equity is secured in the land.
There is a lot of bureaucracy involved in the setting up of this project due to the nature of local politics but after spending many years here we are well used to dealing with it and it does not really pose a problem  
Any problems with bureaucracy that may occur can be overcome by patient negotiation with the local authorities with whom we have an excellent rapport.

column1: TEN GREAT BENEFITS OF
DRAGON FRUIT
Cardiovascular
The seeds in dragon fruit are high
in polyunsaturated fatty acids (omega-3 and omega-6 fatty acids). These healthy
fats actually help reduce triglycerides and lower the risk of cardiovascular disease.
Dragon fruit also contains vitamin B3 which lowers our bad (LDL) cholesterol
levels while raising our good (HDL) cholesterol levels. Additionally, dragon
fruit is known to help decrease high levels of oxidative stress, one of the
main contributing factors in cardiovascular disease.
Cancer
Dragon fruit is loaded with
beneficial antioxidants like phytoalbumins (located mainly within the seeds)
which aid in the prevention of cancer-causing free radicals. They also contain
high levels of vitamin C, which helps to block tumour cell growth, and can
improve quality of life of patients currently suffering from cancer (reduced
symptoms like fatigue, nausea, vomiting, pain and appetite loss). Dragon fruit
can also help rid the body of toxic heavy metals, which are a major culprit in
the formation of tumours in the body.
Digestion and metabolism
Dragon fruit is incredibly high in
fibre! I can personally eat 2-3 dragon fruits and be satisfied for hours on end
(I was actually quite surprised to feel so full after such little fruit!). The
fibre content in dragon fruit helps regulate our digestion and prevents
constipation and diarrhea. Keeping your stomach full for hours after you have
eaten is one issue facing those who want to lose weight. This exotic fruit will
not only keep you satisfied for longer periods of time, but it will help
improve your metabolic rate, assisting with weight management. Dragon fruit
also helps regulate blood sugar levels (again, due to the high fibre content),
and helps your body from experiencing sugar spikes that you would normally get
from eating refined sugary sweets (donuts, cakes, cookies, etc.).
Immune support
The high vitamin and mineral content
in dragon fruit, ranging from Vitamin’s C, B1, B2, B3, as well as calcium,
phosphorous, iron, protein, niacin and fibre, make it a great way to improve
the functioning of your immune system. Your immune system starts in your
digestive tract, and as we saw above, dragon fruit is a great way to support a
healthy GI tract. Getting a proper amount of vitamins and minerals in your diet
helps prevent you from getting sick and catching infections. As well,
antioxidants (which dragon fruit is loaded), can help fight off bacteria and
viruses in the body. The 80% water content of dragon fruit will also help flush
out stagnant toxins, which may otherwise manifest as some sort of disease or
illness (either now or in the future).
Eyes
Improved eyesight from eating dragon
fruit? You bet! This fruit contains Vitamin A in the form of carotene
which is needed by the retina of the eye for both low-light (night vision) and
colour vision. Night blindness and other eye problems such as age-related
macular degeneration can be caused by a deficiency in Vitamin A.
Nervous system
The high B Vitamin content in dragon
fruit helps to support the formation and maintenance of some of the most basic
structures in the nervous system. It helps in the formation of nerve cells
themselves, and makes us more alert, and experience higher levels of mental
clarity. Calcium in dragon fruit is also essential in enhancing the functioning
of the nervous system. It keeps our nerves healthy and ensures their ability to
communicate effectively. The healthy fats in dragon fruit are also crucial to
help nourish and protect the myelin sheath which allows for proper conductive
signalling in the brain.
Strong bones and teeth
Because it is a good source of
calcium and phosphorous, dragon fruit helps strengthen your bones and teeth and
aids in tissue formation and repair. These two important nutrients work
together closely to build strong bones and teeth, which makes dragon fruit a
wonderful fruit to help aid in the prevention of brittle bones and
osteoporosis. The co-dependency of these two minerals means that taking a
calcium supplement simply won’t help the health of your bones, as would drinking
a whole ripe fruit juice which contains the combination of the two minerals.
Always keep in mind that both calcium and phosphorous are needed to
support any increase in bone mass.
Glowing skin
The high seed content in dragon
fruit makes them a great source of healthy monounsaturated fats which improve
the look and feel of our skin. Pretty much all fruit is antioxidant rich,
including dragon fruit, and so consuming a diet rich in raw plant-based foods
will stave off free radicals and make you not only look younger, but make your
skin tighter, more flexible and bless you with a beautiful healthy glow!
Anti-inflammatory
Dragon fruit is known as a great
anti-inflammatory as it helps to decrease irritation of the joints.
Inflammation in the body caused by unhealthy eating habits and poor lifestyle
choices (smoking, alcohol, drugs, etc.) create an acidic environment which
manifests as a variety of diseases like arthritis, cancer, and diabetes to name
a few. When we start to replace healthy drinks, like dragon fruit, for
unhealthy drinks (like sweets and refined processed drinks), we will notice
that the aches and pains that used to haunt us day in, day out, suddenly fade
away. Replacing your favourite sugary desserts for things like dragon fruit and
mango (or any other fruit) will help get you out of your sugar-tooth rut and
improve your body for the better.
Anti-aging
Skip the anti-aging cream, save
thousands of dollars, and instead go eat dragon fruit! The high vitamin and
mineral content as well as vast arrays of antioxidants in the dragon fruit make
it an excellent anti-ager! The antioxidants work against free radicals in the
body which are responsible for not only physical ailments (disease, and
illness), but also for the aging of your skin. The more fresh fruit and
vegetables you consume, the tighter and younger your skin will become.

And that's all there is to it.

0,"<div class=""routerContentStory-storyBody"" data-v-1df7bf5a=""""><div> <h3>
<span style=""letter-spacing: 0px

Urinary incontinence is a significant threat to the quality of life for people with autism spectrum disorder, jeopardizing autonomy, community inclusion, physical comfort, hygiene, and peer acceptance. Our studies have shown that as many as 35% of children with autism are not using the toilet for urination by age 5. Considering this, it is evident that a training method that increases the rate of toileting skill acquisition while decreasing stress is greatly needed.
Daniel Mruzek, Ph.D., Associate Professor of Neurodevelopmental &
column2: Behavioral Pediatrics at the University of Rochester has developed a method that is expected to result in faster, less anxiety-producing toilet training for children with autism spectrum disorder. Big diaper companies aren't interested in speeding up toilet training and a startup company needs to convince investors that this system can be easily mass-produced for the consumer market.

column1: We are hoping to raise enough money to make some important changes to the system. We want to make it easier to manufacture the components and easier to use so more families can experience toilet training success.

Clinical research has shown that our methods and system really work and can make toilet training children with autism easier and less stressful, both for the child as well as for the caregiver. But, if the system isn't comfortable, easy to use, and -- above all -- affordable to produce, what's the point?

Our system has three components: a disposable sensor, a reusable transmitter, and an app for a smart phone (or similar device). When the disposable sensor detects moisture, a signal is transmitted to the app to alert the caregiver. The caregiver then knows to employ Dr. Mruzek's training methods. With progress, the child learns to hold his or her urine until they are ready to go on the toilet . . . providing opportunities to reward successful toilet use.

The weak link in the system is the disposable sensor and its interface with the transmitter. Currently, the sensor is assembled by hand in a very labor-intensive process. It connects (physically and electrically) to the transmitter via snaps. These snaps can be difficult to detach, especially when the sensor pad is wet.

column4: >We have been given quotes by an engineering design firm to redesign the sensor pad and the sensor/transmitter interface. Toilet training a child can be a challenging undertaking. Toilet training a child with autism can be extremely challenging and frustrating for everyone involved. We have a technology and related training method that may very well be more effective and less stressful than standard intervention techniques.

We believe that children with autism and their caregivers will benefit from this user-friendly method if it were publicly available. Your generous donation will help us prove that what we have makes business sense, as well as good sense for young learners with autism and their families. If we can show that an effective and affordable product can come out of this, we will be able to find a partner to manufacture, market, and distribute this helpful device.
Risks &

They took first place, so we believe we are on the right track. We think that people see value in this project. Dr. Mruzek has the data that proves that his system and method are effective. He is currently performing a three-site clinical project to assist families with toilet training their children and to assess the state of the technology. This is the perfect time to introduce improvements to the devices.

column1:
Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't make a donation you can still help by spreading the word about our campaign.
","Short Summary

Urinary incontinence is a significant threat to the quality of life for people with autism spectrum disorder, jeopardizing autonomy, community inclusion, physical comfort, hygiene, and peer acceptance. Our studies have shown that as many as 35% of children with autism are not using the toilet for urination by age 5. Considering this, it is evident that a training method that increases the rate of toileting skill acquisition while decreasing stress is greatly needed.

Daniel Mruzek, Ph.D., Associate Professor of Neurodevelopmental & Behavioral Pediatrics at the University of Rochester has developed a method that is expected to result in faster, less anxiety-producing toilet training for children with autism spectrum disorder. Big diaper companies aren't interested in speeding up toilet training and a startup company needs to convince investors that this system can be easily mass-produced for the consumer market.

We are hoping to raise enough money to make some important changes to the system. We want to make it easier to manufacture the components and easier to use so more families can experience toilet training success.
What We're Asking For

Clinical research has shown that our methods and system really work and can make toilet training children with autism easier and less stressful, both for the child as well as for the caregiver. But, if the system isn't comfortable, easy to use, and -- above all -- affordable to produce, what's the point?

Our system has three components: a disposable sensor, a reusable transmitter, and an app for a smart phone (or similar device). When the disposable sensor detects moisture, a signal is transmitted to the app to alert the caregiver. The caregiver then knows to employ Dr. Mruzek's training methods. With progress, the child learns to hold his or her urine until they are ready to go on the toilet . . . providing opportunities to reward successful toilet use.

The weak link in the system is the disposable sensor and its interface with the transmitter. Currently, the sensor is assembled by hand in a very labor-intensive process. It connects (physically and electrically) to the transmitter via snaps. These snaps can be difficult to detach, especially when the sensor pad is wet.

We have been given quotes by an engineering design firm to redesign the sensor pad and the sensor/transmitter interface. The newly designed sensor will be mass-producible, which will lower the overall cost of the product, and it will have a more user-friendly way to connect to the transmitter. Cost: ~$26,000.

Once the sensor is redesigned, we will need to re-engineer the transmitter to interact with it. Fortunately, Stephen McAleavey, Ph.D., Associate Professor of Biomedical, Electrical and Computer Engineering at the University of Rochester (and co-inventor of the Quick Trainer system) will be able to do most of the work to produce the transmitters necessary to complete the current research project. Cost: ~$4,000.
The remaining $2,000 we are asking for will cover the cost of modifications to the app.
All money raised by this
campaign, less credit card processing fees and Indiegogo's modest platform
fees, will be given to the University of Rochester's Technology Development Fund and earmarked for use solely for the development of this project.
The Impact

Toilet training a child can be a challenging undertaking. Toilet training a child with autism can be extremely challenging and frustrating for everyone involved. We have a technology and related training method that may very well be more effective and less stressful than standard intervention techniques.

We believe that children with autism and their caregivers will benefit from this user-friendly method if it were publicly available. Your generous donation will help us prove that what we have makes business sense, as well as good sense for young learners with autism and their families. If we can show that an effective and affordable product can come out of this, we will be able to find a partner to manufacture, market, and distribute this helpful device.

Risks & Challenges A team of entrepreneurial students at the State University at Geneseo recently presented the Quick Trainer device at a state-wide business plan competition. They took first place, so we believe we are on the right track. We think that people see value in this project. Dr. Mruzek has the data that proves that his system and method are effective. He is currently performing a three-site clinical project to assist families with toilet training their children and to assess the state of the technology. This is the perfect time to introduce improvements to the devices.

However, there is always the chance that we will fail. Of course, that's not the end of the world. If we fail to prove that we can turn this method into a practical product, then we will have proven that our ideas and assumptions were inaccurate. In this case, it is far better to try and fail than not to try and never know if we could have made a difference in people's lives.
Other Ways You Can Help If you can't make a donation you can still help by spreading the word about our campaign.",5.0,0,"1 Campaign

defenses and good oral health care, such as daily brushing and flossing, can
keep these bacteria under control. However, without proper oral hygiene,
bacteria can reach levels that might lead to oral infections, such as tooth

decay and gum disease. According to the American Academy of Periodontology, gum disease has now been linked to diabetes, endocarditis, cardiovascular disease, respiratory disease, osteoporosis, and some cancers. There is a clear connection between oral health and systemic health.

2. Will 30 Second Smile cause Abrasion?

column5: >Automated Optimum Pressure PLUS Short Stroke = Zero Abrasion

column1: <div style=""text-align: center
<div>
Using traditional single headed brushes, you may often wonder how much
pressure you should be applying. Brushing too vigorously and / or with too much
pressure can cause abrasion, and can also cause the gums to recede and exposes
root surfaces. It also wears down the tooth structure. When using 30SS, it is
impossible to exert too much pressure or brush too vigorously, because the user

is exerting ZERO force. There is no abrasion because the short stroke action doesn't allow the bristles to move back and forth and sweep over the teeth and gums, instead the tips of the bristles make contact in one spot therefore touching and flex only the amount of the stroke. Additionally, the advanced, wrap-around head configuration provides
automated, EQUALIZED gentle pressure on the inner and outer surfaces. The
result: no chance of tooth or gum abrasion. The 'arms' of the
brush head flex, to provide the perfect pressure for both the front (thinner)
teeth, as well as the molars. The resilient arms provide a pressure that is not
too aggressive to cause abrasion. With all other brushes, the pressure applied
by user can be too high.  1/4""
stroke vs 1"" with a manual brush.
Sonic technology?

No, 30 Second Smile  is a totally new technology. Toothbrushes have been around for a long time, and unfortunately, so have cavities and gum disease. The primary cause of cavities and gum disease is improper brushing (human error). Numerous studies show that if a person brushes properly and removes the bacterial plaque from the teeth and along the gum lines, they will significantly reduce the potential for cavities or gum disease.

The secret to high quality oral care is not bristles moving at ""Sonic Speed"". The solution is to use the proper technique to ensure every surface of every tooth is cleansed and the gums properly massaged.  “Can’t make a mistake” technology by 30 Second Smile automatically ensures proper oral care with its patented microbrushes, each and every use. You simply bite and guide, and receive the level of oral care you need, in 1/4th the time required by all other power toothbrushes, and 1/6th the time of any manual brush.

column1: it or not this is not a bad sign. Prior to using 30 Second Smile, most people do not

Second Smile is designed to reach the neglected or hard to reach areas of the

should be used initially while 30 Second Smile restores your gums to health.
After that, you can use the Standard Soft Brushes for a more penetrating

column5: >13. Can 30 Second Smile cause gum recession?
>No.  Most people have some level of

column1: gingivitis which is the early stage of gum disease.  Due to plaque
irritation and infection of the gum tissue, swelling and inflammation may be
present
Smile.  When infected, the gum tissue often feels and appears to be red,
spongy, or puffy.  The amazing cleaning qualities of 30 Second Smile will
penetrate under the gums and between the teeth much better.  As a result,
you may experience bleeding initially for several days… up to perhaps a
week.  After this time, the swelling will likely go down, and thus the
gums will become pink, tight, and healthier.
As gum inflammation is reduced, it reveals more of the tooth, which
should not be confused with gum recession.
This is gum restoration to better health.

column5: >We currently have fifteen issued patents and four pending patent applications. This strong foundation will help us reach global markets.

column3: >As with any project, there are inherent risks. We have developed a high-level mitigation strategy to reduce the probability of occurrence

column1: Risk: Production costs of the final product will be too high.

Mitigation:  We are establishing two vendors for the product in our supply chain. This will keep the cost low via a competitive atmosphere. In addition, we are building multi-cavity tooling that will certainly reduce our overall cost of goods.
Risk: Tooling development will take longer than expected.

Mitigation:  We have experience with the single-cavity tooling that produced prior versions of the product. We will replicate those test molds by duplicating the successful cavity design within the multi-cavity molds.  In addition, we will utilize mold-flow analysis software tools to predict as near as possible, the efficiency of the multi-cavity molds.
Risk: Product will not pass quality control standards.

Mitigation: Hydrabrush Inc. (manufacturer of 30 Second Smile) is a fully certified ISO 13485 company.  We intend to utilize every tool at our disposal as mandated within our ISO quality assurance capabilities to mitigate manufacturing error.  As well, we will demand that our supply line vendors adhere to our strict ISO 13485 quality guidelines.

life to designing and perfecting a power toothbrush that is effective, safe, easy to
use, and eliminates human error. His work has been validated by over 15 patents

and numerous clinical studies proving its efficacy and superiority. By simply using 30 Second Smile, today he doesn't have a trace of gum disease. No deep cleaning, no surgery, no medication, just brushing with 30 Second Smile.
His dream is for ALL

people, worldwide, to experience the improvement he had to his oral and systemic health by just brushing with 30 Second Smile.  The reward for helping us make it happen across the globe will be truly fulfilling for you PLUS if you a select a toothbrush perk, YOU will begin to change your own oral and over-all health.
Let’s make something
clear. 30 Second Smile is not a brand new product. In fact, we have been
selling 30 Second Smile toothbrushes since 2010. The original model consisted
of the same brush head design we have today, but the handle required two AA
Batteries. We had two versions of that, one which included 2 AA Alkaline
batteries and one which included 2 AA NiMH rechargeable batteries plus a wall
charger. We sold these units through a test market for 3 years. We were very
successful in this market and wanted to expand so we continued to add to our
product line and designed an induction unit (one where you just place the
handle into the charging stand and the unit will automatically start charging).
We also added a UV Sanitizing unit with induction charging.
Just
like any other successful company, we strive to listen to what our customers
want and then make changes accordingly in order to satisfy our customers.
We have hundreds of positive testimonials from users and dental professionals. People love brushing with 30 Second Smile.
Click here to read TESTIMONIALS
We have a sincere goal to make a difference worldwide not only for oral health but overall health. To move forward and really expand our product
line to reach millions of consumers WORLDWIDE, there are a few improvements and design
adjustments we need to implement.
Your
contribution to this campaign will help forge home dental care into a new way
of thinking by helping us to: Increase production, improve supply chain, and
make some minor design improvements resulting in the betterment of oral health
worldwide.
Re-tooling for high production
and improve supply chain
Product Redesign and Tooling
Improve Timer Mechanism
Improve Charging Module by making it USB compatible and more Petite
WHAT'S A PERFECT SMILE WORTH TO YOU?
1. Will 30 Second Smile Fit in my mouth?
Absolutely! 30 Second Smile is surprisingly comfortable. Here is how it compares to a regular toothbrush.
2. Will 30 Second Smile cause Abrasion?
NOPE!  Automated Optimum Pressure PLUS Short Stroke = Zero Abrasion
Using traditional single headed brushes, you may often wonder how much
pressure you should be applying. Brushing too vigorously and / or with too much
pressure can cause abrasion, and can also cause the gums to recede and exposes
root surfaces. It also wears down the tooth structure. When using 30SS, it is
impossible to exert too much pressure or brush too vigorously, because the user

is exerting ZERO force. There is no abrasion because the short stroke action doesn't allow the bristles to move back and forth and sweep over the teeth and gums, instead the tips of the bristles make contact in one spot therefore touching and flex only the amount of the stroke. Additionally, the advanced, wrap-around head configuration provides
automated, EQUALIZED gentle pressure on the inner and outer surfaces. The
result: no chance of tooth or gum abrasion. The 'arms' of the
brush head flex, to provide the perfect pressure for both the front (thinner)
teeth, as well as the molars. The resilient arms provide a pressure that is not
too aggressive to cause abrasion. With all other brushes, the pressure applied
by user can be too high.  1/4""
stroke vs 1"" with a manual brush.3. Does 30 Second Smile use
Sonic technology?

No, 30 Second Smile  is a totally new technology. Toothbrushes have been around for a long time, and unfortunately, so have cavities and gum disease. The primary cause of cavities and gum disease is improper brushing (human error). Numerous studies show that if a person brushes properly and removes the bacterial plaque from the teeth and along the gum lines, they will significantly reduce the potential for cavities or gum disease.

The secret to high quality oral care is not bristles moving at ""Sonic Speed"". The solution is to use the proper technique to ensure every surface of every tooth is cleansed and the gums properly massaged.  “Can’t make a mistake” technology by 30 Second Smile automatically ensures proper oral care with its patented microbrushes, each and every use. You simply bite and guide, and receive the level of oral care you need, in 1/4th the time required by all other power toothbrushes, and 1/6th the time of any manual brush.
4. Is 30 Second Smile safe
for children, and does it require any special brushes?
Not
only do we have special brushes specifically designed for kids, but clinical studies have shown 30
Second Smile to be totally safe for anyone
seeking a higher quality of oral hygiene. We hear from parents all the time,
who tell us their kids love using 30 Second Smile. More
importantly, parents tell us that they love 30 Second Smile because they no
longer have to stand over their children to make sure they are properly
brushing their teeth.
They
tell us, ""If I hear the 30 Second Smile, I know my child is getting proper
oral care.""  And that is what we
call, ""The 30 Second Smile Difference.""  With 30 Second Smile, kids receive a proper
brushing
column2: with other products they (and often their parents) have to do the

column1: work. The patented multi-micro heads are ideal for children's use. They are
small enough to easily fit into their mouth, and 30 Second Smile is safe and
easy to use.
5. How often do I need to
replace the heads?
Brush
heads should be replaced every 90 days. This is an industry-wide standard because
after a few months, bristles start to become splayed and frayed, and consequently
become much less effective over time.
Not
only are old brush-heads ineffective, they may harbor harmful bacteria. Sick
people should change their brush-heads at the beginning of an illness and after
they feel better.
6. How will 30 Second Smile
benefit my family?
Second Smile is ideal for all members of the family - young children (ages 5+), teens,
college students, adults and aging adults. Oral care is a vital part of our
overall health.  In fact, the US Surgeon
General stated in 2003, ""If your mouth is not healthy, your body will not
be healthy.""  With 30 Second
Smile, every member of your family will receive proper oral care daily. Often times, aging adults may have
a problem using a traditional toothbrush to properly brush.  30 Second Smile will do the job for them.  And that means whiter teeth, healthier gums,
fresher breath, and better overall health for all family members.  It also means a better partnership with your
dental professional. And while this can
mean great savings in dental bills, the ultimate prize is better health and
a family with bright, beautiful, healthy smiles.
7. Do I need toothpaste?
All
you need is to apply a pea-sized dollop of toothpaste to each side
(top and bottom), right where the angled bristles meet.  The toothpaste applied via the effective
brushing action of 30 Second Smile will assist in removing the bacterial plaque and stains.
8. How can I clean my
tongue?
Second Smile comes with a tongue cleaner.
9. Can I use only one head?
No.
It is essential that both heads are used, because the
movement of each head reciprocates and  balances the movement of the other,
making it possible for all six surfaces of the teeth to be cleaned
simultaneously while also massaging the gums.
The
brush heads attach to the handle via metal pins.  If both heads are not attached, one of the
pins would be exposed, and will cause damage to the teeth or gums.
10. Braces - does it clean
effectively around and under braces?
We
have an Orthodontic-specific brush head.  Most
people who wear braces find it difficult to maneuver a conventional
single-headed brush around the braces. The 30 Second Smile Ortho head makes the task easy and effective. See video demo:
11. Can I take it in the
shower?
Using 30 Second Smile in the shower will void the warranty.
12. My gums are bleeding! What's happening?
Believe
it or not this is not a bad sign. Prior to using 30 Second Smile, most people do not
take the time nor exercise the dexterity to maneuver a single headed power or
manual brush in such a way that they clean all surfaces of the teeth and
massage the gums. When the teeth are not properly cleansed and the gums are not massaged,  the gums can become inflamed or infected.
Second Smile is designed to reach the neglected or hard to reach areas of the
gums. As a result, the user can experience some bleeding when these inflamed or
infected areas are stimulated, during the first two or three days of use.
With continued use of 30 Second Smile, the neglected area(s) of the gums will be
restored to health, and bleeding and any discomfort (which is negligible) will
cease. To assist you in restoring your gums to a higher level of health, every 30
Second Smile comes with Ultra Soft RED BRISTLES. The Ultra Soft Red Bristles
should be used initially while 30 Second Smile restores your gums to health.
After that, you can use the Standard Soft Brushes for a more penetrating
cleansing of the teeth and gum massage.
13. Can 30 Second Smile cause gum recession?
No.  Most people have some level of
gingivitis which is the early stage of gum disease.  Due to plaque
irritation and infection of the gum tissue, swelling and inflammation may be
present prior to using 30 Second
Smile.  When infected, the gum tissue often feels and appears to be red,
spongy, or puffy.  The amazing cleaning qualities of 30 Second Smile will
penetrate under the gums and between the teeth much better.  As a result,
you may experience bleeding initially for several days… up to perhaps a
week.  After this time, the swelling will likely go down, and thus the
gums will become pink, tight, and healthier.
As gum inflammation is reduced, it reveals more of the tooth, which
should not be confused with gum recession.
This is gum restoration to better health.
14. Can I use this brush with crowns and bridges?
There
are two types of ""bridges"": fixed, and removable.  A fixed partial denture is a
bridge""  and is permanently cemented in the mouth to replace
missing teeth
column2: a removable partial denture is a ""partial"" and

column1: can be placed in and taken out.
Because
it is retained by metal clasps around the teeth, our dental professional
associates advice is for users is to remove
the bridge before using 30 Second Smile, to prevent dislodging of the
partial and to prevent the bristles from getting caught under the retention
clasps, and coming out.
15. Which brush head is right for me?
-Kids
should use the brush specifically designed for kids.  First-time users should start with the Ultra
Soft (red) brushes.
- Red bristles identify the Ultra
Soft head…designed for 1st time users, and users with sensitive teeth and/or
gums.  These brushes should be used when you initially start using 30 Second Smile.
- Light-blue bristles identify the
Soft heads - delivering less sensitive users a good cleaning while remaining
gentle
- Extra Reach has an extra row of
bristles, enabling users with gum recession (or larger teeth) to still clean
the gumline.  Users without recession report superior gum stimulation as a
result of the extra row of bristles reaching higher on the gums.
16. Are the bristles soft?
Yes
- in fact, our standard soft is softer than typical soft brushes found on other
toothbrushes.  We also have an Ultra Soft
brush for people with very sensitive gums.
17. Color in the bristles -
what is it made from?
All
bristle colors used comply with US Federal Drug Administration Regulation 21
CFR 178.3297 - colorant levels below 1% by weight and no heavy metal based
pigments. All plastics and filaments have been tested for extraction and no
significant colorant extraction shown. All colors comply with all applicable
standards in Europe and to the US Food, Drug and Cosmetic Act.
18. Is the technology patented?
We currently have fifteen issued patents and four pending patent applications. This strong foundation will help us reach global markets.
As with any project, there are inherent risks. We have developed a high-level mitigation strategy to reduce the probability of occurrence.
Risk: Production costs of the final product will be too high.

Mitigation:  We are establishing two vendors for the product in our supply chain. This will keep the cost low via a competitive atmosphere. In addition, we are building multi-cavity tooling that will certainly reduce our overall cost of goods.
Risk: Tooling development will take longer than expected.

Mitigation:  We have experience with the single-cavity tooling that produced prior versions of the product. We will replicate those test molds by duplicating the successful cavity design within the multi-cavity molds.  In addition, we will utilize mold-flow analysis software tools to predict as near as possible, the efficiency of the multi-cavity molds.
Risk: Product will not pass quality control standards.

Mitigation: Hydrabrush Inc. (manufacturer of 30 Second Smile) is a fully certified ISO 13485 company.  We intend to utilize every tool at our disposal as mandated within our ISO quality assurance capabilities to mitigate manufacturing error.  As well, we will demand that our supply line vendors adhere to our strict ISO 13485 quality guidelines.",23.0,1,"1 Campaign
|","Escondido, United States",https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/fastest-and-most-effective-toothbrush-ever/pica

","THIS IS THE PRODUCTION VERSION OF MiPAL.

Hello, My name is Alvin, 74 , 3 Children, 10 grandchildren, married to Diane for 48 years. All my life I have been involved in making real practical things, coming up with simple ideas to solve everyday problems.

I live near Melbourne which some say is the world's most liveable city! Unfortunately we still have violent assaults here, especially violence against women, two recent deaths especially distressed me, they were walking home alone when they were killed. I thought about how a personal alarm could have helped save them. I really believe if Jill and Maca had been wearing my alarm, the tragic outcome would have been different.
So my dream and the campaign goal is to make MiPAL available to  vulnerable members of our community and hopefully provide a great level of personal safety and security. Peace of mind.

A lot of work has been done since the video was made! With the help of an amazing partner in Shenzhen we have brought MiPAL to the mass production ready stage. I have Patent and TM IP protection in place. 200 production samples have been produced which have been evaluated and 'tested' by family and friends. To date I have personally funded the development however I can't provide the funds needing for a MOQ of 5000 units. This is why I am appealing to you and friends to look at my campaign and back it if you feel, as I do, MiPAL can make a difference to our community's safety.  Features
Unique wearable alarm
Handsfree operation
Warning flashing lights
Walkers, Joggers, Elderly, Frail, Elderly
Convenience Store employees 7 - 11  McDonalds
Employees in Hospitals, Jails and other security institutions
Bullying situations

Risks & Challenges The only challenge I see is getting the message out  and get people talking about the campaign. There isn't any risk involved in producing the quantities required. MiPAL can be made and shipped 5 weeks after a successful campaign.  This I guarantee. You will be refunded if MiPAL doesn't arrive as promised.
Please contact me directly for any more information you would like.",0.0,0,"2 Campaigns
|","Springhill, Australia",https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/mipal-your-personal-handsfree-security-alarm/pica

Our Campaign

Orgasmic Medicine is the only medical offering of its kind. My name is Dr Teresa Diaz. I have been an Obstetrician/Gynecologist for more than 15 years. I was not happy treating the various symptoms of lifestyle conditioning as if they were all a separate disease. The standard American diet and lifestyle is dependent on conditioning to buy non-nutritional ""food"" and rely on pharmaceuticals to fix the damage. We are overfed but malnourished. We are addicted to consumption but never full. At the same time we are conditioned to shut down access to inner voice. We trust the misinformation more than we trust our own desires, truths and callings. This make us controllable to those that would profit from our disconnection.

Our lives and our health depend on us reversing this dangerous trend of living by obligation, conditioning and disconnection. Orgasmic Medicine is about reclaiming health through connection and desire which will power transformation. If you are using willpower instead of desire to improve your health, I am offering a pleasurable change.
Health Movement
Orgasmic Medicine is my passion. Orgasmic Medicine is a movement for transformation. It is a movement for health. It is a movement for transforming the way medicine is practiced
We Need
We need raise $50,000 to cover the first six months of expenses while we launch Orgasmic Medicine. The money will go to cover the following:
Rent for 6 mo. @ 3000per month                                      $18,000
Utilities and operating expenses                                          $3,600
Admin support $20/hr x 40 hrs/month for 6 mo          $4,800
Exam table                                                                                    $2,000
VO2 machine  for fitness testing                                         $15,000
Improvements to the space                                                    $2,000
Liability insurance                                                                       $1,000
Tech + office                                                                                 $3,000
Every Little Bit Helps

Your donations will make it possible to launch this valuable medical practice and movement. Become a contributor and part of the future of medicine. If you have ever felt unheard and rushed by a doctor in a conventional setting and if you have ever felt unsatisfied with the recommendation of a conventional doctor, make sure you are part of the solution. Back us by donating what you can. Your support is what makes this possible. Every little bit helps.

I, Dr Teresa Diaz, am putting myself on the line for a passion and desire to have authentic connection and health solutions. I am willing to be the change I want to see in the world. Please join me. I trust in this vision. I need your support to make it happen.
If you are unable to contribute, please get the word out and make some noise about Orgasmic Medicine

Please use the Indiegogo share tools with your friend, colleagues and social media connections!

0,"<div class=""routerContentStory-storyBody"" data-v-1df7bf5a=""""><h2>
Our Story
Our story
begins with the search for a solution. My daughter (who is the number one
swimmer in her age group in the country, the number one swimmer in Florida, and
who set a national age group record in the 50 meter butterfly) drank orange and

grape juice every day since she was born.

At 3, she would
set out the carton or bottle of juice and say, “Juice is ready."" I always
thought her size, strength, and vitality had much to do with the nutrients those

gifts from Mother Nature provided.

My handsome,
gifted, and brilliant son has ADHD and unfortunately those same juices make him
anxious, excitable, and angry. Unfortunately, he has been unable to enjoy the
same diet my daughter enjoyed... the nonstop ingestion of natural sugars

and carbs kids enjoy and grow fast and strong from.

As many
parents have experienced, it was suggested from books and experts that we feed him
only proteins, vegetables, and water for the most part. A great, nutritious
diet to be sure (if they’ll eat it) but unless you are a fitness expert with
tremendous discipline (not a kid) it’s pretty unappealing.
So, while my
daughter drinks revitalizing juices and eats pots of energy building mac and
cheese (yuck), Jack is stuck with a diet usually reserved for people trying to lose
weight or training for a fitness competition. While she is in the 90<sup>th</sup>
percentile of size for her age, he is only average in height and weighs less
than the average.
A Natural Solution
That’s when
I decided to consult with nutritionists. The answers I kept hearing were calming,
anti-inflammatory, and high level antioxidant teas like Jasmine, Hibiscus, Passion
Flower, Rose, and Cloves. I noticed they were all flowers.
I began
researching and found that flowers provide antioxidant and anti-inflammatory
levels many, many times higher than the most potent fruits and berries, AND many, many times more powerful than any
vitamin as well.
This is much more
powerful than the most potent berries (Blueberries, Pomegranate, and Acai) and
with none of the drawbacks.
Flowers have
none of the high sugar content and calories associated with berry juices. So,
the delicious revitalizing vitality and life-extending power of flowers can be
enjoyed as often as one likes.
Since they
don’t have any sugars or calories, they're perfect for people who are sensitive to these issues, such as
children with ADHD, childhood obesity, or people with diabetes and inflammatory
diseases.
Then, it
dawned on me that there was an opportunity to create the most revolutionary
step forward in health, vitality, and longevity... a completely unique beverage with
unparalleled health benefits.
Formulated
with care in search of a solution with the help of top nutritionists and with
a completely new and unique ingredient.
An
ingredient that is Mother Nature’s ultimate expression of beauty and vibrancy.
Now all the
health benefits of juices can be enjoyed by anyone who has had to avoid them
previously and in a much more potent way.
Why We Need Your Help
So you may
ask yourself, with such an obvious and powerful new breakthrough in health and
vitality, why would we need to raise money through crowdfunding? We have secured
the formulation, designed the logos and labels, and secured packaging
with little to no funding with lots of industry encouragement and support.
There are,
however, two specific areas that will require funding we don’t yet have. We
have secured the commitment of distribution firms that will ship and put us in
primary test markets in stores like Whole Foods and Sprouts. This will require building out a large product supply on the front end which entails a
significant capital investment. Also, the amount of flowers needed to supply
mass production for nationwide distribution could be a challenge.
Until this
point, there has been no reason for wide spread consumption of flower-based
products. The small organic flower farms that produce the high quality product
we are including in Powerful Flowers have other clients they would have to
turn away if they provided their flowers to us. To do that they want us to make
a large buy-in commitment.
So, there
are some hurdles we have to overcome to begin widespread distribution. We believe it is worth it because most
importantly we believe the most revolutionary and powerful step forward in
health, vitality and longevity is here.
Please join us in the

revolution and help bring everyone the Powerful Flowers breakthrough.

Sincerely,

Brent Marlow
Science of Flowers
Here are some links to articles that demonstrate the

incredible health benefits of flowers.

http://nutritionfacts.org/2013/09/03/hibiscus-tea-the-best-beverage/
Edible flowers pack an antioxidant punch
Nutritional Composition and Antioxidant Capacity in Edible Flowers
Discover the astounding healing properties of clove oil
Edible Flowers: A Rich Source of Phytochemicals with Antioxidant and Hypoglycemic Properties
Edible flowers — antioxidant activity and impact on cell viability
Preliminary study of the antioxidant properties of flowers and roots of Pyrostegia venusta (Ker Gawl) Miers
Recent Trends in Indian Traditional Herbs Syzygium aromaticum and its Health Benefits

tremendous discipline (not a kid) it’s pretty unappealing.
So, while my
daughter drinks revitalizing juices and eats pots of energy building mac and
cheese (yuck), Jack is stuck with a diet usually reserved for people trying to lose
weight or training for a fitness competition. While she is in the 90th
percentile of size for her age, he is only average in height and weighs less
than the average.
A Natural Solution
That’s when
I decided to consult with nutritionists. The answers I kept hearing were calming,
anti-inflammatory, and high level antioxidant teas like Jasmine, Hibiscus, Passion
Flower, Rose, and Cloves. I noticed they were all flowers.
I began
researching and found that flowers provide antioxidant and anti-inflammatory
levels many, many times higher than the most potent fruits and berries, AND many, many times more powerful than any
vitamin as well.
This is much more
powerful than the most potent berries (Blueberries, Pomegranate, and Acai) and
with none of the drawbacks.
Flowers have
none of the high sugar content and calories associated with berry juices. So,
the delicious revitalizing vitality and life-extending power of flowers can be
enjoyed as often as one likes.
Since they
don’t have any sugars or calories, they're perfect for people who are sensitive to these issues, such as
children with ADHD, childhood obesity, or people with diabetes and inflammatory
diseases.
Then, it
dawned on me that there was an opportunity to create the most revolutionary
step forward in health, vitality, and longevity... a completely unique beverage with
unparalleled health benefits.
Formulated
with care in search of a solution with the help of top nutritionists and with
a completely new and unique ingredient.
An
ingredient that is Mother Nature’s ultimate expression of beauty and vibrancy.
Now all the
health benefits of juices can be enjoyed by anyone who has had to avoid them
previously and in a much more potent way.
Why We Need Your Help
So you may
ask yourself, with such an obvious and powerful new breakthrough in health and
vitality, why would we need to raise money through crowdfunding? We have secured
the formulation, designed the logos and labels, and secured packaging
with little to no funding with lots of industry encouragement and support.
There are,
however, two specific areas that will require funding we don’t yet have. We
have secured the commitment of distribution firms that will ship and put us in
primary test markets in stores like Whole Foods and Sprouts. This will require building out a large product supply on the front end which entails a
significant capital investment. Also, the amount of flowers needed to supply
mass production for nationwide distribution could be a challenge.
Until this
point, there has been no reason for wide spread consumption of flower-based
products. The small organic flower farms that produce the high quality product
we are including in Powerful Flowers have other clients they would have to
turn away if they provided their flowers to us. To do that they want us to make
a large buy-in commitment.
So, there
are some hurdles we have to overcome to begin widespread distribution. We believe it is worth it because most
importantly we believe the most revolutionary and powerful step forward in
health, vitality and longevity is here.
Please join us in the
revolution and help bring everyone the Powerful Flowers breakthrough. Sincerely,Brent Marlow
Science of Flowers
Here are some links to articles that demonstrate the
incredible health benefits of flowers.http://nutritionfacts.org/2013/09/03/hibiscus-tea-the-best-beverage/
Edible flowers pack an antioxidant punch
Nutritional Composition and Antioxidant Capacity in Edible Flowers
Discover the astounding healing properties of clove oil

Preliminary study of the antioxidant properties of flowers and roots of Pyrostegia venusta (Ker Gawl) Miers

Campaign Overview:  Please join the Returned Peace Corps Volunteers of New Jersey and help us raise $3,000 for Africa Surgery by November 30, 2018! Your donation will be matched by a generous donor!  Any amount is not too small: $5, $15, $25, $50 or more! Thank you very much!!!!! Please donate online at Indiegogo or send a check by mail to:
Returned Peace Corps Volunteers of NJ, 26 Parker Street, Belvidere, New Jersey 07823
Story:

Africa Surgery, is a nonprofit organization founded by Tom Johnson, a Returned Peace Corps Volunteer from New Jersey. Tom served in the country of Sierra Leone in West Africa the 1990's. Africa Surgery helps children and adults in Sierra Leone with medical needs receive life-changing surgeries. Tom and the Returned Peace Volunteers of New Jersey are partnering together to raise $3,000 to help 8 year-old, Francess Kabia (pictured in the above photo) have her abscessed jaw fixed through surgery.
About Africa Surgery:

Africa Surgery has a long track record of healthcare surgeries going back more than 15 years and it continues to maintain a successful track record with healthcare and wellness projects. For more info on Africa Surgery, please see: www.AfricaSurgery.org/blog-2/
About the Returned  Peace Corps Volunteers of New Jersey

Returned Peace Corps Volunteers of New Jersey has funded many successful grassroots development projects spear-headed by Peace Corps Volunteers in countries such as Benin, Senegal, Cambodia, Armenia, Tonga and beyond:
(
For more information or if you have any questions, please contact: RJ Harper, RPCV Public Relations Chairman at:  Tel: (917) 885-9171 , Email: RPCVNJ.Pr@gmail.com
Returned Peace Corps Volunteers of NJ, 26 Parker Street, Belvidere, New Jersey 07823
www.Facebook.com/RPCVNJ/
https://rpcvnj.wordpress.com/

Please donate online here @ Indiegogo or by check...and that's all there is to it!

In
our super efficient society, the Bible seems to be the last thing to catch
up.  We can have an international meeting
with the click of a button, we can mass message our friends and family, and we
can have live streaming video almost anywhere we need it, but when it comes to
the reading the Bible, the answer is not so simple.   The Bible should act as
our guiding light as we go about our day.
And when all is said and done many of us are not using the Bible as much
as we want and need to.
Our popular culture reinforces the idea
that our faith is needed now more than ever in our society full of distractions.
We're out to give people a positive outlook and place to turn when they need it
most, one“BibleBerry” at a time! The BibleBerry is a hand-held, portable,
touchscreen gadget preloaded with the entire script, visuals and audio of the
Christian Bible. The ""BibleBerry"" has a cover, which makes it look like the Holy
Bible and gives a sacred outfit. Help us establish this initiative to serve people
in need of a solution. As little as $39 gets a“BibleBerry” to an
individual and can change their ideas about what
they can accomplish for the rest of his or her life.  Finding out the Bible is with you at all
times with ease will be life changing. Empower us to make this vision a
reality with a donation to this project today!
column6:
>
Features

The ""BibleBerry"" device has an alarm feature which wakes up the user with a daily Bible verse. Additionally, the smart calendar allows the user to listen to the entire Bible in one year.

The first version of ""BibleBerry"" is offered with the King James Version. Later users can connect through Wi-Fi and update to different Bible versions of their choice. The ""BibleBerry"" may also be played through two accessories: a set of portable speakers or a Bluetooth that allows the user to listen while traveling.
column7:
width=""620"">

""BibleBerry"" offers two versions - BibleBerry M500 and BibleBerry S330, a lighter version.
column17:
>About Us

Hello everyone! My name is Denis Cyriac, CEO and founder of the iDearays and I am the creator of ""BibleBerry."" We are committed to our mission statement of spreading the gospel with this exciting new modern technology. Our goal is to make it easier for people to access and use their Bibles on a daily basis.

column1: BibleBerry – An elegant and impressive Christmas gift

The BibleBerry is an essential mobile gadget for family, unique present for kids and a valuable device for the elderly.  It is a wonderful gift for those who would like to be closer to God.We are working hard to release ""BibleBerry"" by November 15, 2015 – just in time for the holidays.
BibleBerry – A soul mate while you travel
God is near and so is His Word. When you wake up, are at work, while you travel, or before you go to sleep the Word of God is with you
column2: it becomes an important part of your daily life.

column1: BibleBerry – Do not compare it with a mobile phone

There is no comparison between a mobile phone and the Holy Bible.  Unlike mobile phones, the ""BibleBerry""is a sacred device which has no sim-card, social applications, emails or SMS to distract users while reading or listening to the Bible passages.
For us to bring the ""BibleBerry"" to life, we need your support!

Your generous funding will help us get things started in order to realize our concept. It will assist us with the cost of further development, manufacturing and production. More importantly, you get the chance to be one of the first users of the ""BibleBerry."" We will also use our funding to test our concept to make it better.  We are committed to continuous improvement so we are always giving people the best possible solutions.

We will also be using the funding to expand the possibilities for the consumers usage, to enterprise solutions for the ""BibleBerry,"" to further customize the first versions of the ""BibleBerry"" and to create additional products and services that will complement the ""BibleBerry.""

The ""BibleBerry"" needs pledging but above all, it needs your attention and interest! If you love this product as much as we do then please take a moment to click on one of our social media buttons (Facebook, Twitter and YouTube at the bottom of the page). Help us spread the word and get things started!
We need about $30,000 in order to launch ""BibleBerry"" onto the market.

We feel so grateful to everyone who has taken the time to read our campaign and for those who contributed what they could to make a difference and helping us spread the word.  We have spent the last few months working hard to bring our vision to life in this campaign and it was worth every minute. Thanks to all our generous supporters.  Please know your efforts, even the smallest, don’t go unnoticed.  We will continue to keep you posted on what your donation helped us achieve.  You are part of our ""BibleBerry"" family!
If you cannot contribute but are interested in helping, please take up our referral program! You might even be able to earn perks, just by spreading the word!

Final Thank You and Links

We feel so grateful to everyone who has taken the time to read our campaign and for those who contributed what they could to make a difference and helping us spread the word.  We have spent the last few months working hard to bring our vision to life in this campaign and it was worth every minute. We Love you Babu!
Babu is a lovable 3-year-old from <a href=""http://www.brettcolephotography.com/?utf8=%E2%9C%93&amp
column5: commit=Go"" rel=""noopener nofollow"" target=""_blank"">Pushkar, Rajasthan, India who is battling kidney failure. Babu has also lived his whole life in a tent. Babu's parents are loving and caring. The family lives on less than $50 a

column1: month, and with no house,

transportation, power, or plumbing, they are doing their best for Babu. Be sure to see the photo gallery above to see the rest of his lovely family.

Babu's Health

Babu has brain damage and disabilities (inability to walk or talk) from a genetic disorder that is shared by three other children in his extended family. He also has
column3:
oe=utf-8"" rel=""noopener nofollow"" target=""_blank"">scaphocephaly, or a mishapen, elongated skull. He is also malnourished and severely anemic. Babu also has pica, a result of his malnourishment.

As serious as all of these problems are, at the moment the biggest issue is Babu's kidneys. He has severe hydronephrosis,

column1: or swelling of the kidneys, due to a failed section of his urinary
tract. This is a matter of life or death, as it would be extremely
difficult for his family to put him on dialysis. Poor patients in India

who reach the point of needing dialysis have a very poor survival rate.

Progress So Far

I (Brett Cole) work with people and animals in Babu's city (Pushkar, India), and when I met Babu in December 2014 he had never received medical care and had no diagnosis of his disorder. We put him in a special needs school, and started a course of medical care. He had CT scans to determine the cause of his disability (he has damage to the corpus collosum in his brain), a hemoglobin transfusion to treat his severe anemia, and he's recently had two procedures to reduce the swelling of his kidneys.

What We're Doing

Babu needs three things - another kidney surgery, a house, and continued schooling and therapy. First, he has to have a more serious operation to repair his damaged ureter, which is causing massive swelling of his kidneys. This operation will cost about $750.

We're also raising about $2,000 to build the family a house. This doesn't sound like much for a house, but in Pushkar it's enough, and it will be a massive improvement for Babu. He cannot get well living in a tent. He's exposed to constant
infections, blazing sun, he eats sand all the

time, and he constantly breathes in heavy smoke from cooking fires. A house will make a profound difference in his ability to get well and stay well.

We're also raising $300 to continue Babu and his sister Neha's school enrollment for the next year (Neha's school money will go to the Charity Pushkar Children Trust, which is helping with her schooling - a great charity to support), and $200 to hire a physical therapist to work with Babu. We hope to see him stand or even walk one day. Within a few days of having a transfusion for anemia he was moving around to an extent that was pretty much unprecedented for him.

Babu is Super Adorable!
<div class=""campaignStoryVideoWrapper""><iframe class=""embedly-embed"" height=""326"" src=""https://cdn.embedly.com/widgets/media.html?src=https%3A%2F%2Fplayer.vimeo.com%2Fvideo%2F122639727&amp
column6:
schema=vimeo"" width=""580"">
Babu is a sweetheart. He loves to play and listen to music, and to eat - chapati and bananas. He's regarded as a little holy man, and he blesses people by patting them on the head. I don't have much video of Babu, but this clip will give you some idea of his character. That's Babu's father and I waiting at the hospital, where he's biting his dad's finger.

Thank You!

column1:
Babu's parents are loving and attentive, but there's only so much you can do raising four kids in a tent with very little income.

I love Babu and his family, and I will continue doing everything I can
to help him, but I could definitely use help. I support several other
families in Pushkar month-to-month, and I help a number of other people

with medical costs and school enrollment.

I greatly appreciate your support. You can contact me, Brett, directly with any questions. You can read more on my India social work page.

Babu has a Facebook page. You can also help Babu just by sharing his FB page with your friends. Thank you!

Be Sure to also Check out our website! @ http://donahueinnovations.com/

_____________________________________________________________________________

column1: affordable

<div class=""campaignStoryVideoWrapper""><iframe class=""embedly-embed"" height=""326"" src=""https://cdn.embedly.com/widgets/media.html?src=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2Fembed%2Fo2-HIR0IydA%3Ffeature%3Doembed&amp
column10: >The Elimbinator_____________________________________________________________________________

column2: >The Elimbinator

column1: industry
And Built to Outlast Your
Mower
(See the FAQ below for
<b>Questions You Might Ask
The Elimbinator
<li><b>Why is it called
The Elimbinator? Because it Eliminates brush, tree cuttings,
leaves and tree limbs and virtually any cellulose fiber
material you can stuff into it.
<li><b>Why would I need
this device? The
Elimbinator can save the average homeowner
thousands of dollars over its lifetime. In fact: It pays for itself
in one use.
<li>
<b>How does it pay
for itself? Three ways: a. When you cut your lawn and trim your
trees and shrubs, you are left with all of the cuttings. You
normally rake them up and pay to dispose of them. b. You can spend
$500.00 plus for a chipper/shredder, grind up it up in big chunks
and either build a compost or have it hauled away. Labor and money
thrown away.  c. But most of all, you just paid to have that biomass
with all of its nutrients to be discarded. The
Elimbinator turns it into fine particles that
go right back into your lawn where it decomposes and feeds the lawn
with those nutrients. Why buy fertilizer when you create your own?
You already have it. Stop throwing it away.
<li>
Why not just buy
a chipper/shredder? A small fair quality chipper/shredder cost (At a
minimum) around $500.00. The
Elimbinator cost less than 1/20th
of that and the chipper/shredder can only grind up the trimmings.
Don’t even attempt to feed a banana leaf or a palm fron into a
conventional shredder. It will completely clog it up and you will
have to take it apart to repair it. You can build a smelly compost
in the corner of your yard, if you have enough room, but the
expensive chipper/shredder can’t grind your trimmings into dust so
it can immediately feed your yard. You also have to have the room to
store the machine and you have the extra cost of maintaining the
equipment. The
Elimbinator sits on your mower and takes up NO
space and requires NO maintenance.
<li>
Is it built to
last? The
Elimbinator is constructed of a Space age solid
Polycarbonate composite that is virtually indestructible. It won’t
corrode or break and will outlast your lawnmower. In fact: It can be
removed and reinstalled on your next mower and the one after that.
<li>
<b>What can it
shred? It will shred any cellulous based material that can be fed
into it. Anything from: A banana leaf to the hardest wood you can
find. If you want to shred your homework or your Love letters and
turn them into fine confetti, you can do that too. Just roll them up
like a newspaper and feed them in.
<li>
Does it require
any maintenance? NO
<li>
How safe is it?
It is designed so that hands or fingers will not reach any dangerous
portion of The Elimbinator or your lawnmower. This device has been
under R&amp
column2: D since 2004 without a single mishap. If you notice in

column1: the video, the operator’s fingers are put into the device as far
as they can reach. This is in no way, recommended, but it is an
example of how well designed The
Elimbinator is.
<li>
Will it do the
same with leaves? With the optional attachment it will. In South
Florida, where it was originally developed it is a veritable
necessity. leaves fall year around and must be dealt with every time
you cut your lawn. Especially palm trees.
<li>
Can this be
useful to a Professional Lawn Service? By employing The
Elimbinator, it alleviates, in most instances,
the need to haul away and dispose of almost all lawn debris, thus
eliminating the extra expense of a dump truck or trailer to haul it
away to a commercial landfill. The
Elimbinator was developed by a Professional to
solve a real problem that he encountered every day. He solved that
problem by inventing The
Elimbinator and saved tens of thousands of
dollars in his own business.
<li>
Is it difficult
to install? The
Elimbinator comes with very simple and easy to
follow installation instructions and directs you to a UTube video
that shows you everything you would ever need to know about
installation and proper use. You may choose the optional “Easy
Install Kit” that contains everything you need (Drill not
included) Or, if you are handy with tools, you may already have the

The

businesses. His Family has been in the Home Building business for over

This device solved this problem at little expense. He even uses it to get rid
of left over construction material and debris. It works so well that he decided
to introduce it to the General Public.
Like all of his inventions, they are born out of

(See the FAQ below for
Questions You Might Ask
The Elimbinator
Why is it called
The Elimbinator? Because it Eliminates brush, tree cuttings,
leaves and tree limbs and virtually any cellulose fiber
material you can stuff into it.
Why would I need
this device? The
Elimbinator can save the average homeowner
thousands of dollars over its lifetime. In fact: It pays for itself
in one use.
How does it pay
for itself? Three ways: a. When you cut your lawn and trim your
trees and shrubs, you are left with all of the cuttings. You
normally rake them up and pay to dispose of them. b. You can spend
$500.00 plus for a chipper/shredder, grind up it up in big chunks
and either build a compost or have it hauled away. Labor and money
thrown away.  c. But most of all, you just paid to have that biomass
with all of its nutrients to be discarded. The
Elimbinator turns it into fine particles that
go right back into your lawn where it decomposes and feeds the lawn
with those nutrients. Why buy fertilizer when you create your own?
You already have it. Stop throwing it away.
Why not just buy
a chipper/shredder? A small fair quality chipper/shredder cost (At a
minimum) around $500.00. The
Elimbinator cost less than 1/20th
of that and the chipper/shredder can only grind up the trimmings.
Don’t even attempt to feed a banana leaf or a palm fron into a
conventional shredder. It will completely clog it up and you will
have to take it apart to repair it. You can build a smelly compost
in the corner of your yard, if you have enough room, but the
expensive chipper/shredder can’t grind your trimmings into dust so
it can immediately feed your yard. You also have to have the room to
store the machine and you have the extra cost of maintaining the
equipment. The
Elimbinator  sits on your mower and takes up NO
space and requires NO maintenance.
Is it built to
last? The
Elimbinator is constructed of a Space age solid
Polycarbonate composite that is virtually indestructible. It won’t
corrode or break and will outlast your lawnmower. In fact: It can be
removed and reinstalled on your next mower and  the one after that.
What can it
shred? It will shred any cellulous based material that can be fed
into it. Anything from: A banana leaf to the hardest wood you can
find. If you want to shred your homework or your Love letters and
turn them into fine confetti, you can do that too. Just roll them up
like a newspaper and feed them in.
Does it require
any maintenance? NO
How safe is it?
It is designed so that hands or fingers will not reach any dangerous
portion of The Elimbinator or your lawnmower. This device has been
under R&D since 2004 without a single mishap. If you notice in
the video, the operator’s fingers are put into the device as far
as they can reach. This is in no way, recommended, but it is an
example of how well designed The
Elimbinator is.
Will it do the
same with leaves? With the optional attachment it will. In South
Florida, where it was originally developed it is a veritable
necessity. leaves fall year around and must be dealt with every time
you cut your lawn. Especially palm trees.
Can this be
useful to a Professional Lawn Service? By employing The
Elimbinator, it alleviates, in most instances,
the need to haul away and dispose of almost all lawn debris, thus
eliminating the extra expense of a dump truck or trailer to haul it
away to a commercial landfill. The
Elimbinator was developed by a Professional to
solve a real problem that he encountered every day. He solved that
problem by inventing The
Elimbinator and saved tens of thousands of
dollars in his own business.
Is it difficult
to install? The
Elimbinator comes with very simple and easy to
follow installation instructions and directs you to a UTube video
that shows you everything you would ever need to know about
installation and proper use. You may choose the optional “Easy
Install Kit” that contains everything you need (Drill not
included) Or, if you are handy with tools, you may already have the
essentials to do it yourself.  Either way, it is a simple install.
Why don’t I have one? Good question. Why not?? If you cut your
own lawn, or if you are a Professional and want to have a decisive
edge over the competition, The
Elimbinator is the ultimate answer to your
need. It Elimbinates
your yard debris and turns it into a useful and
nutrient enriched biodegradable product for your lawn. Leave the
landfill to trash and  garbage. They have enough to deal with and
your paying through the nose to get rid of it. Save the useful
nutrients to take care of your own lawn.

column2: >A little backstory: Six years ago, we lost our first baby after spending 13 days in the NICU. Life as we knew it was over, there just aren't words to accurately depict the reality of driving away empty-handed from the hospital. I know so many of you get that - and I so wished you didn't.
column3:
> I felt more alone than I ever had in my entire life. And while I had a wonderful support system at home, none of it made any difference. It was something I had to work through on my own. I soon after found Carly Marie's breathtaking work online for grieving parents, and for the first time after spending literally hours and hours visiting the blogs of other mamas in her little community, I did not feel alone. I knew grief was something I had to do personally, but for the first time I felt validated. My pain, my anger, my unanswered questions, my infinite loss. 

Through time I can attest to the fact that grief is indeed a wild and unpredictable roller coaster. Six years into my grief I hardly describe myself as any kind of expert but I am nothing if not passionate about finding healing after loss, and sharing the tools that I have discovered along the way with other grieving mamas - in a creative, warm and welcoming atmosphere. I believe intentional grieving leads to intentional living. It does not happen overnight, or even in the span of 40 workshop lessons. I can't give you that answer, but it is my passion to give you the tools to work through grief. Bravely. Honoring your own heart and boundaries. And most importantly, with a community of women right behind you, who just get it.
column4:
>The plan: The largest portion of this goal will be used to pay for the tuition to obtain The Grief Recovery Method Certification - credentials that will make this workshop more accessible to hospitals and institutions around the country. It will also cover for the cost to bring this workshop to one place, anywhere in the US, to serve 25 grieving mothers. 

What is Choosing Your Breath?

Choosing Your Breath is an art therapy-based grief to healing program designed especially for grieving mothers by a grieving mother. This workshop takes you through each stage of grief and tailors topics surrounding grief to fit that of a loss of a child. So much of grief material available is about ""normal"" loss, like that of a spouse, parent, grandparent. As a grieving parent, it can be even more isolating to come upon this realization when wading through grief and trying to find answers.
column5:
>Choosing Your Breath is designed to guide you through intentional grief work, so that one day you might dare to live life intentionally again, with full of purpose and hope, in spite of loss. Workshops can last anywhere from one afternoon, to a full day, to a weekend retreat setting - the options are endless and can be customized to fit the hospital's needs.

The beauty of the workshop is that it covers all aspects of child loss, and is a course that will always be offered online for those that prefer the anonymity of the internet.
column6:
> 

You can find more about the certification that I plan to take in September here: https://www.griefrecoverymethod.com/certification-training/training-agenda

See sample workshops below:

Read more about this workshop here: http://www.choosingyourbreath.com/explore/

Thankfully there is a course available in September in my hometown, Houston, TX. If the goal is met by July (2 months early), I receive a $200 discount. If the goal is reached by this time frame, that extra money will be used to host my following workshop (art materials, travel, raffle gifts, etc.)

If you have any questions about this please email me: wildfeatherswellness@gmail.com

Administrations to physically impaired kids initiated in 1985
with the backing of Terre des Hommes (TDH) of Switzerland. In 1992, the
responsibility for project was exchanged to the Friends of the Disabled (FOD),
a Nepalese non-administrative association. The FOD has been constantly
endeavoring to contact more kids with a far reaching, excellent bundle of
administrations which are healing facility and also group based and spread out
through numerous regions of the nation.
Out Patient Department
5,425 (2,220 girls) new patients and 12,529 (4,803 girls)
existing patients were seen (in the Hospital and in addition in the field) in
2012. 861 patient documents were inactivated before the end of 2012.
Inpatient Services
With the suggestion of our medical team, inpatient
administrations were separated into two noteworthy divisions this year
Nursing and Surgical Departments.
The HRDC Medical group is staffed by :
Doctor Specialists (Medical Support Services) :10IPS (In
patients service) Staffs: 29. Two Wards at HRDC are named the intense ward and
the recovery ward. In 2012, 1,091 patients were conceded, out of which 487 were
girls. The normal length of stay of a patient was roughly 20 days (19.42 to be
exact).
Surgical Services
In 2012, 1427 surgeries on 1,170 patients (518 young ladies)
were performed at HRDC.
A dollar can certainly go a long way, but a few more can go further:
<ul>
<li>After the Earthquake struck on 25 April, 2015, our
entire community hsd been in turmoil. The devastation extended thoughtout the
country and many have been found dead. More and more bodies are turning up
daily, bringing the current ""death toll"" to exceed 7,000. It is
without a doubt that aid is needed for the people of Nepal. The land is in
ruins, and the people are in pain. Those that are still alive, that is. We
are seeking to raise 500,000 United States Dollars to rebuild our
hospital. The patients of the <b>HOSPITAL &amp
DISABLED CHILDREN (HRDC) @27.629529, 85.508982  need your help.

Clean Drinking Water to the Nepalese people. Aside from the immediate need
of Food, the people of Nepal are also in need of Shelter.

running and emergency plans are being situated. However, the valley and

reconstruction after the first weeks have passed. Individuals have lost

We are raising funds for the surviving
citizens to help clean the region around the towns from debris and to

The need for aid is enormous. It is without question that

best. Numerous liberal hearts have been moved by the rising loss of life

Risks &
As with any fundraising campaign to provide aid and assistance to

<li>Need to know where your cash

donors.
First and foremost, donated funds for Nepal will go to
help with individuals' most pressing needs: water, food, shelter, sanitation,
