","Short Summary
Administrations to physically impaired kids initiated in 1985
with the backing of Terre des Hommes (TDH) of Switzerland. In 1992, the
responsibility for project was exchanged to the Friends of the Disabled (FOD),
a Nepalese non-administrative association. The FOD has been constantly
endeavoring to contact more kids with a far reaching, excellent bundle of
administrations which are healing facility and also group based and spread out
through numerous regions of the nation.
Out Patient Department
5,425 (2,220 girls) new patients and 12,529 (4,803 girls)
existing patients were seen (in the Hospital and in addition in the field) in
2012. 861 patient documents were inactivated before the end of 2012.
Inpatient Services
With the suggestion of our medical team, inpatient
administrations were separated into two noteworthy divisions this year
Nursing and Surgical Departments.
The HRDC Medical group is staffed by :
Doctor Specialists (Medical Support Services) :10IPS (In
patients service) Staffs: 29. Two Wards at HRDC are named the intense ward and
the recovery ward. In 2012, 1,091 patients were conceded, out of which 487 were
girls. The normal length of stay of a patient was roughly 20 days (19.42 to be
exact).
Surgical Services
In 2012, 1427 surgeries on 1,170 patients (518 young ladies)
were performed at HRDC.What We Need & What It Can Do
A dollar can certainly go a long way, but a few more can go further:
After the Earthquake struck on 25 April, 2015, our
entire community hsd been in turmoil. The devastation extended thoughtout the
country and many have been found dead. More and more bodies are turning up
daily, bringing the current ""death toll"" to exceed 7,000. It is
without a doubt that aid is needed for the people of Nepal. The land is in
ruins, and the people are in pain. Those that are still alive, that is. We
are seeking to raise 500,000 United States Dollars to rebuild our
hospital. The patients of the HOSPITAL & REHABILITATION CENTER FOR
DISABLED CHILDREN (HRDC) @27.629529, 85.508982  need your help.
Your generous donations will go to providing Food and
Clean Drinking Water to the Nepalese people. Aside from the immediate need
of Food, the people of Nepal are also in need of Shelter.
Rescue and salvage is
running and emergency plans are being situated. However, the valley and
Kathmandu region especially will languish over quite a while and will need
reconstruction after the first weeks have passed. Individuals have lost
relatives, their homes and the base of their pay. After first medical
consideration has been conveyed it will take huge endeavors to re-create
group life back to the country.
We are raising funds for the surviving
citizens to help clean the region around the towns from debris and to
support them in reconstructing their homes and foundation.
The Impact
The need for aid is enormous. It is without question that
immediate assistance is required, and this assistance must be ongoing in order
to see the positive change needed. Whether you are donating $100, $500. $1,000
or even $50, it is astounding when you realize just how the difference your
contribution will make:
Unoriginal as it may feel, money gifts are constantly
best. Numerous liberal hearts have been moved by the rising loss of life
here in Nepal, and the gigantic needs of the survivors. Much thanks to you
for caring and wanting to help the cause. Food and clothing gifts sent
freely from the US and Canada can stop up what one of my Nepalese
associates called ""a three-inch supply line, when a 30-foot one is
required."" And while volunteers can help, its best to do this from
the US & Canada, bringing issues to light of the catastrophe and
trusts for the survivors, instead of heading out to the field oneself.
Help specialists on the ground here in Nepal must concentrate on the needs
of those survivors, instead of arranging even the best-hearted volunteers.
Indeed, even in life-and-death circumstances,
disaster-response can require some time invested. There's an inclination
to expect that absence of cash is the main stumbling block in emergency
response. At the same time, natural disasters are, by their extremely
nature, complex. Numerous factors can slow progress more than anybody
would like, including destroyed airplane terminals, seaports and streets,
constrained infrastructure/foundation in an impoverished nation, or even
the vicinity of help associations that aren't a piece of the in general,
composed exertion. Try not to get discouraged in the event that you
donate, then keep on seeing disturbing news stories about individuals in
need. Help is overcoming, and aid WILL get through.
Your assistance is necessary for the Children and
Families in Nepal. The Government of Canada is coordinating gifts until
May 25, significance anything you give will be doubled size. The United
States Government has a similar matched incentive with no expiration.
Whether your blessing sustains a ravenous family in Nepal, modifies the
home of kids, staffs a kid neighborly space so traumatized kids can get
counseling, or helps a parent re-build their occupation and livelihood,
your donated cash gift will help in an exceptionally personal way.
Risks & Challenges
As with any fundraising campaign to provide aid and assistance to
those in need during times of turmoil, it may be difficult to decide where to
go, and whether your decision was the best philanthropic one you could have
made.
Need to know where your cash
is going and what it is being utilized for?100% of your gift to Nepal will
go to alleviation and recovery endeavors on the ground. All philanthropy:
water operating expenses are secured by a small group of private
donors.
First and foremost, donated funds for Nepal will go to
help with individuals' most pressing needs: water, food, shelter, sanitation,
cleanliness, and emergency care for the injured. Taking after the initial quake
after-shocks, repercussions have kept on wracking the area, and people have

Hi! I am Dr. Alan Shargani, Founder and CEO of Infinity
Canopy. May is the Skin Cancer Awareness of Month and we at Infinity Canopy would
like to help raise funds and awareness for Camp Sundown and
Xeroderma Pigmentosum Society as well as create a shaded patio area for the campers and their families.
column6:
schema=youtube"" width=""580"">

People affected by XP are the most vulnerable to Skin Cancer

column1: from normal Sun Exposure. People with XP are just like you. The biggest
difference is that they can’t go out and
play at all during daylight hours. Even a
small amount of sun exposure can lead to skin ulcers and skin cancer. There is
no cure for XP.
Camp Sundown also serves
kids and their families suffering from other forms of
Sun Sensitivity including Solar Urticaria, Porphyria, Vitiligo, Albinism and
related conditions who can be outdoors in a shaded area. Camp Sundown  has a large outdoor area that is devoid of
any shade and we will be donating an Infinity Canopy to create a safe place for
these campers and their families to enjoy the outdoors in the long summer days

ahead.

In order to ensure the success of this very important
cause, we are seeking your contributions to help defray other costs associated
with this project including the support structure for the canopy (pergola),
installation and other improvement costs. We will also be seeking the help of
other companies to minimize or eliminate the costs associated with this project
altogether so 100% of your contributions would directly support the Camp and
Xeroderma Pigmentosum Society.
Please donate and spread the word. Any amount you can
donate will spread awareness and directly help . Together we can make a huge
difference. We thank YOU in advance for your contribution and spreading the
word!

column4: '>More About the condition XP and Camp Sundown:

column10: >When Dan and Caren Mahar's youngest daughter Katie was

column1: diagnosed with Xeroderma Pigmentosa (XP) they wanted her to have a ""normal
childhood"" and to be able to go to camp. For children, like Katie,a day camp would be
impossible. Children with XP cannot stand even
limited exposure to the sun or other types of ultraviolet light. The Mahar's
dream of creating a ""night camp"" began in 1996 as an XP family
retreat in Poughkeepsie, NY.  Thanks to
many generous donors, in 2003, Camp Sundown Retreat House was opened in
Craryville, NY.
The Xeroderma Pigmentosum Society is proud to announce a
number of ongoing partnerships that benefit Camp Sundown. We have been so
fortunate with the generosity of our volunteers, donors and contributors who

make Camp Sundown possible year after year. 

Please help Infinity Canopy raises money for Camp Sundown

2015!


About Infinity Canopy:


Infinity Canopy is a modular slide on wire shade system that can adapt to any space in one or multiple colors. It can be added between two opposing walls or added to outdoor structures such as pergolas and patio covers. The canopy is made of marine grade anodized aluminum and stainless steel with special outdoor fabrics that offer 100 shade and UV protection.
Because of its modular design, Infinity Canopy can be expanded easily
and our goal is to continue to grow the canopy with your help and

support over time.

Instant Pain Relief Spray

There’s
a new product for treatment of pain that is unlike any other treatment
available. Instant Relief Pain Spray (IPRS) is a completely new breakthrough for
stopping pain in muscles, skin, and sometimes even in arthritic joints. It’s
not a pill, and it doesn’t require getting an injection or rubbing on a lotion.
This is a way of treating pain that has never been done before. All that’s
required is for the user to spray the affected area, and the pain disappears completely in seconds
can last for up to 24 hours.
We’ve tested this product on literally
hundreds of subjects and it worked on <i>every
one of them. That’s right, every one
of them had their pain completely canceled within seconds after spraying
with IPRS … and <i>the relief lasted for up
to a full day.
My wife had back pain from an auto
accident over 20 years ago. It took strong narcotic drugs to partially ease her
pain, but it never went away completely, and the drugs left her with some nasty
side effects—she was sleeping about 15 hours out of every 24, and when she was
awake, she was groggy and not really “in the moment.”
I did some research and tried many different
methods to ease her pain and bring her back to her former lively self, and it
took a while, but after finally hitting on the formula for IPRS, she sprayed
her lower back with IPRS and her pain stopped completely in a few seconds. Just think of that—doctors couldn’t
stop her pain in 16 years! After 4
years, she still sprays her back every day and remains pain free. That’s the reason I made every effort to let others try
it in a field test. It passed with flying colors!
A
few of the pains IPRS has treated:
<ul>
• Chronic backache
• Sore muscles
• Shoulder pain
• Knee pain (spray behind the knee)
• Neck ache/stiff neck
• Aching legs
• Arthritic joints
• Tired, sore feet
• Sunburn
• Aggravating itch from poison ivy/poison oak
• Minor skin abrasions
In
fact, we had one test subject with shingles who was also pregnant, so she
couldn’t take strong painkillers for fear of affecting her unborn baby. She
used IPRS, spraying where the nerves were inflamed, and managed to get relief
and comfort from the spray without endangering her baby.
This is a just a partial list of some of the maladies that were treated
successfully with IPRS. We suspect that as time goes by, many more will be
found.
IPRS
has no side effects or drugs
column2: in fact, the ingredients are beneficial to your

column1: body. That’s what makes it so effective. It has no aftereffects, it won’t react
with any other drugs you take, and it won’t trigger any allergy. It has no odor
and it won’t stain your clothes. In short, <i>there
is no downside to this product. IPRS is a completely new and innovative way
to defeat pain. There is nothing to compare to it. Once you try it, you’ll
never return to using prescription drugs or over the counter painkillers, both
of which can lead to serious organ damage.
Our
goal is to make as many people aware of IPRS as we possibly can. We want to
educate them to the fact that pain control is now so easy to manage that it’s
almost an afterthought.
We
feel so strongly about IPRS that we guarantee
it will work for you if you suffer from one of the ailments listed here. If you
aren’t satisfied, if it truly didn’t give you the relief you seek, just send an
email to the the address below and we’ll make arrangements to return your
money. But when it does work, email and tell us about that too. Tell us if you
relieved a pain we don’t include in our list. We look forward to hearing from
all our clients.
Read
the results from two test subjects:
Gail V., of Carrollton, Ohio, says:
“My back hurt me every day for years. My doctor gave me injections of
cortisone, but it only partially eased my pain, I still hurt a lot A friend
sprayed IPRS on my back. The pain stopped completely in seconds! Then I played
18 holes of golf and I never felt even a twinge of pain. It didn’t start
hurting me until the next morning, so I got some IPRS and sprayed it again.
Same result—no more pain! Now I spray every morning and my back never hurts me.
I’m on my third bottle now and I’m never going to run out of this stuff!”
Nancy B., of Strasburg, Ohio, says: “I’m a clerk in a liquor store and I’m
on hard floors all day. My Achilles’ tendon got so sore that I couldn’t
wear shoes. I wore flip-flops for years because my tendons were so sore. About
a year ago, I found out about IPRS and sprayed my foot with it. The pain
stopped almost immediately! Now I can wear my shoes without pain. I’m never
going to run out of this stuff! In fact, I’m so happy with IPRS that I’ve
started selling it myself, and I have a number of satisfied customers!”
These
two people had suffered pain for so long that they were almost ready to give
up. Gale had serious back pain for years
column2: Nancy had suffered for 5 years with

column1: her Achilles’ tendon. Both of them got immediate relief with IPRS. They said
that IPRS was the only treatment that ever worked for them.
They still use it.
We
realize that this is hard to believe.
Everyone here—myself included—had to see IPRS completely stop pain a number of
times before they came to believe we had made a major breakthrough in
alleviating pain. When you spray yourself the first time with IPRS, you’ll be a
believer too.
Whatever
you do, don’t pass up this opportunity to live your life free of pain. Don’t
suffer another day with discomfort that can be stopped with a few sprays of
IPRS. It’s just not necessary.
After all—the only thing you have to lose is
your pain. Believe me, you've never seen anything like this!

What You Get

Each bottle contains approximately 500 sprays to knock out pain wherever you spray.
<li>	1 bottle: $16.00
—plus free shipping!

A good choice for those who find it hard to believe IPRS can do all we claim. We’re glad to have a chance to prove what we say—and you get FREE SHIPPING!  When IPRS works for you, we’ll be hearing from you again. Ships July 15.
<li>	3 bottles: $32.00
—plus free shipping!
One for your car, one for your spouse’s car, and one for the house. About a 6-months’ supply … and the third bottle is free—and you get FREE SHIPPING! That's a $16.00 savings! Ships July 15.
<li>	6 bottles: $64.00
—plus free shipping!
Enough for you and some friends or relatives … and 2 free bottles! This time you save $32.00—and you get FREE SHIPPING! Ships July 15.
<li>	12 bottles: $128.00
—plus free shipping!
For those who want IPRS for themselves and some to sell. This time, 4 bottles are free—saving $64.00—and you get FREE SHIPPING! Ships July 15.
<li>	24 bottles: $256.00
—plus free shipping!
Enough for your own use and some to sell to others when they see how effective IPRS is. And this time, 8 bottles are free! Save $128.00—and you get FREE SHIPPING! Ships July 15.
US Customers Only—FREE BOTTLE WITH EACH ORDER!
For our US customers, we’re shipping out a free bottle of IPRS with each order!
We're that convinced that IPRS is exactly what we claim! Just provide your shipping information and we send the free bottle out the next day, without waiting for the
July shipping date! This offer is good until our supply runs out.
Why Try IPRS

Many over-the-counter drugs have debilitating side effects, such as acetaminophen's effects on the liver, or the damaging side effects of narcotic painkillers. IPRS has none of these! Western Reserve Labs was established to bring IPRS to the public. Our theory is that many over-the-counter and prescription drugs should be the last resort, not the first. We've succeeded with IPRS, a revolutionary approach from a different perspective than most medical campaigns. IPRS immediately cancels pain in the skin and muscles, and even in some arthritic joints. It works for everyone very quickly.

Other Ways You Can Help

Maybe you're skeptical about what we say, or maybe you're just not ready to try another pain reliever. Maybe you're lucky enough not to need pain relief right now. But maybe you know someone who needs some help and just can't stand the awful side effects of the powerful prescription drugs, or maybe you know someone who wants to live pain free without having to be a zombie all the time. If you know anyone like that, or if you're just curious about our claims, tell others about our campaign. In fact, why not use the Indiegogo share tools and help get the word out?

What You Get Each bottle contains approximately 500 sprays to knock out pain wherever you spray.
1 bottle: $16.00
—plus free shipping!

A good choice for those who find it hard to believe IPRS can do all we claim. We’re glad to have a chance to prove what we say—and you get FREE SHIPPING!  When IPRS works for you, we’ll be hearing from you again. Ships July 15.
3 bottles: $32.00
—plus free shipping!
One for your car, one for your spouse’s car, and one for the house. About a 6-months’ supply … and the third bottle is free—and you get FREE SHIPPING! That's a $16.00 savings! Ships July 15.
6 bottles: $64.00
—plus free shipping!
Enough for you and some friends or relatives … and 2 free bottles! This time you save $32.00—and you get FREE SHIPPING!  Ships July 15.
12 bottles: $128.00
—plus free shipping!
For those who want IPRS for themselves and some to sell. This time, 4 bottles are free—saving $64.00—and you get FREE SHIPPING! Ships July 15.
24 bottles: $256.00
—plus free shipping!
Enough for your own use and some to sell to others when they see how effective IPRS is. And this time, 8 bottles are free! Save $128.00—and you get FREE SHIPPING! Ships July 15.
US Customers Only—FREE BOTTLE WITH EACH ORDER!
For our US customers, we’re shipping out a free bottle of IPRS with each order!
We're that convinced that IPRS is exactly what we claim! Just provide your shipping information and we send the free bottle out the next day, without waiting for the
July shipping date! This offer is good until our supply runs out.
Why Try IPRS

Many over-the-counter drugs have debilitating side effects, such as acetaminophen's effects on the liver, or the damaging side effects of narcotic painkillers. IPRS has none of these! Western Reserve Labs was established to bring IPRS to the public. Our theory is that many over-the-counter and prescription drugs should be the last resort, not the first. We've succeeded with IPRS, a revolutionary approach from a different perspective than most medical campaigns. IPRS immediately cancels pain in the skin and muscles, and even in some arthritic joints. It works for everyone very quickly.

Other Ways You Can Help  Maybe you're skeptical about what we say, or maybe you're just not ready to try another pain reliever. Maybe you're lucky enough not to need pain relief right now. But maybe you know someone who needs some help and just can't stand the awful side effects of the powerful prescription drugs, or maybe you know someone who wants to live pain free without having to be a zombie all the time. If you know anyone like that, or if you're just curious about our claims, tell others about our campaign. In fact, why not use the Indiegogo share tools and help get the word out?",0.0,0,"2 Campaigns

Hi I'm Chloe, and my best friends name is Mark. I have known him my whole life. Since the age of 10 Mark has battled cancer not once, but four times, in his liver, both lungs and chest. At the age of 18 he is now suffering side effects from the various cycles of chemotherapy and ablations that he has had, which has left him with extensive nerve damage and poor mobility. The NHS provided him with a simple wheelchair, but in order to go anywhere Mark must have a family member to push him- and as Mark is a 6ft1 teenage boy this is not an easy task. The NHS will not fund a mobility scooter because it is not 'essential' even though it would improve his life substantially. I aim to raise £1800 to buy him a mobility scooter so he can go out and see friends and live a normal life, which is something he has never been able to do. So please, even if it's just £1, help me to help Mark :) thank you!

Brief

I am a mechanical engineer graduated from Middle East Technical University with an MBA from Koc University. I had professional experience in leading investment banks in İstanbul and during the financial crisis, I moved to Shanghai as an entrepreneur in 2009. In 2010, I returned to Ankara and continued entrepreneurial and business projects between Turkey and China.

When I was 10 years old, I started suffering from a life long disease: kidney failure... In 1992, after a short period of hemodialysis, I witnessed a miracle and had a kidney transplantation, which enabled me to accomplish all above mentioned career achievements. For 20 years, I had a relatively normal life. However, in 2012, my new kidney stopped and I returned to dialysis again. This time peritoneal dialysis...

Currently, like 200,000 people increasing at a 3% rate every year across the globe, I have to do peritoneal dialysis 4 times a day. Every single day... My health is stable however, it makes my travels extremely difficult, which is not nice at all in today's mobile world...

During this process I realised that a commercial portable IV pole is not available in the marketplace. An IV pole is not only used by peritoneal dialysis patients but also in many applications, where IV treatment is necessary: mobile hospitals, regular hospitals, doctors clinics and all kinds of self IV treatment patients.

column2: >For this reason together with Prof. Hakan Gürsu from Middle East Technical University
column3: >, we designed the first most beautiful portable IV pole.

column2: >Prof. Gürsu is well known across the globe and received 7 Green Dot Awards, which is one of the few most prestigious design awards in the world.

column1: In order to commercialise the product, we received prototype and serial production quotations from a Chinese manufacturer.

In this first stage, we would like to have the prototype manufactured by the factory and test it. In the second stage, we will enable marketing channels and enter serial production with the next round larger investment.

Our goal is to commercialise and present the useful portable IV pole for the peritoneal dialysis and other IV treatment patients. We would like to make those patients' lives easier by enabling them to travel easier without sacrificing quality of their inevitable treatments.
<ul>
• The prototype will enable us to start negotiations with medical companies for marketing
• Your support will contribute to the very difficult lives of peritoneal and other regular IV treatment patients across the globe

What is required?

Goals:

  • Create awareness and crowd finance for portable IV pole prototype manufacturing
• Create awareness for the second stage larger investment for serial production
• Present a useful product to make difficult lives easier and contribute to the well being of humanity
• Present an opportunity to help to those in need
• Create awareness through crowd funding and social media sharing of the project
• Create and commercialise the world's first most beautiful portable IV pole together
• In all cases, success or failure, make sure that the funds collected are used for the benefit of those patients in need

Impact

The prototype will be a step to our tests and serial production. 

  • Your support will make difficult lives easier
• You will support a design created by one of the world's leading designers from the Middle East Technical University

• You will contribute to the well being of not only peritoneal dialysis patients, who have to do dialysis 4 times every day, but also other regular IV treatment patients across the planet, and who knows, perhaps even in other planets one day, given that it is a truly portable product

    • Risks &
column2:
Challenges

The current challenge we face for the commercialisation of the product is costs of serial production and marketing. After prototype we will be able to negotiate with medical companies for marketing channels.

column1: We
column2: >have also started working on the intellectual property rights to secure the design of the product. International protection is costly.

>We are trying to solve these problems by:

  • We have received quotations and determined an alternative Chinese manufacturer for the prototype and serial production

column1:
• For legal issues and protection of intellectual property rights, we have agreed to cooperate with Middle East Technical University Teknokent, who provide us with a leading legal and patent consulting firm for this purpose.  

    • Things you can do

    Providing potential investors and clients are always welcome. Business connections and introduction of the project to international medical companies are also appreciated.

    • We ask you to get the word out and share our campaign

• Please use the Indiegogo share tools!

    • We wish you peace and health!

An IV pole is not only used by peritoneal dialysis patients but also in many applications, where IV treatment is necessary: mobile hospitals, regular hospitals, doctors clinics and all kinds of self IV treatment patients.
For this reason together with Prof. Hakan Gürsu from Middle East Technical University, we designed the first most beautiful portable IV pole.
Prof. Gürsu is well known across the globe and received 7 Green Dot Awards, which is one of the few most prestigious design awards in the world.
In order to commercialise the product, we received prototype and serial production quotations from a Chinese manufacturer.

About this project

The Beginnings

it all started 4 years ago with a simple idea: energy yogurt. Why wasn't there an energy yogurt? The two major industries of yogurt and energy drinks combined into 1 product. Sounds simple, right? A company was formed and the process began to develop an energy yogurt and bring it to market...it was harder than we thought. We were close to giving up, thinking that the reason there was not an energy yogurt on the market was simply because it couldn't be done.

The Catalyst

Not long after the company was formed and incorporated, Ryan's mother was diagnosed with breast cancer. We work in a hospital as nurse anesthetists and have seen hundreds, if not thousands, of patients being treated for breast cancer. It was a lot different when it was his own mother. In just 2 short months he suddenly found himself at her bedside in a hospice. The cancer was very aggressive and had spread to her lungs. The day before she passed away he told her about our idea of an energy yogurt. He promised her that not only was he going to make it happen, but he was going to make it happen for a good cause. After all, other yogurts have a pink cap month where they donate proceeds to support breast cancer research, why can't ZYN do the same thing? And that is exactly what ZYN will do once we grow our brand.
column7:
s=331107bf0812bdd35b0b78c8ffb52a98"" src="""" style=""""/>

The Process

After the promise was made, we went hard to work. We met with food scientists at the state university
column8: talked to fruit suppliers, yogurt producers, and vitamin suppliers. A formula was finally perfected and the brand was born. The product evolved from the single energy yogurt concept to 3 flavors of yogurt smoothies, each with its own distinct function (with more to come where YOU can pick the next flavor and/or function as a top level contributor).  A co-packer was secured, labels and websites were designed (www.zynsmoothies.com), and finally the stores are starting to agree to put ZYN smoothies on the shelves.

column1:
What are ZYN Smoothies?

ZYN Smoothies are ALL NATURAL and were developed by health care professionals to give your body what it needs to keep it protected, energized, and focused throughout the day. Each smoothie flavor is formulated for a specific function and blended together with drinkable yogurt--which gives you the added benefits of probiotics for digestive health, 40% of the RDI of Calcium for strong and healthy bones, and 8 grams of protein to help build and repair muscle. To top it off, the milk we use for our smoothies is free of rBST hormones and our smoothies are gluten free.
<li>

STRAWBERRY ENERGY: Whether it’s when you just wake up in the morning or at lunchtime to get you through the rest of your day, sometimes you need a pick-me-up. The problem is energy drinks and energy shots that many people rely on for energy are unhealthy and just really don’t taste very good. ZYN Energy solves your problem with a great tasting, healthy smoothie and an energy blend of Taurine, L-Carnitine, Inositol, and Glucuronolactone
column2: plus a healthy dose of B vitamins essential for energy metabolism.

column1: <li>

PEACH FOCUS: Our brains have billions of cells and they need all the help they can get so you can remain focused! ZYN Focus has the essentials that your brain needs to stay on track. A blend of B Vitamins, DHA Omega-3, Choline, Vitamin E, and Iron all combine to help your brain perform at its highest level.
<li>

BLUEBERRY IMMUNITY: Your body is exposed to illnesses, bacteria, and viruses on a daily basis—and let’s face it...we are all way too busy to get sick. ZYN Immunity contains the essential Vitamins A, C, D, E and Zinc that are vital for your body to fight off infections and provide a boost to your body’s immune system.

The Next Challenge

Yes, you guessed it...cash. Starting a business takes a considerable capital investment. Money has already been spent on the things already talked about (i.e. website, package design, product development)
column2: plus other things like lawyer fees, business insurance, and a refrigerated trailer for distribution into local channels. Extra money is now needed to help buy inventory to get us into larger retail chain stores, so that the ZYN brand can grow large enough to form successful relationships with foundations supporting finding a cure for breast cancer (e.g. The Breast Cancer Research Foundation www.bcrfcure.org). The $50,000 will tremendously help us get into more stores
column3: and, of course, if we go over our goal of $50,000 it will help us grow even faster!
column10:
s=7aa24968a696ffb0479ba1bc46f9898d"" src="""" style=""""/>

Rewards

I know...a lot of the rewards are apparel with ZYN logos on them. They are high quality, comfortable
column11: and, I know I'm biased, but I think our logo actually looks pretty cool to wear! Actual bottles of ZYN smoothies aren't available to backers until the higher level contributions. I wish I could give every backer at least 1 to try, but the problem is it requires overnight shipping in an insulated box which can be very expensive, so money would actually be lost on this campaign if everyone received a smoothie!
column24:
s=cf53f4c7be52a9b34ca562987ab24a2a"" src="""" style=""""/>

Thank you in advance for supporting the company and the cause!

Risks and challenges

One of the biggest challenges in the grocery business is that most of the big chain stores review and decide whether to put your product on the shelves during the first and second quarters of every year. If you miss out and don't get accepted, it's likely you have to wait an entire year to present your product to them again. 
We've already been accepted into a few small to medium sized chain stores, but we're trying to overcome the possibility of not getting into any more stores this year (although I doubt it will happen since ZYN is unique and has received great reception thus far) by building partnerships with local independent stores that will help us build up our sales volume.

                  Sienna's Dream To Walk
Sienna is a stunning 5 year old girl, she is beautiful, strong, determined and brave.
Sienna was born with Cerebral Palsy! Sienna was born on the 26th of March 2010 ( 8 weeks early ) Sienna is a triplet.
Sienna's road has been hard but she is a fighter.
She has been diagnosed with Cerebral Palsy, Autism and Epilepsy, Sienna has uncontrolled seizures which have caused her to stop breathing.
She has been through more in her first 5 years of life that anyone should in a lifetime. But she never gives up, she never stops smiling.
Sienna is unable to walk unaided, she is non verbal.
Her mum and dad are determined to make sure she has the best quality of life possible and that no one is going to put limitations on what Sienna can achieve.

Sienna has been accepted to have life changing surgery in St Louis.  This operation could be the difference between Sienna needing a full time carer  or a life of independence, But the operation alone comes at a cost of $78,000!
Sienna will have 4 weeks of rehab in the USA  then followed by  2 years of  rehab back here in Australia.
We aren't going to lie! this isn't going to be easy but its her chance in life!
All Sienna has ever wanted  is to  is walk along side with her brother &
You have the chance to be part of her journey and  make a difference!
Please watch our video and share!

Short Summary
Dagmar is an RN, 53 years old, mother of 5 boys and is dying from Stage 4 Cancer of her colon and liver. The prognosis is poor since the cancer is so advanced and chemotherapy hasn't been successful. The doctors give her 6 months or less. Two of her children are still in need of their mother, being only 10 and 12.

The Impact

Joshua 12 years and Jarod 10 are really the focus of this fundraiser. The goal of $50,000 is set to provide for Dagmar's final expenses but mostly to provide for her family. The family rents a small row home which is set for demolition very soon. Finding appropriate housing to keep the boys in their school district has been impossible as rentals are much higher than their current residence. The children will be facing a great loss very soon. Aware of their mothers illness, the family may actually be facing homelessness as well. Disability will never equal Dagmar's prior earnings and there are no funds for moving. Currently the boys are excelling in their studies, both on the school honor roll. Keeping them in their school would help them continue life with as much normalcy as possible. There is no safety net of funds....too many rainy days. There are no life insurance policies and it seems no new policy would pay out within the time Dagmar has. Most insurances, not for 2 years of initiating a policy. Dagmar, never known to be sickly, has been a dedicated nurse and mother, planned to work another 20 years... No one expects the first sign of a health problem to result in a terminal disease, much less with so little time left. Donations will keep Dagmar and her family from homelessness. If the goal is reached, it will be possible for the family to afford to stay locally, in their familiar home town where both her sons were born, have friends and the only change they will face is losing 'mom.' 

 

Risks &
column2:
Challenges

 I'm Dagmar and I have been on chemotherapy since June 2014. Although the 'treatment' is not expected to cure the cancer, it was hoped to extend what time I  have. So many side effects, I am not always the same mom my boys have been used to. They have been so supportive, helpful and especially affectionate to me through good days and bad. They are my special guys. Their stay-at-home dad  can't get past the feeling this is something he can't put his hands on and fix, so he makes sure I eat well and rest enough. Everyday since this began I stress if I'm doing enough myself....should I try a new chemo drug in clinical trials, but I may not get the new drug if I'm in a group which does not get the drug, or placebo group. I search the internet for side effects of my drugs (most of which I have), new cancer treatments and other's experiences. Even if there is an alternate treatment available, financially it may not be available to me. My BBB or Big Brother Buzz, or Francis, is very supportive and though he lives at a distance, he brought me to tears when he confessed that HE needs me around another 10 years at least.

Other Ways You Can Help

I know some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about ""My Sisters Stage 4 Cancer"" campaign.
  • Remember to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

The prognosis is poor since the cancer is so advanced and chemotherapy hasn't been successful. The doctors give her 6 months or less. Two of her children are still in need of their mother, being only 10 and 12.

column2: >I have spent most of my life creating  and using herbal remedies - I worked in the beauty industry, owned my own spa in NYC as well as worked behind the scene on commercial and fashion shoots.

column1: In 1999, I began researching natural ingredients and  spent six years working with two Licensed chemists, developing a line of organic natural nail products that provided treatment with no carcinogenic chemicals.
Growing up, I never took medicine- when sick, instead my grandmother gave me  herbal remedies that were prepared at home. Presently I eat organic food as well as keeping my mind and emotions clear.

Throughout the years, I shared many of these natural remedies with friends and clients and I have had an amazing number of testimonials and words of gratitude of some miraculous healings. Many problems could not be resolved by the medical community, but my grandmother’s solution worked!
I was encouraged by friends and clients to write a book with these recipes and share it with the public as a service to help thousands have healthier choices.

It seems that the population of the world is becoming more aware of natural organic foods and cures and are much more interested in alternative approaches.   Our environments are being further polluted with chemicals in the air, soil, and our waters.
I am now compiling the material into a lavishly illustrated 144-page hardcover book.
""Mamanjoon's Secret Potions""  - history, legend and natural recipes from  the ancient land of Persia.
You can see sample images of the book in the 'gallery' page.
What We Need
Having written the text, taken high-quality photographs and- collected archive photos, I now need to produce the book into a final product.
Your pledge will help fund the following:
• Finishing the text, book design, and artwork.
• A professional book editor to check the work, correct errors, and keep standards high.
• Licensing of additional images
• ISBN book numbering and registration.
• Colour printers proofs.
• Print the books (professionally printed on FSC paper sourced from sustainable forests.)
• Promotional materials and review copies.
What You Get

In return, your pledge will ensure you are among the first to receive a signed copy of this new and fascinating book (or whatever goods you have pledged for), with your name printed on a special contributors page as a thank you. Delivered around March of 2016, in time for Spring. Safe in the knowledge that you have helped bring an independent and worthwhile project to life.
The Impact

When viewed in a single volume, this stunning collection of natural remedies, along with their history, legend and mythology, presents an extraordinary record of the rich variety of ancient remedies worldwide. While also telling a human story. A celebration of my grandmother's legacy, through words and pictures, the book ultimately calls for their preservation.
Risks &
• As a new  author, I was lucky to have successful authors as friends to guide me.
• I need to achieve a printer deadline and finish the book by November.
•  I understand the production pitfalls and challenges involved in producing a book.
• I have national distribution lined up to make the book available through all the usual outlets.
This book will happen. Any additional funds raised will help increase the print run.
Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute financially, please share my project via social media or e-mail, using the Indiegogo link, as spreading the news far and wide will be key for making ""Mamanjoon's Secret Potions"" a reality.

What is “High Saffron”?
As a Person -

Many people who become students of a Healing and/or Spiritual practices accept a new name, being a part of the Queer Community amplified this need to be renamed and thusly have my identity rooted. My name is Saffron, you can call me Saff.
As a Business -

High Saffron as a business will provide sensitivity in Healing and Movement practices. The mission is to Travel, Research, provide Bodywork, and provide Teaching services to people from all walks of life, all body types, and all levels of ability.
• Why Travel?

The world is vast and there is rich information regarding Moving and Healing to be gleaned from all the small corners of the world. I want to do the work of going out and accruing the information so I can bring it back to you.
• Why Research?

Through a live blog on my pending website I will be a resource for you to access information both common and uncommon so that you may deepen your understanding of your body and of bodies in general. My mission with the blog is also to provide perspectives from bodies that may be different from you so that we can deepen our compassion for each other.
• And what about the Bodywork and Teaching?

This will be the Life Blood of High Saffron. As I travel and research I will be offering my services to the various individuals and institutions I encounter along the way such as: yoga studios, healing centers, medical practices, retreats, and the various generous hosts I have along the way. I am a certified Personal Trainer, Pilates Teacher, and Cupping Therapist so these will be the modes I work within initially. The goal is to add Licenses, Certifications, and Alternative Modes to this list and to melt them together in real time to provide truly unique experiences.
The $Breakdown$
What do I need and what do you get? -
<ul>
• I need $1500 JUST to get started. This covers my cost for filing my LLC, Upgrading my bodywork equipment, purchasing and designing my website and blog, and embarking on my first travel adventure.
• PERKS!!! New York Locals who donate $60 will get an hour cupping session from me in my lovely home in Brooklyn. Locals who donate $100 will get an hour cupping session in your own lovely home.

• If my goal is not met, don’t fret. My first priority is upgrading my bodywork and body training equipment so that is where your money will go if we fall short. (But I can feel in my bones that the goal will be met.)
Your Impact

It is important to understand that what you’re contributing to is the beginning. I continuously prove to my friends, family, and myself that if given the opportunity I can turn a small spark into a bonfire.
So today it is just me traveling, researching, and providing healing and teaching services
column2: in the future it will be an entire institution wherein people can come to be treated and to create a deeper intimacy with themselves.

column1: You’re contributing to self-love and to healing the world.
Other Ways You Can Help

If you love the mission, but do not wish to contribute in this liquid way I invite you to check out my Amazon Wish list. I have compiled a list of equipment I would be purchasing with the money raised here, but any item that can be purchased before frees up more money to go into the travel fund.

Here is the link: https://www.amazon.com/gp/registry/wishlist/2ST...

4th Trimester Bodies Project is an ongoing photo-documentary and global movement created by founder and photographer ash luna. Spanning 7 years and over 3,000 families they've learned first hand what is important to supporting people through all phases of pregnancy and postpartum and know intimately what is lacking from the current supports available.

91% or folks surveyed stated they wanted their pregnancy app to provide more support. Frustrated and empowered we've taken it upon ourselves to develop an app that is truly supportive and accessible to all.
Our pregnancy and postpartum app is the first of it's kind to be:
<ul>
<li>
Body positive - We believe that every body is capable and worthy and believe in the concepts of health at any size.
<li>
Queer-affirming - We use non-gendered language and do not default to heteronormative relational/family dynamics as they relate to conception, gestation, birth, infant feeding, and postpartum.
<li>
Anti-racist - We include specific supports and acknowledge the current disparities in care for black, brown, and indigenous people in our society. We do not default to whiteness.
<li>
Full spectrum - We acknowledge that abortion care is an important aspect of our reproductive health and include abortion info, resources, and support.
<li>
Inclusive - Our app is fully accessible, and includes perspectives of and resources for disabled parents.
<li>

Trauma and loss informed - We acknowledge that miscarriage and stillbirth can be normal pregnancy outcomes and include resources and support for those navigating loss or experiencing pregnancy after loss. We also include support for folks who are may have other traumas triggered throughout pregnancy, birth, and postpartum.
<li>
Evidence based - All information provided is based on the best available current science / medical research and is supportive of a persons right to access care in whatever setting they choose.
<li>
Postpartum support - We include full 4th Trimester support from relatable narratives, to infant feeding, pelvic floor therapy resources, postpartum mental health support, and more.
<li>

For All - Whether you are a trying to conceive, are currently pregnant, newly postpartum OR you are a non-gestational parent, or birth worker this app is for YOU. 

Our app also includes easy to navigate access to 4th Trimester Bodies Project's archive of stunning photography and intimate narratives from thousands of pregnant and postpartum people.
What We Need &

We've been quietly working on the development of this app for nearly a year now thanks to the dedicated (and donated) time and talent of our small team of parents and we are committed to now getting it into your hands but we need your help!
<ul>
• We are committed to keeping this app ad free and keeping your data safe.
• Unlike other related apps we are not backed by a corporation or medical entity.
• That means that 100% of your funding goes to building and supporting the app itself and the humans (parents!) creating it.
<li>The entire project will cost us approximately $100,000 to launch but we've got to start somewhere! A break down of our current costs and ongoing fees are below: <ul>
• $15,000 - developer
• $5,000 - $10,000 - artwork and illustrators
• $15,000 - $30,000 - content (writers, licensing, consulting, review)
• $5,000 - $10,000 - annual fees and upkeep
• $25,000 - smart people (legal, marketing, etc)
The Impact
We believe in the ability to support and include all people through what can be one of the most empowering transitions of our lives and our research shows that others want and need that too!

We already have an established community of over 200,000 people online and want to reach even more. We want all parents to have quick and easy access to information and to feel supported and seen every step of the way.
Other Ways You Can Help

• While every contribution helps we understand that not everyone can give financially and that's fine! If you can't spare a dollar you can still help greatly by sharing this campaign and the greater project with your friends, fam, and online communities.

The Illinois Gators are a local non-profit Adult Amateur Football team that has been around for five years with men 18 and older. These men have had rough patches in their life but currently do great things in the community not just on the football field. The Gators have read books, to local schools, and libraries.  For the last past 4 years we have partnered with the YMCA, Healthy Kids Day ,encouraging kids to eat healthy and stay out of trouble, Morning star Missionary .  The Illinois Gators have seen and witnessed the pain on the Jackie Robinson baseball team that is all so familiar. As a team that has gone thru ups and downs the Illinois Gators would like to step up and be mentors to these young kids. To help them deal with the disappointment that they have just incurred letting them know someone is behind them.  The Gators would like to help these young men, by raising money to get them their own Chicago World Series trophy and championship rings and a banquet, to celebrate the hard work that has been stripped from them.  The Gators are also looking to raise money to help with travel in getting them to all the Illinois Gators Football games this 2015 year. Which the team and coaches of the Illinois Gators organization have agreed to be big brothers and sister to the Jackie Robinson team for the 2015 season and hope many more to keep these kids on a straight path.

Short Summary

My name is Raymond, I live in Prague Czech Republic. I have experience with computer programing, sales and working as a business development manager.

My project is about connecting people with sports. 

Findsportsmate is a website and a mobile application that will find you a sports centre and a sports mate using your GPS location.

A lot of us spend time on the computer or mobile device even after work. As a result, calories start piling up. The easier access to sports centre and availability of a sport mate, will motivate people to play and enjoy their favourite sport.

Wouldn't it be better to spend more time playing sport while making new friends using Findsportsmate?

All team sports will be listed, so you too can Findsportsmate for your favourite sport.


What We Need &
column2:
What You Get

I need money to finance this project.

All funds will be invested into development, improvement and running of  Findsportsmate application and website for one year without profit.

There will be other costs, such as payment of servers, webhosting, software licence cost, marketing and advertisement.

I am also looking for experienced programmers to help me  finish work in progress.

column1:
Findsportsmate will be free for everyone for the first 12 months after which a premium fee applies. All perks are valid after the first 12 months free access expires.

  • Remember if you donate $5 your name will appear on a credit page which will be included in the website.
• Donate $10 to get 3 months premium access and your name will appear on the credit page.
• If you donate $25 you will have 6 months free premium account and your name will appear on the credit page.
• $50 donation will get you free extra 12 months premium account and your name will appear on the credit page.
• Donation of $100 and more will get you 24 months of free premium account, your name will appear on the credit page and you will receive a certificate of sponsorship.

Reaching the Goal


  • If I don't reach the goal in the first go, I will keep going, restarting the fundraiser till we get there, so come on and join in :)
• Everybody is a winner! Because you will make more friends and stay healthy  for a happy life which you can't buy with money.

The Impact


You are contributing to changing peoples lives. Many of us today would like to be fit but sometimes work load, inconsistent free time schedule, location of sports centres and other factors could stop us from enjoying our favourite sport. Findsportsmate has addressed all these limitations and location factors. Are you shy about your size? Well, this is your chance to challenge yourself. With Findsportsmate we expect that you will find someone who is facing the same issues just like you.

Your donation will motivate people to do more sports.

Findsportsmate will connect people with sports and encourage healthy lifestyle.
A lot of us spend time with computers everyday, this is a chance to take care of our body as well as our mental health.

Findsportsmate will help people find soulmates and be happy.

 

Risks &
column2:
Challenges

 One of the challenges will be time management. A lot of time will be required to complete the website and mobile application. We will work hard  to shorten the development time to 3 months with your support. 

 I have IT and business development background and I believe that my contribution will help realise this project.

column1:
Competition:

Currently there is no competitor at least to my best of knowledge.

Sports centres will be happy to join our network because it will bring them more customers.

 I will recruit bloggers, YouTube , Facebook, LinkedIn and any relevant media as tools to propagate Findsportsmate project.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please ring the bells, tell your friends and friend of friends, blow your trumpets, make some more noise about Findsportsmate and you too can donate now.

    How The eTablet Holder Started:

Chris is a salesman and often travels for business staying at different hotels.  During his travels, he brings his tablet because it is light and easy to carry.  After meeting with clients, he returns to his hotel room to finish up the day's work. With the tablet in hand, Chris propped up on the king size bed, rested his back against the headboard, and began working. He quickly became frustrated because he could not use both hands.  He grabbed a pillow and looked around the hotel room for various objects to secure the tablet in place. He tried a few things, but nothing worked.

When Chris returned home, he began thinking of ways to secure the tablet to a pillow. After trial and error, he successfully developed a lightweight, portable, adjustable strap in order to easily secure a tablet to any standard size pillow.  The strap is simple to use at home or in any hotel room.  This means comfort at its best.  And, as they say, ""the rest is history.""
Problem of many other Tablet holders:
Have to be attached to a device or stand on a table.

Are sometimes difficult to assemble.
Are bulky f.ex. carrying a pillow with you or it is heavy and not very portable.
Cannot be used on different size devices.
Solution:
The eTablet Holder:

1)   Can be placed over any standard size pillow.
   2)   Is comfortable to use if you sit on a sofa, in a chair, or in bed.
   3)   You can type with both hands.
   4)   Is adjustable for different size tablets.
   5)   Easily tilts so you can find the perfect viewing angle.
   6)   Provides complete access to all the functions on your tablet.
   7)   Is protected from slipping and falling on the floor.
   8)   Is made of strong construction, holds safely up to 100 lbs.
   9)   Is suited for travel because it is lightweight and fits into a small space.
   10)   Is quick and easy to assemble and disassemble.
The prototype stumbles:
In designing the eTablet Holder I went through at least 10 rounds of prototypes over that last 5 months.
Challenges:
<h4 style=""margin: 0.0px 0.0px 0.0px 0.0px
<span style=""white-space: pre
1)    Simple set up.
2)    Strong materials.
3)    An elegant design.
4)    Easy access to functions.
5)    Universal fit on all tablet sizes.
<h4 style=""margin: 0.0px 0.0px 0.0px 0.0px
<div>
Additional Ideas for the:   The eTablet Holder:
1)   Can be branded with a logo on the straps.
2)   Will be available in different colors (solid or multi-color).
3)   Can be made in different sizes for smaller pillows.
Materials used:
Webbing, Rivets, Parachute Cord, Cord Lock and a D-ring
Parachute cord: Breaking strength of 100 pounds and higher.
Polypropylene Webbing:
Thickness of 0.040 Breaking strength range of 300 to 1200 pounds
Current State of Product Development:
We now have a working prototype and have completed our evaluation and testing of the final design.
Risks:
There is always a risk of delay caused by unforeseen problems.
What the funds are used for:
Patent costs that we want to bring our Provisional Patent into an Utility Patent status.
Website construction.
Manufacturing/packaging/design costs.
Other ways of Helping:

By sharing this Indiegogo campaign with your friends, family, co-workers and even strangers! Spread the word via Facebook, Instagram, Twitter and other social media to let the world know about the eTablet Holder.
Perks:

Webbing, Rivets, Parachute Cord, Cord Lock and a D-ring
Parachute cord: Breaking strength of 100 pounds and higher.
Polypropylene Webbing:
Thickness of 0.040 Breaking strength range of 300 to 1200 pounds
Current State of Product Development:
We now have a working prototype and have completed our evaluation and testing of the final design.
Risks:
There is always a risk of delay caused by unforeseen problems.
What the funds are used for:
Patent costs that we want to bring our Provisional Patent into an Utility Patent status.
Website construction.
Manufacturing/packaging/design costs.
Other ways of Helping:

By sharing this Indiegogo campaign with your friends, family, co-workers and even strangers! Spread the word via Facebook, Instagram, Twitter and other social media to let the world know about the eTablet Holder.
Perks:",13.0,0,"1 Campaign

column13:
>OUR STORY - CHASING A CURE

The Chinta Island founders had tried every product on the market to treat their acne and reduce their scarring - but nothing worked. On a trip to Indonesia, they discovered the ancient secret of using Coconut Oil as a moisturiser and skin healer. Using what they learned in Indonesia at home in Australia, for the first time, they began to see improvements in their skin.

Years of trial, error and laboratory research lead to the development of their own skin care products that combined the benefits of Organic Coconut Oil with modern science to deliver products that not only feel amazing, but which naturally work to heal problem skin. 

Coconut Oil and Almond Oil form the base of all Chinta Island products. These oils are rich in fatty acids, proteins, vitamins and antibacterial agents. When combined with other active ingredients such as Marine Collagen, Bamboo, Macdamia Oil, Shea and Aloe - Chinta Island Skin Care nourishes dry skin and works to improve acne, eczema, psoriasis, wrinkles, blackheads and even the appearance of cellulite!

Unlike other brands on the market, Chinta Island products are Vegan, Cruelty Free and sustainably produced. No harsh chemicals, parabens or fillers are used.

Chinta Island is a global lifestyle brand for those who love the sun, nature and who care about the products they use. We donate 5% of our profits to local charities in the countries from which we source our Organic Coconut Oil.

We need your investment to help us grow our product range and to spread the Chinta Island love - to assist us in changing faces and bodies world wide.  We want to help others feel beautiful, confident and happy in their skin.  So please, watch our video and read on to learn about our brand and best of all, take advantage of one of our amazing Perks listed below!

THE PRODUCTS

We currently have a Face and Body Range - with 5 products in total.  All products have a base of Organic Coconut &
column14: Almond Oil and other natural goodies like Macadamia Oil, Shea, Aloe, Vitamin E, Marine Collagen, Bamboo, Natural Clay, Soya Bean Oil and more.
column16:
/>

The Body Range contains our amazing:

1. Body + Sun Oil which is a signature blend of oils and mineral zinc, delivering low-level natural SPF for those who love to play in the sun without lathering themselves in chemical sunscreens
column17: 2. Body Polish Scrub which can be used from head-to-toe and contains fine bamboo particles - to exfoliate, remove dry skin and improve conditions like eczema, psoriasis, acne and stretch marks. It is also fantastic at improving circulation and reducing the appearance of cellulite
column18:
and

3. Body Lotion which smells like summer in a bottle and keeps your skin glowing, hydrated and smooth all year round. 

The Face Range includes our beautiful:

1. Face Moisturiser - a light, non-greasy day/night cream which is packed with Marine Collagen from deep-sea plants. It fights wrinkles and plumps skin leaving it more youthful and radiant
column19:
and 

2. Face Mask which is made from premium Australian Kaolin White Clay blended with Organic Coconut &
column20: Almond Oils - it's like a chemical peel for your skin without the the chemicals.  Fights acne scarring and removes deep blackheads.
column22:
/>

THE BRAND

We launched our amazing products online at chintaisland.com in December 2014. Despite spending no money on SEM, our online sales have grown rapidly - from one order a day to 10+ per day! We constantly get requests to grant wholesale rights and to sell in retail stores - but at this stage, we are keeping our coconuts pretty close to our chest. We are careful to find the right stores which fit with our brand's ethos - hopefully we'll get to YOUR favourite store soon!

WHAT PEOPLE SAY

We ship worldwide and customers all over the globe are raving about the results they have got from using our products - and they are telling their friends!

Our results speak for themselves with customers telling us:

""My skin looks better than it ever has - thank you so much!""

""Your Body Polish is the only thing that has worked to clear my psoriasis and to give me the confidence to wear a t-shirt""

""The Chinta Island Body + Sun Oil is sooo good... love that I can lay in the sun without getting burned and without having chemicals all over my body""

""OMG your Face Mask is the best - I couldn't believe how fresh my skin looked after using it for a week, WOW, WOW, WOW""

Plus people are engaging with us on Social Media - with over 12K followers on Instagram (@chintaisland) and 2K+ on Facebook (Chinta Island).  Customers, celebs and personalities are sharing their 'selfies' and spreading the word about our brand. 

WHAT'S NEXT?

We need your help to grow the Chinta Island brand.   We want to educate the world to ditch the nasty, overpriced, chemical laden products and switch to products that not only do what they promise, but which make the world a better place. To do this we need your investment to help grow our online presence at chintaisland.com and to assist us in expanding into your favourite stores. 

We have 5 new products ready to launch - some amazing goodness for the hair, face, lips and hands.   We can't wait to get these products onto beautiful faces and bodies and start helping other people realise how good it feels to have clear, glowing, healthy skin. 

WANT TO TRY IT - THE PERKS

Want to try Chinta Island? Of course you do!  Check out one of our amazing perks and experience your best skin ever whilst helping to grow our special brand. Enjoy massive savings on our normal prices plus access our soon-to-be-released products before anyone else! Don't miss out!

Deysi Aleydi , 13,  was born with a cleft lip and cleft palate.
Unfortunately, these are common deformities among newborn babies born in
Guatemala. As an infant, she received her initial surgery at the Public
Hospital with a team of international medical volunteers. With the closure of
her palate, she was able to obtain nutrition and survived. However, she did not
receive the follow-up care and necessary surgeries so that she could speak
clearly. Her palate required another surgery that was not done. Her teeth are
scattered through out the roof of her mouth. And her lip requires
reconstruction surgery. Because of these deformities, she is unable to pass her
grades in school. The teachers continually fail her because they cannot
understand her. Speech therapy has not been successful. She has also been a
target of bullying and taunting among the neighborhood peers. Thanks to recent
volunteers with Nueva Generación, their evaluations indicate that Deysi possesses average intelligence and could actually do quite well in school.
However, there is little hope for her success if her speech is not improved.
Near Deysi’s village of San Antonio Aguas Calientes, there
is an internationally recognized surgeon in Antigua, Guatemala, Dr. Rodolfo Asensio.
He has developed unique techniques that can reconstruct the lip and palate of
these children. He has a clinic with an orthodontist and speech therapist who
work in partnership with Dr. Asensio.  Dr. Asensio's clinic, Centro Infantil de Estomatolgía, has agreed to do both surgeries for $1000. The fee covers Deysi's surgeries and two stays at the
clinic (which will be 4-6 weeks apart) and includes 4-5 day stays in the clinic
with 24 hour nursing care, anesthesia services during surgery and post
medications. Once Deysi heals from surgery, she will begin the orthodontic work
to correct her teeth alignment to promote functional speech. This will require
3-4 years of orthodontics at a cost of $40 each month plus initial visit and xrays. We are
calculating $4000 to cover all costs, exams and speech therapy. A generous donor has already contributed $750, leaving us $3250 to raise.
Deysi is a wonderful young teenager. She is loving, kind,
and appreciative. Deysi cries about school, because she wants to attend school
like everyone else. Because of her low grades, she was recently placed in a
“special” class that has 12 students (ages 6-18) all with a variety of physical
and mental disabilities. A preschool curriculum is being used! She is sad about
her education and does not want to be in this classroom. She is especially
close with her younger sister, Angelica and has 4 more siblings. Deysi's family
is very supportive but struggles economically. Her father has a seizure
disorder and is homebound. Her mother is an excellent weaver and is always
weaving along with cooking and caring for her family. As many of the Mayan
families, they live in a tin roof structure with dirt floors.
This is Deysi’s chance for a different life! Please help by
contributing to this campaign at any level possible and by spreading the word
by sharing this link through Facebook and other social media. With your
assistance, we can help Deysi find her voice and give her a smile!
Thank you!!!
Additional Information
Deysi has been with Nueva Generación since she was eight.
Nueva Generación is a 501(c)(3) organization based in the United States. Its
mission is to provide education to the most needy students in the village.
Extra support is provided through tutoring, computer access and a lending
library. A local preschool is provided for the youngest learners. Nueva
Generación works to empower this next generation by recognizing their strengths
and overcoming obstacles that are preventing their achievement.
Nueva Generación www.NuevaGen.org
Centro Infantil de Estomatología  www.asocie.org

Short Summary

The Days were recently involved in a devastating auto accident that resulted in severe injuries to several members of their family.  Chris tells the story in the Facebook post that I've pasted down below but, suffice it to say, it has been an enormous event in their lives.  The simple purpose of this campaign is to provide a place where concerned friends and family members can contribute to the Days in whatever way we can.  Thank you for your willingness to  help out and please keep the Days in your thoughts in the weeks and months ahead as their family recovers together.



The Story in full from Chris:
column2:
>I guess by now quite a few of you have heard something happened to us. I've had many emails and text asking what happened and I apologize to those that I've been unable to answer back. This post is to fill in the details. 

My family was recently in a horrific car crash. We were run off the road and our car rolled multiple times over a 140-150 yard stretch at highway speeds. I heard that we rolled possibly 7-8 times where another said 10-12 times. 
My oldest daughter London was thrown from the car with a severe concussion, memory loss and a lacerated arm that will need plastic surgery. My Youngest daughter Payton walked away with whiplash and a scratch on her leg. I'm fine and was bruised with cuts, scrapes and pain in my neck and back but I think that I will be ok. Our little Dog Lola, did not make it. (I've heard differing reports of what happened to her as well). 
My main concern is my wife Angel. She has a broken neck covering two vertebrae. The breaks are near arteries going to her brain that could cause an aneurism or paralysis so they want to wait on operating until the break heals. Angel also has bulging discs that cause nerve issues into her shoulder back and arm. Even the heavier drugs do not elevate the pain in her shoulder down to her fingertips in her left arm. She will be unable to work from between 2-4 months (Doctor today said 6-8 weeks possibly longer). I had to cut short my show in North Carolina but will be back the last week of shooting and to wrap out gear and my apartment. 
There is no reason that we should be alive, but I'm grateful that we are!
On top of all of this, my insurance was canceled because the government can't confirm that I'm a US citizen. Preposterous I know, considering that they had my birth certificate, drivers license, and passport (not to mention that I have a security clearance from the Whitehouse!)
I'm sure that I will be reimbursed for everything after they clear up their SNAFU (I hope), but they say it could take 30 to 90 days and everything is coming out of pocket! To make things worse. After all of that, I come home to find a ticket was sent to me in the mail by the officer on the scene. ( Patrolman K. House badge# 768 Foristell, Mo. Police department) the ticket reads
column3:
""Unlawful lane change resulting in a Motor Vehicle accident""
WE NEVER CHANGED LANES!!! WE WERE RUN OFF THE ROAD!!!
Life can change in the blink of an eye. Please hug your loved ones and tell them that you Love them!!
Thanks to all of our friends and family who found out about this, and reached out!
I hope this clears up some questions. 
Thanks so much again,
Chris Day and Family.

","READY, SET, GO!  CAMP ROYAL | COLORADO
ROYAL's mission is to make sure the young people of this next generation understand their value in God's eyes by sharing His love with them via action sports.

We are bringing together our network of close friends including pro action sports athletes & leading summer camp professionals from Young Life, Sky Ranch, Kanakuk & more to launch the WORLD'S FIRST faith-based action sports training camp in the foothills of Colorado.

After a few years of searching for the perfect inaugural camp location, we've found ""the one!” ROYAL has a contract on a pristine 145-acre property located just south of Denver, Colorado that will prove to be THE ultimate action sports training ground for athletes at every level, from beginners to world-class pros.

By contributing to this campaign, you will help us purchase the CAMP ROYAL | COLORADO property so that we can be up & running as soon as Summer 2016, training children of the King ages 11-18 in both sports performance & spiritual discipline!
WHAT WE NEED & WHAT YOU GET
To break it down for you...

ROYAL has already raised $120K toward the down payment for our Colorado property. Now, we are calling on YOU to help fund the remaining $230K necessary to make this perfect plot of land CAMP ROYAL | COLORADO's home. Generosity above & beyond the down payment will fund requisite updates & renovations to the property such as:
Building a commercial kitchen in the main lodge [$38k]
A central septic & water system [$175k]
ROYAL Throne Room expansion - aka restroom renovations [$40k]
Construction of the paintball courses, mountain bike & BMX trails [$170k]
Ministry vehicles for transporting kids safely to & from camp [$56k]
Digital media equipment & programs [$75k]
Worship facility upgrades [$50k]
Zip lines & ropes course [Phase 1 - $75k]

Not only will you ensure that today's youth have the opportunity to understand their identity as children of God while simultaneously receiving elite action sports training, you will also get some pretty legit ROYAL gear!
