The world first digital therapy platform
for seizure control

column2: >We are raising funds to develop the therapy platform

column1: <a href=""http://www.neurologyreviews.com/?id=24816&amp
column3: cHash=70ce8f367ad0d31efdfd51cc95202b64"" rel=""noopener nofollow"" target=""_blank"">

column1: <a href=""http://www.neurocaregroup.com/"" rel=""noopener nofollow"" target=""_blank"">
<div style=""margin: 60px 0 20px 0
<h2 style=""color: #3080ce

Impact of therapy transformation
by digital technology
<div style=""margin: 60px 0 20px 0
<h2 style=""color: #3080ce

ACRT is a behavioural therapy for developing control of seizures. Through interactive online sessions, a participant will develop a specific set of skills to prevent and stop seizures. Once a participant obtain these skills, the effect can last for many years. ACRT is a non-invasive, side-effect free, effective and affordable therapy.

ACRT consists of 12 sessions, each session lasting about 45 minutes. To achieve the best effect, we recommend allocating three sessions a week (e.g. Monday, Wednesday and Friday) over a 4-week period.
During each session, you will also receive instructions and practice the technique, which you will then be able to start applying in your daily life.
<div style=""margin: 60px 0 20px 0
<h2 style=""color: #3080ce
How does ACRT work?

The therapy embodies both physiological and psychological approaches. Our thoughts and emotions are closely linked to our bodily responses and behaviour. Events in our daily lives trigger thoughts that in turn give rise to emotions that change both our bodily stress responses and our behaviour.

Psychological treatments, such as Cognitive Behavioural Therapy (CBT), argue that psychological distress is caused by distorted thoughts (or thinking habit) that trigger negative emotions and unhelpful behaviours. CBT helps you identify these distorted thoughts and correct them so that you can have more realistic and balanced way of thinking.
ACRT extends this CBT model by also
taking a more holistic account of the role of the body in the expression of emotional
feelings and thoughts, and by working directly on physiological aspects of well-being.
Published research shows that more
than 80% of people with epilepsy consider stress and anxiety to be a major factor in causing seizures. It is therefore very important to understand the mechanisms
of how the mind, brain and body interact.
Drug treatments on their own cannot give this understanding

Using ACRT, you will see how your body responds to your thinking and emotion. By receiving visual feedback about how your body reacts, you will be able to train yourself to become more sensitive to your bodily reactions and control your body’s state of alertness. Through this process, you will also learn how to stabilize your emotion.
<div style=""margin: 60px 0 20px 0
<h2 style=""color: #3080ce
Who will benefit?
People with epilepsy who experience brief
auras are particularly good candidates for this type of therapy. However this is
by no means a requirement for a successful outcome. There are people without
any aura who reduce seizures by more than two thirds or more of seizures after a month of therapy.
A modified set of instructions is given in the platform for those people who do
not have an aura. People whose seizures occur predominantly with stress,
anxiety and low mood are also good candidates. Unfortunately, clinical
experience suggests that ACRT in its present form does not work as well for people who have a significant learning disability.
<div style=""margin: 60px 0 20px 0
<h2 style=""color: #3080ce
Did you know?
<div style=""margin-bottom: 40px

column2: >- About one in hundred people suffer from epilepsy. 600,000 people in the UK and 50 million worldwide.

column1: - Of these 30% are drug resistant. 180,000 people in the UK and 15 million people worldwide.
- The cost of surgical treatment is $15,581 - $27,000 / patient (Heaney &amp
column2: Begley, 2002 Epilepsia). In the UK, there are about 1000 operations for epilepsy conducted every year.

column1: - The annual cost of uncontrolled epilepsy is £3,508/ patient (Platt &amp
- About $ 13 billion worth of anti-epileptic drugs are prescribed every year in the world (Mackey, 2010 Nature).
Considering the above together, an effective,
non-invasive, accessible and affordable behavioural therapy for epilepsy represents a worthwhile goal that will impact significantly on the
lives of people who suffer from, or whose lives are otherwise affected by,
epilepsy.
<div style=""margin: 60px 0 20px 0
<h2 style=""color: #3080ce
About Dr Yoko Nagai

Dr Yoko Nagai began her research in electrodermal biofeedback therapy for epilepsy in 1997. This research has since attracted scientific research funding of over £300,000 that has enabled clinical trials and a deeper understanding of the brain mechanisms by which the therapy can reduce the occurrence of epileptic seizures. Dr Nagai also founded the Biofeedback Clinic in 2005, in response to demand from patients at the National Hospital for Neurology and Neurosurgery, University College London.

At the clinic, she treated people with epilepsy on a private basis, enabling her to continue to pursue her university research activity. There are many advantages to face-to-face therapy, but only a few people can be treated at a time, and this can be frustrating for the majority of people who wish to access the therapy in this form. Dr Nagai is now seeking to share her expertise and treatment with people globally who are in need for this effective non-drug therapy, which is termed Autonomic Cognitive Rehabituation Training (ACRT).
<div style=""margin: 60px 0 20px 0
<h2 style=""color: #3080ce
Science
Dr Nagai's research started with investigations
into how brain and peripheral body reactions are related each other. We think that when our brain gets excited, our body does too, but it is not always the case.
Dr Nagai measures and observes a body
signal called electrodermal activity (EDA)/Galvanic Skin Response (GSR) which
is very sensitive to our thoughts and emotions. You may know already that EDA
is used in lie detector tests. Dr Nagai’s research has extensively
investigated how changes in EDA also modulate different brain signals.  To this end Dr Nagai has applied tools
including electroencephalography (EEG) and functional MRI (fMRI). For people
who would like to know more, the ACRT platform will have ""a science
box"" to click, where you can get all the information in lay terms.
<div style=""margin: 60px 0
<h4 style=""color: #7d7d7d
The results from the clinical trial.

column5: >(adapted from Nagai et al. Epilepsy and Behaviour 2004, Vol 5/2: 216-223.)
>(adapted from Nagai et al. Psychosomatic Medicine 2009, 71: 84-92.)

column3: >These participants all had drug resistant epilepsy,

column1: and had been on different types of medication for many years
(for some of them, over 20years).
<div style=""margin: 60px 0
<h4 style=""color: #7d7d7d
The effect of the treatments over three years

column5: >(adapted from Nagai et al. Epilepsy Research 2014, 108: 149-52.)
>(adapted from Nagai et al. Epilepsy Research 2014, 108: 149-52.)

column1: Once a participant learns the skill of controlling seizures through the training sessions, the effect can last for many years.
<div style=""margin: 60px 0
<h4 style=""color: #7d7d7d
The functional activity of distinct brain regions changes
regions changes over the course of the therapy. Our research shows that one
month of ACRT training increases resilience of people to anxiety-related
seizure attacks.
Dr Nagai is currently investigating further
neural mechanisms through which ACRT helps seizure control. This
project is funded by a UK major research charitable body, the Wellcome Trust.
<div style=""margin: 60px 0 20px 0
<h2 style=""color: #3080ce
Timeline
<div style=""background: #ededed
<div style=""margin: 60px 0 20px 0
<h2 style=""color: #3080ce
Why Crowd fund?

In the field of epilepsy research, most of scientific funding is directed at drug research and understanding genetic associations. Consequently, research into behavioural treatments attracts very little investment (although Dr Nagai is one of a very few lucky scientists able to maintain active research in this area funded by research grants). This fact also means that behavioural treatments do not get the same priority or attention at scientific conferences and where there are sessions on the topic, these are often poorly attended. This creates a vicious circle.

Without exposing this research to the medical community and to patients with epilepsy, this effective new therapy, which could benefit many people with epilepsy, may remain confined to scientific research. We very much feel that the time is right for us to disseminate Dr Nagai's expertise and make her treatment accessible for as many people as might need this new approach.

Crowd funding was chosen as the route to make this possible as it will facilitate bringing this therapy quickly to patients, through the investment of people directly interested in the success of this approach. Crowd-funding also presents the best opportunity to increase awareness and facilitate the implementation of this non-invasive behavioural therapy for epilepsy.

CBT helps you identify these distorted thoughts and correct them so that you can have more realistic and balanced way of thinking.
ACRT extends this CBT model by also
taking a more holistic account of the role of the body in the expression of emotional
feelings and thoughts, and by working directly on physiological aspects of well-being.
Published research shows that more
than 80% of people with epilepsy consider stress and anxiety to be a major factor in causing seizures. It is therefore very important to understand the mechanisms
of how the mind, brain and body interact.
Drug treatments on their own cannot give this understanding

Using ACRT, you will see how your body responds to your thinking and emotion. By receiving visual feedback about how your body reacts, you will be able to train yourself to become more sensitive to your bodily reactions and control your body’s state of alertness. Through this process, you will also learn how to stabilize your emotion.

Did you know?
- About one in hundred people suffer from epilepsy. 600,000 people in the UK and 50 million worldwide.
- Of these 30% are drug resistant. 180,000 people in the UK and 15 million people worldwide.
- The cost of surgical treatment is $15,581 - $27,000 / patient (Heaney & Begley, 2002 Epilepsia). In the UK, there are about 1000 operations for epilepsy conducted every year.
- The annual cost of uncontrolled epilepsy is £3,508/ patient (Platt & Sperling, 2002 Epilepsia).
- About $ 13 billion worth of anti-epileptic drugs are prescribed every year in the world (Mackey, 2010 Nature).
Considering the above together, an effective,
non-invasive, accessible and affordable behavioural therapy for epilepsy represents a worthwhile goal that will impact significantly on the
lives of people who suffer from, or whose lives are otherwise affected by,
epilepsy.

Dr Yoko Nagai began her research in electrodermal biofeedback therapy for epilepsy in 1997. This research has since attracted scientific research funding of over £300,000 that has enabled clinical trials and a deeper understanding of the brain mechanisms by which the therapy can reduce the occurrence of epileptic seizures. Dr Nagai also founded the Biofeedback Clinic in 2005, in response to demand from patients at the National Hospital for Neurology and Neurosurgery, University College London.

At the clinic, she treated people with epilepsy on a private basis, enabling her to continue to pursue her university research activity. There are many advantages to face-to-face therapy, but only a few people can be treated at a time, and this can be frustrating for the majority of people who wish to access the therapy in this form. Dr Nagai is now seeking to share her expertise and treatment with people globally who are in need for this effective non-drug therapy, which is termed Autonomic Cognitive Rehabituation Training (ACRT).
Science
Dr Nagai's research started with investigations
into how brain and peripheral body reactions are related each other. We think that when our brain gets excited, our body does too, but it is not always the case.
Dr Nagai measures and observes a body
signal called electrodermal activity (EDA)/Galvanic Skin Response (GSR) which
is very sensitive to our thoughts and emotions. You may know already that EDA
is used in lie detector tests. Dr Nagai’s research has extensively
investigated how changes in EDA also modulate different brain signals.  To this end Dr Nagai has applied tools
including electroencephalography (EEG) and functional MRI (fMRI). For people
who would like to know more, the ACRT platform will have ""a science
box"" to click, where you can get all the information in lay terms.
The results from the clinical trial.
(adapted from Nagai et al. Epilepsy and Behaviour 2004, Vol 5/2: 216-223.)
(adapted from Nagai et al. Psychosomatic Medicine 2009, 71: 84-92.)
These participants all had drug resistant epilepsy,
and had been on different types of medication for many years
(for some of them, over 20years).
The effect of the treatments over three years
(adapted from Nagai et al. Epilepsy Research 2014, 108: 149-52.)
(adapted from Nagai et al. Epilepsy Research 2014, 108: 149-52.)
Once a participant learns the skill of controlling seizures through the training sessions, the effect can last for many years.
The functional activity of distinct brain regions changes
(adapted from Nagai et al. Neuroimage 2004, 22:243-251.)
The functional activity of distinct brain
regions changes over the course of the therapy. Our research shows that one
month of ACRT training increases resilience of people to anxiety-related
seizure attacks.
Dr Nagai is currently investigating further
neural mechanisms through which ACRT helps seizure control. This
project is funded by a UK major research charitable body, the Wellcome Trust.
Timeline
Why Crowd fund?

In the field of epilepsy research, most of scientific funding is directed at drug research and understanding genetic associations. Consequently, research into behavioural treatments attracts very little investment (although Dr Nagai is one of a very few lucky scientists able to maintain active research in this area funded by research grants).  This fact also means that behavioural treatments do not get the same priority or attention at scientific conferences and where there are sessions on the topic, these are often poorly attended. This creates a vicious circle.

Without exposing this research to the medical community and to patients with epilepsy, this effective new therapy, which could benefit many people with epilepsy, may remain confined to scientific research. We very much feel that the time is right for us to disseminate Dr Nagai's expertise and make her treatment accessible for as many people as might need this new approach.

Crowd funding was chosen as the route to make this possible as it will facilitate bringing this therapy quickly to patients, through the investment of people directly interested in the success of this approach. Crowd-funding also presents the best opportunity to increase awareness and facilitate the implementation of this non-invasive behavioural therapy for epilepsy.
Link",25.0,0,"3 Campaigns
|","Brighton, United Kingdom",https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/new-therapy-for-epilepsy-effective-and-affordable/pica

>SNAPGUARD ONE-TIME SEALER
A Revolutionary Spray that protects

column1: • Countertops
• Stone walls
• Flooring
• Grout
• Stucco walls
• Concrete driveways
• Roof tiles
• and much more

We developed SNAPGUARD ONE-TIME SEALER to be a clear, easy to use, durable, quick curing sealer for all natural stone and concrete products for your home or business.  Our product penetrates up to 1/4"" into any natural stone, creating a long lasting layer of superior protection against water and oil stains. This incredible sealant is also perfect for your countertops, stone walls, flooring, grout, stucco walls, concrete driveways, roof tiles and much more.  

We designed it as a concentrated formula that covers double to triple the amount of square footage from only one bottle, as compared to several other leading brands.

SNAPGUARD ONE-TIME SEALER works so well that you no longer need to use chemicals to clean surfaces - simply use a dry or hot wet towel to wipe away any mess. This helps to save money and improve the conditions in our household and business environment.

We're raising funds because we know SNAPGUARD ONE-TIME SEALER will not only save you time and money, but more importantly offer protection that your countertops, flooring, walls and other surfaces desperately need.
We also have a line of related products for different applications ready to hit the market, including glass and textile.
<div>
We'd greatly appreciate your support in bringing Snapguard One-Time Sealer to market.

Growing a Mushroom Farm

 

 Mushroom Valley Farms is raising funds for a Mushroom Tea and Coffee Lounge on a commercial parcel of land in Joshua Tree, California. At the front of the property will be the drive-up drink shop, while at the back of the property, the plan is to establish an indoor gourmet mushroom cultivation site. We hope to provide these healthy delicacies to the Riverside, San Bernardino, and Los Angeles Counties. We will be growing Pearl Oyster mushrooms and Lion's Mane to start production, later expanding the variety of strains we grow as Mushroom Valley grows. 

     Growing mushrooms is something that we, Geraldine Ramirez and Francisco Gutierrez, have been doing in our home as a hobby, with ambitions to turn our passion for farming and fungi into a viable source of income. We are a couple of 30-year-olds with huge ambitions.  We are both former office professionals turned farmers, with the experience in both fields to successfully turn this dream into a reality.

     Mushrooms have been recently shown to provide health benefits that will turn anyone into a mushroom lover!  Mushrooms have been scientifically shown to provide selenium (a powerful antioxidant), potassium, copper, and vitamins B and D. They are also a tasteful meat substitute for all those non-meat eaters out there. Lion's Mane has been renowned for its lobster-like taste.

We are confident in our abilities to grow and provide high-quality mushrooms to the areas around us, and are more than excited to do so! We hope the world will share our enthusiasm for these strange little Beings and help us get this project started. 

     Because we are fascinated with fungus, we had been on the property hunt for the past year, and finally found one that we fell head-over-heels in love with! After a generous donation by Glow Getter Beauty Lounge of Studio City, we locked down the small commercial property located just half a mile away from the West Entrance to Joshua Tree National Park, which received a record-breaking 2.8 million visitors in 2017! That's a lot of traffic! 

It's not much, but it's exactly what we're looking for :)

     Mushroom Valley Farms has launched this Indiegogo Campaign in an attempt to raise the funds for the build of a 500 square foot Mushroom Building!

     We originally had plans to just put up some shipping containers and grow the fungus, but the County of San Bernardino has regulations that will not allow us to do so in this type of Zoning. Therefore, we developed the plans for the little structure at the front of the property that will allow us to use the shipping containers as an accessory to the main structure.

     Please visit our website at MushroomValleyFarms.Com. Our hope is that you will feel as if you know us personally by the time you have read our first article.

     We will be documenting every step of the Start-up, and invite you to join us for the long-haul. Every supporter will receive a personal invitation to our Grand Opening, scheduled no later than 8 months after raising the funds. We do hope to see you there, friends!

Risks and challenges

Our biggest challenge is Zoning. Although the County of San Bernardino has good intentions, we have had to change our plans in order to comply with regulations already in place. Now, we need funds to hire an architect that will create a Site Plan that the County will happily accept, as well as funds to begin the build itself.

Who We Are:

column2: >Outsiders ATX is more than just a gym to go workout at. It's a way of life. It's a community. It's a space created on the sole principal of misfit representation and self healing. A place that someone else can call home. A space free of judgement, noise, and labeling. A space where you can overcome hurt, expand, and grow as a human performer in health and in life.
column3: >Outsiders ATX was created for all of us. From the powerful outcome that pain can cause within all of us. OATX was created to outreach all of those struggling mentally, physically, and emotionally. Being a part of a community that has leadership pushing you, guiding you, and connecting you with more purpose and personal clarity to a better overall life. There is beauty in the art of suffering, and that beauty is finding the root of what makes your soul grow like wildfire.
column4: >This isn't just a gym, this is
column6: >Now we need the help from all of you. To keep this movement thriving. We have been operating for 9 months and have grown this black sheep family faster than imagined. I, Jami Lynne, OATX Owner/Creator, recently got a phone call from my businesses landlord, letting me know we are being unexpectedly torn down in our current space within a matter of weeks. The push out is due to a development project and demolition of my gyms location. I am looking for an immediate relocation and undertaking any/all renovations
column7: > for the expansion + livelihood of this project and brand.  I am ready to take us to the next level in our new home and making it even more special than the first.

column1: <h3>What We Need &amp
<ul>
• We are setting our goal to raise $30,000 to help cover the costs of the unexpected move and renovation of the new home.
• Funding raised will contribute towards relocation costs + renovations including: Any  plumbing, electrical rewiring, painting, equipment re-installations, and branding work.
<li>

ANY donations from local supporters will be given a 2 week free pass to OATX, if you are not local and would still like to claim time in the gym from your support, please send a message along with your support!
• $25 backers will receive our ""UNBOWED"" limited Tee made by Industry Print Shop in efforts to raise awareness of our story.
• $125 backers will receive their first month at Outsiders ATX for free + limited tee.
• $1,500 backers will receive a year of unlimited membership and full 24/7 access to OATX + limited tee.
The Impact
<ul>
• Your contribution isn't helping aid in our relocation and renovation, but you are keeping this community together and continuing to see it's growth.

• You are joining our fight to save the mental health stigma, social standards, and giving another person the chance to discover themselves and what it means to be alive. Physically, mentally, and emotionally... free.
<h3>Risks &amp
<ul>
• Our biggest hurdle, is not finding our home in enough time and risking the entirety of the OATX community.

• Having the appropriate resources for now what is ""Phase II"" of our project, we will make the necessary renovations to the new location, get it in a functional state to continue to grow the community, and keeping the brand progression. We will have the ability to outreach even more by creating the spaces necessary to keep growth alive and developing more services to thrive.
Other Ways You Can Help
<ul>
• Spread via social media, word of mouth, or fight for us from where you are!
• Share our story using the tools provided, or copying our link and spreading it to as many individuals as you can!
• To read more about who we are and what we do you can visit: www.outsidersatx.com
","Who We Are:

Outsiders ATX is more than just a gym to go workout at. It's a way of life. It's a community. It's a space created on the sole principal of misfit representation and self healing. A place that someone else can call home. A space free of judgement, noise, and labeling. A space where you can overcome hurt, expand, and grow as a human performer in health and in life. Outsiders ATX was created for all of us. From the powerful outcome that pain can cause within all of us. OATX was created to outreach all of those struggling mentally, physically, and emotionally. Being a part of a community that has leadership pushing you, guiding you, and connecting you with more purpose and personal clarity to a better overall life. There is beauty in the art of suffering, and that beauty is finding the root of what makes your soul grow like wildfire.This isn't just a gym, this is
column2: The Human Performance Project. Now we need the help from all of you. To keep this movement thriving. We have been operating for 9 months and have grown this black sheep family faster than imagined. I, Jami Lynne, OATX Owner/Creator, recently got a phone call from my businesses landlord, letting me know we are being unexpectedly torn down in our current space within a matter of weeks. The push out is due to a development project and demolition of my gyms location. I am looking for an immediate relocation and undertaking any/all renovations for the expansion + livelihood of this project and brand.  I am ready to take us to the next level in our new home and making it even more special than the first.

column1: What We Need & What You Get
We are setting our goal to raise $30,000 to help cover the costs of the unexpected move and renovation of the new home.
Funding raised will contribute towards relocation costs + renovations including: Any  plumbing, electrical rewiring, painting, equipment re-installations, and branding work.

ANY donations from local supporters will be given a 2 week free pass to OATX, if you are not local and would still like to claim time in the gym from your support, please send a message along with your support!
$25 backers will receive our ""UNBOWED"" limited Tee made by Industry Print Shop in efforts to raise awareness of our story.
$125 backers will receive their first month at Outsiders ATX for free + limited tee.
$1,500 backers will receive a year of unlimited membership and full 24/7 access to OATX + limited tee.
The Impact
Your contribution isn't helping aid in our relocation and renovation, but you are keeping this community together and continuing to see it's growth.

You are joining our fight to save the mental health stigma, social standards, and giving another person the chance to discover themselves and what it means to be alive. Physically, mentally, and emotionally... free.
Risks & Outcomes
Our biggest hurdle, is not finding our home in enough time and risking the entirety of the OATX community.

Having the appropriate resources for now what is ""Phase II"" of our project, we will make the necessary renovations to the new location, get it in a functional state to continue to grow the community, and keeping the brand progression. We will have the ability to outreach even more by creating the spaces necessary to keep growth alive and developing more services to thrive.
Other Ways You Can Help
Spread via social media, word of mouth, or fight for us from where you are!
Share our story using the tools provided, or copying our link and spreading it to as many individuals as you can!
To read more about who we are and what we do you can visit: www.outsidersatx.com",0.0,0,"1 Campaign

MGK Fight Club is a unique martial arts experience, training with professional fighters, coaches, and members of all levels and backgrounds.
More than a school or academy, MGK is a family
column2: a real club where everyone helps others to grow.

column1: We have been in business for 6 years, always successfully stepping up the game.
Unfortunately, the Covid-19 situation has severely impacted our activity.
But in every crisis, opportunities come and are not to be missed.

You have an opportunity to help a small local business fight the current situation, and grow into a well-established organisation. It will be the first ever professional martial arts club in Discovery Bay.
An opportunity has arisen to make this transformation possible
column2: but it involves very high investment.

column1: Our campaign is essential for the project, because it cannot start without the funds to pay de rent deposit and the fitting of the new club.

column2: we are confident business will be good once it is transferred to the new venue.

column1: The only thing we need, is to have the right supporters to grow together.
Let's dare to be part of this huge opportunity. Let's dare to go against the odds.
Let's make things happen.
Contact me : Marc Guyon +852 93032996
<h3>What We Need &amp
We need at least HK$500,000 to pay for the rent deposit and the fitting of the new shop.
You will be recognized as a founding member, your name will be forever on the list of people who dared to believe, at this moment when it all started, in May 2020.
The contract is already signed, the only way possible is to go forward !
The Impact

Our project wants to create a new kind of relationship within a gym or martial arts school, a disruptive concept where everyone in the club will be treated as a private member with tailor-made training.
It will help change the perception of many people about the practice of martial arts and combat sports.
It will help kids and teenagers develop their full potential, not being bullied
column2: get confident and strong, physically and mentally.

column1: It will help everyone to find balance in our lives, and achieve outstanding performance through a ""warrior mindset"".
We have already been successfully doing it for years, now is the time to go through the current situation and step up the game.
<h3>Risks &amp
We all know the situation is uncertain. If the Covid-19 situation in Hong Kong worsens, it would be a terrible blow to the project.
But things are going well and we are confident we have to be positive and prepare for what's next.
Let's make a bold move and fight our way to achieve.
No matter what's next, we will adapt.
Other Ways You Can Help
Cannot contribute ? No problems, please spread the word !
Come and visit us ! Experience for yourself what we are offering, we are so confident you will be satisfied that you will be 100% refunded if you are not.

Pre-Sale campaign with discounts of up to 63%!

¡Campaña de preventa con hasta un 63% de descuento! 

Here is a great deal for you: Get an amazing discount on the most effective body changing program you’ll ever try. The best gift this Holiday for someone you really care about.

¿Quieres beneficiarte de enormes descuentos en el lanzamiento del programa de cambio físico más efectivo que jamás hayas probado? Apoya en esta campaña y cambia para siempre tú o aquella persona a quien quieras regalarle una nueva vida.

 

 

During the last two years we have designed and tested MetamorFit, a program to help you achieve a physical change that you never imagined, training only between 15 and 30 minutes, 3 or 4 times a week, while easily learning from us how to enjoy healthy eating... You will finally stop depending on those ineffective and cumbersome diets. It's time to understand that eating healthy doesn't need to be a sacrifice.

En los últimos dos años hemos diseñado y validado MetamorFit, un programa con el que la persona logrará un cambio físico que probablemente jamás hubiera imaginado, entrenando tan solo entre 15 y 30 minutos, 3 o 4 veces por semana, y aprendiendo con nosotros, de forma muy sencilla, como alimentarse de forma saludable… nada que ver con dietas imposibles, es hora de aprender a que comer sano no es nada sacrificado.

 

Our program will be available in English and Spanish and supported by iOS and Android operating systems.

Se lanza en Español e Inglés para iOS y Android. 

 

Launching is planned for January-February 2021 and will feature very unique facts: 

Lanzamos en enero-febrero 2021 lo que es un programa único en muchos aspectos:

 

1) Functional exercises workout plan of 15 to 30 minutes sessions to be performed anywhere (home, outdoors, etc.). The program features only really useful functional exercises for your daily life (no heavy or complex equipment required). Being in a wonderful shape and looking great is definitively possible.

1) Entrenamiento funcional de 15 a 30 minutos que podrás hacer en cualquier parte (en casa, al aire libre, etc.) con ejercicios realmente útiles para tu vida cotidiana (no serán necesarios equipos ni máquinas complicadas) . Estar realmente en forma y verse muy bien físicamente es posible. 

 

2) This time you won’t get confused with so many different workouts and exercises. You will be totally guided through every workout session, so you know every day exactly what exercises to perform. Each training session will be adapted to your specific shape, no matter what it may be so you can properly perform, even if you have never worked out before. And thanks to our technology your workout sessions will be continuously adapted based your progress.

2) No te vamos a confundir con diversos entrenamientos, tendrás el entrenamiento preciso que se adapte a tu condición física, sin importar cual sea, aunque nunca hayas entrenado. Además, gracias a nuestra tecnología se seguirá adaptando a tu evolución día tras día. 

 

3) Avoid injuries. We’ll teach you the technics you need to master while progressing in order to avoid injuries. You will need this, because you will progress a lot.

3) Evita lesiones, te enseñamos las técnicas que necesitas conocer según vas progresando, porque vas a progresar y mucho.

 

4) It is time to stop depending on diets’ plans designed by others. You will learn how to eat properly and banish the myth that eating healthy is boring and sacrificed.

4) Basta de depender de dietas o menús de otros, aprende a alimentarte y destierra de una vez el mito de que comer sano es aburrido y sacrificado. 

 

5) If you still have second thoughts about it because you’ve tried unsuccessfully other times before, forget it! That won’t be a problem any more, this time you will make it happen.

5) Si aún estás pensando que esta vez tampoco vas a lograrlo porque siempre te ha costado, ¡olvídalo! eso también dejará de ser un problema.

 

6) And last, our App very easy to use. You will love it.

6) Y además, nuestra App es muy fácil de usar. Te va a gustar.

 

Thank you for supporting us and contributing to change so many lives.

Gracias por apoyarnos y ayudar a cambiar tantas vidas.

 

MetamorFit, the best gift this holiday for someone you really care about.

 

Our Story

We are two good friends that a couple of years ago got together with the objective to create a project based on the synergy of each other's strengths and experience, towards a wonderful goal: To help people to be stronger, healthier, and happier.

That was how we decided to design a truly revolutionary program that is seeking to address the countless number of people wishing to change their body, and at the same time would also lead them to feel great, more confident, and totally secure about themselves.

Based on a profit share compensation relationship, we set up a great staff for our project. This way we managed to count on a very reliable and remarkable team without having to financially struggle.

Most of its members were carefully selected as a result of their great performance in previous projects in which we had the chance to prove their skills and attitudes. Now, they not only share profits with us, but also dreams.

 

Find next a better look of our team:

 

More details about MetamorFit:

We have developed a user friendly App featuring a very fitness program which is very easy to follow (no matter the subscriber’s starting state of shape). It’s also ideally complemented by a very powerful, nice to review, and easy to understand information related to healthy nutrition (no recipes, nor diets) and personal motivation.

MetamorFIT is a wonderful journey during which each subscriber will be leveled on a daily basis by a complete algorithm and accompanied all along their way towards their  transformation, so they know exactly which exercises to perform every single day (no doubts,  no confusion, total clearness).

 

 

MetamorFit's origin.

The idea of developing this amazing program comes from our personal experiences and wishes.

On one side we have Joel’s background:

He used to be overweight and suffered terrible headaches for years. And it wasn’t until he discovered the functional exercises workout and changed radically his way of eating (quitted dieting and learned how to eat in a healthy way) that he got rid of those negative conditions (in a few weeks he lost 60 pounds and changed notably his body shape).

Regarding other kinds of experience useful to our project, Joel also brought in an expertise panel of more than 20 years in relation to leading technology transformation processes, and developing digital products for well-known companies from several industries.

On the other hand, Franzel, as a life coach, always wanted to be able to help people change their bad habits to good habits on a massive scale. At the same time, his experience coaching people made him very aware about the importance of a persons’ self-esteem and self-confidence in order to feel good about themselves. Finally, we found that body shape results to be a key factor in this regard.

Life also has taught Franzel how motivational tools were indispensable for people to manage processes of change.

So, combining the experience and personal process of both of us, we decided to help boost people’s self-esteem, self-confidence, productivity, health and wellness through designing a unique program to help people dramatically change their body shape. But, making sure we provided indispensable support   related to healthy eating and motivation.

Honestly, we are absolutely convinced that it is not possible to achieve a transcendent body shape change without the right exercises program, ideally combined with also the right eating and the proper motivational skills. All of which are perfectly addressed by MetamorFIT. We really think that with MetamorFIT we will be able to contribute to having healthier and happier people in today’s world.

 

Our schedule

Being our biggest challenge already reached (a fully developed App), our schedule now aims to a very feasible goal: to launch in February 2021. This, responding also to the strong boost for our product that may represent our subscribers’ intentions to start a new year with an objective as encouraging as MetamorFIT’s: to change their lives forever (Is there a better year to do so than 2021? We honestly don’t think so). In this regard, we are now focused on the training sessions video filming and post-production.

In addition, we are designing a very exciting social media influencers campaign that helps us spread our changing challenge all around the world as a miracle vaccine against any threat to our deserved wellness.

 

Our Budget

Fortunately, a few days ago we have finally started the exercises videos production and post-production under a long term payment agreement reached with our supplier. So, to cover that in the future as well as the advertising campaign launching, we have kept our original  10k USD budget. Nevertheless, we insist that we have no limits regarding sign up admissions, so our backers can rest assured. THEY WILL GET THEIR PROGRAM IN ANY CASE. There isn't any non-delivery risk regarding videos production and post-production. And on the other hand, the advertising campaign final specifications and reach will have no impact at all on the App launching, so the App will be available for our backers within the estimated date.

 

The importance of a product like MetamorFit nowadays

We honestly think that the world is changing very fast
column2:
unfortunately, life seems to be getting tougher every day for most human beings and threats to our health appear to multiply on a daily basis (stress, unhealthy food and drinks, mobility restrictions, physical inactivity related to remote work from home …). Also, different mind-body diseases threaten us constantly and relying on medicines only may not be enough (it’s a proven fact that medicines don’t necessarily guarantee our healing).

So, having in our hands an idea truly capable of making a difference on people’s lives by dramatically improving their chances of getting healthier, stronger, and happier, we strongly believe that this is something worth fighting for.

We’ll definitely do our best to spread out our commitment to help people change all over the world as a miracle vaccine against threats to people's deserved wellness.

 

Our commitment to other great ideas.

Being aware about the importance of supporting other great ideas we have decided to redirect 1% of our backers’ contributions to other campaigns (once we have reached our goal). In this regard, the opinions of backers holding certain type of MetamorFit subscriptions will be considered through a voting right on our 1% fund surveys.

0,"

Franklin's All-Around Fitness is a innovative resistance band gym that offers members the ability to workout onsite or online via live classes structured for these times of social distancing.

With over 20+ years in the fitness and martial arts world I understand the need for new innovative exercises. For many of those years I thought free weights and reaching that one rep max was the answer. As I matured through my Martial Arts journey I realized I needed something more functional. Being level 3 in Krav Maga and a blue belt in Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu my joints are always taken into consideration with my workouts. I heard this term ""linear variable resistance"" being used while someone was working out with bands. I did my research and now I have taken all the knowledge from using free-weights and implemented it into resistance band variations. The results are clear with increased muscle mass,flexibility,mobility and a decrease in joint pain. 

With Franklin's All-Around Fitness we are taking a leap ahead of our competitors by offering our classes and programs completely online through our virtual app. Two different strength bands will be given at sign-up so members can participate immediately. With the increase in standards for social distancing we are preparing for the future so our members wont have to worry about missing a workout. They will be able to choose the gym of their choice. Whether that be their living room or the local park that day. The app provides a community tight knit family feeling with the ability to stay in constant contact with ought direct contact if need be. Members are able to sign up for scheduled classes through the app, purchase additional programs, or equipment.

Franklin's All-Around Fitness makes it possible to gain knowledge, provide workouts and stay in a communication with our members through multiple different social media avenues. Our Facebook, Instagram, Youtube, and customer app provide updated gym news, workouts, and answers to any community questions. This allows us to not only be a tight knit community but share our knowledge with others that might not be able to attend a brick and mortar location. We are hoping that with the help of everyone from Idiegogo, social media, and our local community that the growth of our Online members will sore. This will increase the renovation speed of the already 1500sq building we have. 

Once our brick and mortar location is up and running we will be able to offer many more fitness classes. It will allow for up to 15 members per class at a social distancing of a little over 6 ft. Our additional classes our characterized as specialty program add-ons. Some examples of these classes are core class,  booty classes, Jiu-Jitsu, bag class,speed/agility classes, etc.  Onsite and Online members will have the ability to add these to their membership if they would like. Some may require additional equipment from the basic resistance band program if they are being done from home. The reason for this is that the bag classes will have a free standing punching bag for each member to use.

The Jiu-Jitsu members at the brick and mortar location will allow us to grow our brand even more. Our location will be considered a Gracie Garage because of my background in martial arts. It will allow Gracie students to come train at our facility for free and still advance in their curriculum.  Once we acquire 15 regular students i will have the opportunity to make our location a Certified Gracie Jiu-Jitsu Training Center. This will allow us to teach kids classes as well, broadening our clientele even further. This is the how to video for starting the Gracie garage. https://www.gracieuniversity.com/Pages/Public/A...

I have always loved sharing my knowledge with others. Now with Franklin's All-Around Fitness I will be able to offer the community something they have never seen before.  Taking my 20+ years of fitness knowledge we are going to be able to provide the community with a workout experience that can be done from your home. Or even on a mountain top if you choose. That is what makes us so unique to the typical big name gyms. Our members are easily able to make the shift from working out from our home location to online if need be. Plus online members are already ahead of the game in case of social distancing standards. There will be no headache of figuring out how to do all those free weight and machine exercises from home. This is because our members will be knowledgeable in the band and fitness techniques that took me two decades to perfect.

Funding
• Our goal of 10,000 will put us in full motion her in our community. Here is where it is going.
• Updated audio and visual equipment for future program videos
• Start-up funds to launch the customer app for a year
• Online Classes T.V. and Camera For Brick and Mortar location
• 15 Wavemaster XXL training bags
• 25 sets of wenfeng resistance bands
• 15 Anchor Gym Core Station Wall Mounts
• 700Sq feet of Protective mat flooring
• 2-5'x10' Roll out Wresting and Tumbling Mats
• 1-12'' 1-18'' 1 24'' Power Systems Stackable Plyobox

All-Around Inclusive Plan

Goal driven resistance band programs built so members can participate anytime anywhere while gaining their optimal results. 

Designed with more than two decades of combined fitness and martial arts knowledge, to provide a workout service that will allow people to always attend the gym. Especially during times of increased social distancing and health standards. Adding the ability for our members to decide where they want to workout for the day.

We have built programs that meet a variety of goals and offer you:
<li>

Campaigning Start-Up Monthly Program/Live Classes-Allows for backers and interested clients to donate for present and future improvements. In return you receive the first month of our resistance band program. Plus 3 Free!!!! online resistance band classes, to experience our virtual workouts. These will become available during the week, depending on the number of  active members. This will all be available through our startup app, which is continuously being updated and improved.
<li>
3 Day Class Pass-Gives the customer a chance to experience a larger variety of exercises.
<li>
1 Day Class Pass-Allows for customers to see if the classes are right for them.
<li>
6 Month Online Only Membership-Allows members to participate in classes anywhere and receive 2 bands.
<li>
6 Month Onsite Only Membership-Members get to use our innovative Resistance Band Center.
<li>
6 Month Onsite+Online Membership-Classes can be enjoyed when and where you want.
<li>
Specialty Add On Classes-Specific area targeted classes members are able to add for the remainder of their membership.
<li>
Specialty Classes Only-Specific Classes targeting workouts for certain goals, Bag Classes, Booty Classes, core etc. 30min-1hr time frame
<li>

Individual Monthly Programs-Monthly resistance band programs that can be perfomed indoors or outdoors. These increase in difficulty, depending on the members needs.  Each one can be purchased from our app.
<li>

Yearly Seminars-2,3,4 hour private seminars with elite professionals in their field. Will have a max Occupancy available to anyone until filled. Examples are self defense, rape prevention, bully prevention, women empowerment, and Jiu-Jitsu.
<li>
Private Classes-Targets more individual specific needs while granting the member one on one time for questions. This can be done via online as well scheduled with us through our app.
<li>
Gracie Curriculum Classes-These will be available once the Brick and Mortar location is complete. They can sign up onsite or online through the app allowing advancement in their belt levels.

The Game Changer...Our original membership is less than $1.50 a class.

For some people having a workout partner is a game changer and we understand that. This is why onsite members get 6 free guest passes. If a guest decides to sign up afterwards they will get the first month free and both of them get a F.A.A.F Tee. 

How do classes work?
• 4 Workouts per week. (40-60min Onsite Location)
• 3 Full-Body Workouts Per Week. (40min 0nline Only)

• The base membership is set up so members can get a area specific workout from 4 classes a week. Which are chest, back, arms, and legs. Or 3 full body classes a week. This allows for members to choose which days and which times works best for them through the app. Members can also choose to target one area more than another this way. The fact that a membership allows access to as many classes as you want lets the member have unlimited access to workouts as long as the class isn't full. Our App allows for members to see when classes are full or not. However a live class has a very high number of availability slots.

Why Are We Doing This? 

According to the National Institutes of Health, obesity and overweight together are the second leading cause of preventable death in the United States, close behind tobacco use. An estimated 300,000 deaths per year are due to the obesity epidemic.(https://www.wvdhhr.org)

Through my years of training I was a witness to many new gym goers and even personal trained some newbies myself. There is always those common frustrations that discourage people from starting working out, continuing or even starting back up from years of time off. There is the people who need to be shown, those who need encouragement, some need accountability, variety, and results/continued results. When the frustration sets in from any of these feeling un-attainable or non existent that is when people quite. 

Then you have the consistent workout goer who gets discouraged with un-availability of machines or classes. This is especially a concern with after the changes from covid-19. Gyms were shut down, people had no wear to workout, or even knew how to workout with what they have. I couldn't stand to see people not being able to workout and get the results I have from resistance bands.  I know that we could be a preventive of another statistic in obesity by providing our members with the knowledge we have put into these programs.

Now more than ever having our gym available anywhere anytime is vital. We are seeing more and more gyms close down because they cant meet the social distancing standards. Plus brick and mortar Gyms are are being forced to shut down. People are becoming increasingly concerned with cleanliness as well when it comes to places they are going. Here at Franklin's All-Around Fitness we will not stop working to bring workouts and develop a fitness community in these increasing difficult times.

What is our mission

The traditional mindset of working out is hindering peoples goals by limiting their ability to do their workouts.

No longer do you have to wait on machines, be told what to wear, when you can work out, where you can work out, or having to travel in that nasty weather to get to the gym for that nice physic. Franklin's All-Around Fitness is a community of members that can obtain their fitness goals through our programs by attending class in any environment.

Done by our regularly updated social distancing procedures such as our online app, online classes, scheduling, and 6+ feet distance between members at our onsite facility.

This allows our members the freedom of choosing the time of their workout and location while providing a touch-less environment to ensure the social distancing standards. 

Our Mission is to provide a fitness routine that our members can attend anywhere anytime and achieve their desired goals. While still allowing our members constant communication and workouts with our innovative social distancing platform.

Even the smallest donation is going to make a difference.

With your help we can make our dream a reality and start a new fitness trend that allows people to keep working out even if we are social distancing. You can also help by spreading the word about our business through your social media platforms. Help us get Franklin's All-Around Fitness up and running so we can show people that you don't have to go to a weight room to get fit. 

What is your reward for helping?
• For as little as a $4 donation you will get the 1st month of our Resistance Band Programs a value of $15.
• Plus Your Donation will get you 3 Free Online Resistance Bands Classes a value of $10. Available through app once you have donated.
• Those who donate will be put into a drawing for a ""Free"" Fascial Gun a value of $80 Shipped U.S. Only.
• Additional Perks may be added throughout the campaign. Vids/bands/swag/etc.

Its time to stop worrying about how or if you will be able to get your workout done in the future. Will your gym be closed? Do you have at home what your gym offers if it does? Is your gym following social distancing standards?

At Franklin's All-Around Fitness we make it possible for our community of members to stay safe, communicate, reach their goals, and still get that desired physic from the environment of their choice.

It will allow for up to 15 members per class at a social distancing of a little over 6 ft. Our additional classes our characterized as specialty program add-ons. Some examples of these classes are core class,  booty classes, Jiu-Jitsu, bag class,speed/agility classes, etc.  Onsite and Online members will have the ability to add these to their membership if they would like. Some may require additional equipment from the basic resistance band program if they are being done from home. The reason for this is that the bag classes will have a free standing punching bag for each member to use.The Jiu-Jitsu members at the brick and mortar location will allow us to grow our brand even more. Our location will be considered a Gracie Garage because of my background in martial arts. It will allow Gracie students to come train at our facility for free and still advance in their curriculum.  Once we acquire 15 regular students i will have the opportunity to make our location a Certified Gracie Jiu-Jitsu Training Center. This will allow us to teach kids classes as well, broadening our clientele even further. This is the how to video for starting the Gracie garage. https://www.gracieuniversity.com/Pages/Public/A...I have always loved sharing my knowledge with others. Now with Franklin's All-Around Fitness I will be able to offer the community something they have never seen before.  Taking my 20+ years of fitness knowledge we are going to be able to provide the community with a workout experience that can be done from your home. Or even on a mountain top if you choose. That is what makes us so unique to the typical big name gyms. Our members are easily able to make the shift from working out from our home location to online if need be. Plus online members are already ahead of the game in case of social distancing standards. There will be no headache of figuring out how to do all those free weight and machine exercises from home. This is because our members will be knowledgeable in the band and fitness techniques that took me two decades to perfect.Funding
Our goal of 10,000 will put us in full motion her in our community. Here is where it is going.
Updated audio and visual equipment for future program videos
Start-up funds to launch the customer app for a year
Online Classes T.V. and Camera For Brick and Mortar location
15 Wavemaster XXL training bags
25 sets of wenfeng resistance bands
15 Anchor Gym Core Station Wall Mounts
700Sq feet of Protective mat flooring
2-5'x10' Roll out Wresting and Tumbling Mats
1-12'' 1-18'' 1 24'' Power Systems Stackable Plyobox

All-Around Inclusive PlanGoal driven resistance band programs built so members can participate anytime anywhere while gaining their optimal results. Designed with more than two decades of combined fitness and martial arts knowledge, to provide a workout service that will allow people to always attend the gym. Especially during times of increased social distancing and health standards. Adding the ability for our members to decide where they want to workout for the day.We have built programs that meet a variety of goals and offer you:

Campaigning Start-Up Monthly Program/Live Classes-Allows for backers and interested clients to donate for present and future improvements. In return you receive the first month of our resistance band program. Plus 3 Free!!!! online resistance band classes, to experience our virtual workouts. These will become available during the week, depending on the number of  active members. This will all be available through our startup app, which is continuously being updated and improved.
3 Day Class Pass-Gives the customer a chance to experience a larger variety of exercises.
1 Day Class Pass-Allows for customers to see if the classes are right for them.
6 Month Online Only Membership-Allows members to participate in classes anywhere and receive 2 bands.
6 Month Onsite Only Membership-Members get to use our innovative Resistance Band Center.
6 Month Onsite+Online Membership-Classes can be enjoyed when and where you want.
Specialty Add On Classes-Specific area targeted classes members are able to add for the remainder of their membership.
Specialty Classes Only-Specific Classes targeting workouts for certain goals, Bag Classes, Booty Classes, core etc. 30min-1hr time frame

Individual Monthly Programs-Monthly resistance band programs that can be perfomed indoors or outdoors. These increase in difficulty, depending on the members needs.  Each one can be purchased from our app.

Yearly Seminars-2,3,4 hour private seminars with elite professionals in their field. Will have a max Occupancy available to anyone until filled. Examples are self defense, rape prevention, bully prevention, women empowerment, and Jiu-Jitsu.
Private Classes-Targets more individual specific needs while granting the member one on one time for questions. This can be done via online as well scheduled with us through our app.
Gracie Curriculum Classes-These will be available once the Brick and Mortar location is complete. They can sign up onsite or online through the app allowing advancement in their belt levels.

The Game Changer...Our original membership is less than $1.50 a class.For some people having a workout partner is a game changer and we understand that. This is why onsite members get 6 free guest passes. If a guest decides to sign up afterwards they will get the first month free and both of them get a F.A.A.F Tee. How do classes work?
4 Workouts per week. (40-60min Onsite Location)
3 Full-Body Workouts Per Week. (40min 0nline Only)

The base membership is set up so members can get a area specific workout from 4 classes a week. Which are chest, back, arms, and legs. Or 3 full body classes a week. This allows for members to choose which days and which times works best for them through the app. Members can also choose to target one area more than another this way. The fact that a membership allows access to as many classes as you want lets the member have unlimited access to workouts as long as the class isn't full. Our App allows for members to see when classes are full or not. However a live class has a very high number of availability slots.

Why Are We Doing This? According to the National Institutes of Health, obesity and overweight together are the second leading cause of preventable death in the United States, close behind tobacco use. An estimated 300,000 deaths per year are due to the obesity epidemic.(https://www.wvdhhr.org)Through my years of training I was a witness to many new gym goers and even personal trained some newbies myself. There is always those common frustrations that discourage people from starting working out, continuing or even starting back up from years of time off. There is the people who need to be shown, those who need encouragement, some need accountability, variety, and results/continued results. When the frustration sets in from any of these feeling un-attainable or non existent that is when people quite. Then you have the consistent workout goer who gets discouraged with un-availability of machines or classes. This is especially a concern with after the changes from covid-19. Gyms were shut down, people had no wear to workout, or even knew how to workout with what they have. I couldn't stand to see people not being able to workout and get the results I have from resistance bands.  I know that we could be a preventive of another statistic in obesity by providing our members with the knowledge we have put into these programs.Now more than ever having our gym available anywhere anytime is vital. We are seeing more and more gyms close down because they cant meet the social distancing standards. Plus brick and mortar Gyms are are being forced to shut down. People are becoming increasingly concerned with cleanliness as well when it comes to places they are going. Here at Franklin's All-Around Fitness we will not stop working to bring workouts and develop a fitness community in these increasing difficult times.What is our missionThe traditional mindset of working out is hindering peoples goals by limiting their ability to do their workouts.No longer do you have to wait on machines, be told what to wear, when you can work out, where you can work out, or having to travel in that nasty weather to get to the gym for that nice physic. Franklin's All-Around Fitness is a community of members that can obtain their fitness goals through our programs by attending class in any environment.Done by our regularly updated social distancing procedures such as our online app, online classes, scheduling, and 6+ feet distance between members at our onsite facility.This allows our members the freedom of choosing the time of their workout and location while providing a touch-less environment to ensure the social distancing standards. Our Mission is to provide a fitness routine that our members can attend anywhere anytime and achieve their desired goals. While still allowing our members constant communication and workouts with our innovative social distancing platform.Even the smallest donation is going to make a difference.With your help we can make our dream a reality and start a new fitness trend that allows people to keep working out even if we are social distancing. You can also help by spreading the word about our business through your social media platforms. Help us get Franklin's All-Around Fitness up and running so we can show people that you don't have to go to a weight room to get fit. What is your reward for helping?
For as little as a $4 donation you will get the 1st month of our Resistance Band Programs a value of $15.
Plus Your Donation will get you 3 Free Online Resistance Bands Classes a value of $10. Available through app once you have donated.
Those who donate will be put into a drawing for a ""Free"" Fascial Gun a value of $80 Shipped U.S. Only.
Additional Perks may be added throughout the campaign. Vids/bands/swag/etc.

Its time to stop worrying about how or if you will be able to get your workout done in the future. Will your gym be closed? Do you have at home what your gym offers if it does? Is your gym following social distancing standards?At Franklin's All-Around Fitness we make it possible for our community of members to stay safe, communicate, reach their goals, and still get that desired physic from the environment of their choice.",0.0,0,"1 Campaign

To the attention of all good-hearted people
Dear all,
I have a great request to those who understand that
doing good is a divine thing to people that desperately need it. My son, Vlad,
is 16 years old and is deeply in need of financial help.
In the past 2 years (September 2013 and June 2014),
Vlad has undergone 2 extremely difficult oncological surgeries on the right
side of his neck, also known as the cervical region. The surgeries have been
done by the Institute of Oncology in Chisinau, Moldova, with the clinical
diagnosis being – aggressive fibromatosis desmoid tumour (a very rare condition
marked by the presence of desmoid tumours that can reoccur and cause organ
dysfunction). After the surgery procedures the histological results have identified
the presence of tumours which have been confirmed by 3 different laboratories
from different countries. As a result we have been to several oncological
clinics in the search of a treatment and solutions for stopping tumour
recurrence. Regretfully, despite the numerous investigations done no treatment
has been suggested.
Meanwhile, during the same period of the investigations
(September- December 2014) and near to the time when the surgeries were done, 2
more tumours have appeared (one of which surrounds the carotid artery and the
other just 5 cm away). To the despair of the entire family these new tumours
expand with time, causing physical pain and discomfort to Vlad.
In February 2015, Vlad’s medical case has been
analysed by specialists from the Oncological Clinic of Haifa, Israel- where we
have been in June 2015. Their research led to the recommendation of an
immediate surgery needed for the complete removal of the newly formed tumours,
followed by prolonged treatment. For this to happen we need to gather 29 000 $
for the surgery and 60 000 $ for the post-op treatment that will last 12
months.
I have to mention that this sum of money is beyond our
own forces to achieve, the whole process being very costly for our family.
At his age, Vlad is a great guy, full of life and
energy but at the same time he is a kid that had to mature too soon to face
destiny’s hard and cruel burden. At the peak of his teenage years he should be
enjoying life next to his family and friends but instead he is desperate and
would want nothing more than to forget about his incurable disease.  Having asked him about his future intentions
of becoming a doctor his answer was a definite NO!
His photo and the recommendation of the oncological
clinic are attached to this file and for further proof an offprint of his
medical history since his surgeries together with the confirmed diagnosis   and the
results of the investigation with NMR are attached.
Any financial support from you part will be a much
needed contribution and a step forward to the treatment of my son.
Este
necesar suportul şi contribuţia Dvs. la întremarea sănătăţii lui Vlad – un tânăr
de 16 ani, plin de viaţă,energic,
aflat la apogeul adolescenţei.
De doi
ani încoace, Vlad poartă pe umerii săi o povară foarte grea. Soarta l-a pus la
grea încercare prin dezvoltarea în corpul acestuia a unei boli oncologice deosebit
de rar întâlnite în întreaga lume şi care, cu regret, recidivează (fibromatoză
agresivă desmoidă) în zona cervicală.
În
septembrie 2013 şi iunie 2014, Vlad a suportat două intervenţii chirurgicale în
partea dreaptă a gâtului efectuate la Institutul Oncologic din Chişinău,
Moldova. Cu toate acestea, boala recidivează, iar la moment, în preajma
operaţiilor precedente, Vlad are două formaţiuni tumorale noi, una din acestea cuprinzând
artera carotidă.
Timp de un
an Vlad – însoţit de părinţii săi, bat pe la uşile numeroaselor clinici de
profil din străinătate. Cu regret însă, în pofida numeroaselor investigaţii
efectuate, nu a fost propus nici un tratament.
În urma
investigaţiilor efectuate în iunie 2015 de către specialiştii de la Clinica
Oncologică din Haifa, Israel, a fost recomandată efectuarea unei intervenţii
chirurgicale de urgenţă pentru extirparea celor două formaţiuni, urmată
ulterior de un tratament – proces ce ar costa familia tânărului suma enormă şi
imposibil de adunat cu forţe proprii - 89 000 dolari (29 mii – pentru
intervenție , 60 mii – tratamentul de 12 luni post-operator).
De
aceea, facem un <span>apel la generozitatea de
a-l susține pe Vlad, aflat în această situație deznădăjduită.
Необходима Ваша поддержка   на
восстановление здоровья Влада - 16-летний энергичный юноша, на пике подросткового возраста.
В течение двух лет, Влад несет на своих плечах очень тяжелое бремя, вызов
судьбы. У Влада редкий вид опухали в области шеи, которое к сожалению даёт рецидивы
(экстаабдоминальный (десмоидный) фиброматоз). Фиброматоз инфильтрирует и разрушает
прилежащую скелетную мышцу.
В сентябре 2013 года и июне 2014 Влад перенес две операции с правой стороны
шеи в Институте Онкологии, г. Кишинэу, Молдова. Тем не менее, болезнь
рецидивирует и в настоящее время, рядом с местом предыдущих операций, у Влада появились
ещё два опухолевых образования, один из которых возле сонной артерии.
<span>  В течении года Влад - в сопровождении
своих родителей, обращался во многие зарубежные специализированные клиники. К
сожалению, несмотря на многочисленные проведенные исследования, не было
предложено никакого лечения.
После исследований,
проведенных в июне 2015 г. специалистами Онкологической Клиники города Хайфа,
Израиль, было рекомендовано хирургическое вмешательство для удаления опухолевых
образований, а затем сам процесс лечения. Весь изложенный процесс стоит большую
сумму денег для семьи, сбор которых невозможен своими силами.
Обращаемся с большой просьбой ко всем людям с доброй душой помочь нам в сборе денег для Влада.
