Quick Summary

The World Health Organization (WHO) has listed antibiotic
resistance as one of the mayor challenges of our time. All over the globe,
especially in low-income countries, infectious diseases are the leading cause
of death of children and adolescents and one of the leading causes in adults.  The need for a new and better,
easy accessible and sustainable, alternative to antibiotics have never been greater
than now!
Living antibiotics is a natural innovation
developed by Swedish researchers Alejandra Vásquez and Tobias Olofsson. Ten
years ago they discovered the world´s largest concentration of collaborating
beneficial lactic acid bacteria in honeybees. Further research showed that
these bacteria work as living factories of antibiotics, producing not just one
weapon as conventional antibiotics but hundreds of different weapons in order
to fight infections. Living antibiotics revolutionize the concept of
antibiotics
column2: from the static compound, which generates resistance
column3: to the active, which generates protection. In order to

column1: fulfill their dream, which is to develop medicinal products for people in need

worldwide, Alejandra and Tobias need your help!

The movie - Quick Version
Swedish scientists Tobias Olofsson
and Alejandra Vásquez (both PhDs in Engineering at Lund University, Sweden)
discovered in 2005 a great number of, previously unknown beneficial bacteria,
which live and developed together with honeybees in an organ called the honey
crop (used in gathering nectar).
Honey is a viscous and sweet fluid
produced by honeybees from the nectar of flowers to store it during winter.
Honey is as old as written history, dating back to 2100 B.C. where it was
mentioned in Sumerian and Babylonian cuneiform writings, the Hittite code, and
the sacred writings of India and Egypt. It is a worldwide known “folk medicine”
with many unidentified components.
Alejandra and Tobias’ on-going
research shows that most of the “unidentified compounds” and already found
compounds in honey originate from these discovered bacteria that live inside
honeybees. These good bacteria are called lactic acid bacteria and represent
one of the major bacterial groups applied in the food and Biotech industries.
They found 13 different species, nine lactobacilli and 4 bifidobacteria, which
are present in all honeybees around the world and added to fresh honey at great
quantities. In other words, these massive beneficial bacteria are found within
all honeybees and active in freshly harvested honey found in all continents in
the world. This scientifically explains, why freshly harvest honey has been and
is still used as a folk medicine.
Alejandra and Tobias’ studies show
that these lactic acid bacteria possess unique antimicrobial properties, which

in turn are the key to use them as a potential alternative to antibiotics.

The problem
The increasing antibiotic resistance
is a major worldwide concern and many efforts are on-going in order to find
alternative tools to fight infections. People are looking at natural
environments, but still many search for novel chemical compounds to be used as
future drugs.
Alexander Fleming discovered
penicillin in 1928. Penicillin is a type of antibiotics that molds of the genus
named Penicillium produce to kill
competing microorganisms such as bacteria, a weapon that is. Penicillin does
not work against all bacteria but only on certain ones. However, there are
other microbes as the bacteria called streptomycetes that produce other kind of
antibiotics, which work against bacteria other than penicillin. To sum, some
bacteria or fungi form a sort of substance that they use as weapons against
competing microbes. Man grows up these small living antibiotic factories,
extracting the substance and make pills for sick people who are suffering from
infections. Then as it is only one single substance in high concentrations pathogens
soon begin to acquire defense against it. This is like, pathogens get bombarded
by one single weapon (for instance arrows) and the pathogens build shields
against all the arrows as the pathogens get used to man's widespread fight with
these weapons (in the form of pills). Then people start pouring in more kinds
of antibiotics into pills, much like shooting arrows and cannon balls at the
same time
column2: then pathogens build thicker walls and form in this way resistance.

column1: Today, a drug company can develop a new antibiotic and after a period of about
10 years, pathogens learn how to protect themselves again, once again becoming
resistant to the developed drug.
Our solution
The greatness of using the
discovered 13 collaborating lactic acid bacteria is that they do not produce
only one weapon (one substance such as antibiotics), but together hundreds of
different weapons (substances). And if the lactic acid bacteria are used viable
(which we always do) then they can choose how much of what weapons are needed
and produce them depending on the closest-threatening pathogen. Like a clever
strategy!
Our way of thinking is very
controversial. We want to use viable good bacteria in high amounts as small
weapon factories, which produce only what is needed, without creating
resistance.
This idea is not compatible with
today's big international efforts to find new antibiotics. Nor is it accepted
that we as researchers and entrepreneurs go completely against already
developed structures. We were young when we made the discovery and to this day
we have no established structures behind our ideas, such as a well-known
university professor or a pharmaceutical company.
The concept is revolutionary and the
lactic acid bacteria are simply too good to dump them at a high price. While,
we would instead focus on making a contribution to society and produce natural,
simple and sustainable alternatives to antibiotics that will help people
worldwide. They will do good to all who need them, but we cannot do this
ourselves without financial support, we need help to realize our dream and we

want to share this road with you!

Why hasn’t this been discovered before?
The beneficial bacteria are only
viable outside the bees during a few weeks as in honey harvested from wild bee
colonies by honey hunters. They are not present in any mature honey or honey
derived products harvested through beekeeping, which have replaced honey
hunting today in most parts of the world. The environment in honey is so harsh

that all traces from the lactic acid bacteria vanish after a short while.

What would we like to do?
It is of crucial importance to find
new natural, ecological and sustainable alternatives in fighting antibiotics
resistance.
We have the capacity to promote
these lactic acid bacteria by a new developed technique and can re-introduce
these into a range of formulations as foods, drinks and or natural based drugs.
Our goal is to use science in guidance by nature. Therefore, we will make
products that are based on the original fresh honey as hunted by honey hunters.
Meaning that the lactic acid bacteria are viable and active in those products.
Early in our research, we saw the
lactic acid bacteria’s antimicrobial and therapeutic properties. They together
as a community possess extremely good antimicrobial properties against all
dangerous germs tested so far in the laboratory and they even kill pathogens
better than relevant antibiotics.
We know by now after almost 10 years
of research that they together produce a myriad of more than hundreds of
compounds that together are stronger and will challenge future resistance
development.
We will not be able to solve all
problems with antibiotic resistance. But we will be able to decrease this
development if we minimize the global use of antibiotics. For this reason we
have localized key areas into which we can make a difference and these are the
following:
-
Wound management
for humans and animals
-
Mud fever in horses
-
Bovine mastitis
-
Throat infections
and colds
-
Diarrhea caused by

gut infections

- Prevention of American foulbrood in beekeeping

How does this work?
Wild fresh honey has been used as
folk medicine for thousands of years and now we know for the first time in the
history of science why. Wild fresh honey, chased by honey hunters, contains
namely natural millions of beneficial lactic acid bacteria that are very potent
in killing microbes. In ordinary honey or honey-derived products, you find in
stores or from beekeepers, there are no lactic acid bacteria.
We have therefore developed a
technique to multiply these bacteria outside the bees. We multiply the 13
bacteria to high amounts in order to activate and prepare them for delivery.
Our delivery carrier is based on
honey and bee-pollen. These carriers were chosen to mimic their natural
environment, to give the bacteria food during their transportation and to make
them ready for fight.
We would like to deliver tiny
warriors (the lactic acid bacteria) ready to fight against unwanted microbes.
The warriors will need to be carried by something and this is going to be designed
to suit the different environments.
One of the easiest ways to carry our
tiny warriors is using a food vehicle. Therefore we’ll introduce these
bacterial warriors and deliver them by food and beverages containing honey and
bee-pollen. We have been investigating the food vehicles the latest 10 years
and have very good alternatives for that. All vehicles will comprise the tiny
warriors in high numbers prepared in carriers that will be carefully developed

to suit the different environments and to mimic nature.


At present
Our recent research in the field
shows that the lactic acid bacteria can be used in the fight against dangerous
bacteria and a case study showed that the lactic acid bacteria in a combination
of honey is more effective than antibiotics.
These novel findings could
revolutionize both the academic world and the pharmaceutical industry. The
discovery and research results have led to attention in media worldwide.
Despite this, the journey has not been without obstacles and still it is
extremely difficult to obtain funding to develop the basic idea
antibiotics and spread this worldwide to the people that need it most.
Why will we start to develop a medical alternative for treating wounds?
Whereas honey has a number of uses,
it is very well known in folk medicine for its beneficial actions within the
wound environment. However, our research has shown that the main reason for its
historical use in wounds as a folk medicine is not the “honey” itself but the
presence of the living beneficial bacteria that we discovered.
We would like to start with the
management of wounds as this has a great impact on public health and economy.
It has been estimated that 4 million people in Europe suffer from wounds, which
exceeds the number of patients with cancer and cerebro-vascular disease.
Chronic wounds often remain unhealed for years, and sometimes decades in a
person.
One of the major complications to
the healing of a wound is the substantial presence of unwanted bacteria and
infections. These wound infections are estimated to cost a normal European
hospital €20 million annually. There are also very often reports about overuse
of antibiotics in wound management. Thus, this is of global concern as we are
facing an emerging risk of antibiotic resistance.
Intentions with the crowdfunding
The aim of this crowdfunding project
is to collect financial means of preparing a natural alternative to antibiotics
based on the research on lactic acid bacteria and their applications for
animals and humans, while creating the conditions for social entrepreneurship
i.e. opportunities to spread the actual products to non-profit organizations.
To reach this purpose we need:
·
To create a natural
solution for antibiotics and thus help people who need a simple and sustainable
alternative. We know that the 13 lactic acid bacteria kill all germs that they
are exposed to. But to gain acceptance, we first and foremost need human
studies to back up our findings.
·
To distribute
knowledge and raise awareness of this folk medicine throughout the world. We
want to back everything up with the historical background by anthropological PhD
studies of indigenous people and cultures that use honey medically in order to
reach the ""best practice"".
·
To go against the
conventional pharmaceutical industry. We want to give back to the people and do
not want to base the discovery as profit-driven but rather to become a social
enterprise/assistance company. Over time, we want to start a fund for
developing countries.
Budget
The running costs for reaching the
first goal of the project is <span>365,000 USD to fund
the two first years and to be able to share products with non-profit
organizations. But the project needs to be funded for a longer time in order to
continuously fight global antibiotic resistance.
The contributions and perks will
cover more research and development, materials, travel expenses,
anthropological studies, production of pilot products and perks, a constant
communication with the funders during the project time and production for
non-profit organizations.
Project owners
The researchers and entrepreneurs
involved are Alejandra Vasquez and Tobias Olofsson, responsible for the
research and development of pilot products. Richard Edbertsson will be in
charge of the anthropology studies and communication of the project.
The project's unique mission
The idea is to develop natural
alternatives to antibiotics, easily available medical products based on the
unique discovery and research by PhD Alejandra Vásquez and PhD Tobias Olofsson
that wild fresh honey contains the largest concentration of collaborating beneficial
bacteria. And to give back this knowledge to the people that need the once well-known
ancient folk medicine.
We are at the crossroads between
tradition and innovation. Our products will be created in the encounter between
nature and research.
We sit on a broad knowledge base
that extends between all areas related to the new discovered honeybee lactic
acid bacteria. As researchers with empirical data that supports our statements,
we never guess, but always give an informed answer based on facts.
Innovators and entrepreneurs – In 2007, Tobias and Alejandra started together with the
university a spin-off company ​​with a view to commercialize the applications
of their discovery and translate it into actual products in the areas of
functional foods, veterinary and human medicine. They retained the majority of
the shares in order to be able to fulfill their visions combining research with
entrepreneurship. In 2010 they launched their first product H13 with help of
non-profit organizations in Sweden. H13 is ""Wild fresh honey on the go”. It
mimics wild fresh honey and H stands for honey and 13 stands for the 13 living
Lactic Acid Bacteria.
Valparaiso, Chile. She came to Sweden with her parents
column5: > age of 13 in the middle of

column1: the 80s
column3: >fter a challenging trip she reached her dream to

column1: become a researcher at Lund University, Sweden. She is a Medical Microbiologist
with a PhD in engineering that works with basic and applied microbiological
research and with innovation in mind.
PhD, Tobias Olofsson – born in Höganäs,
Sweden. He grew up in a nature-interested family. His beekeeping grandfather
(Tage Kimblad) introduced him to the world of honeybees and honey. He is a
molecular biologist with a PhD in engineering that works by developing research
ideas and innovation in mind together with Alejandra.
Ethnographer, Rikard Edbertsson – He came in contact with Alejandra
and Tobias a couple of years ago and is a part of their research group as well
as their spin-off company. He holds a M.A. in History and a B.Sc. in Social Anthropology
and is especially interested in the medicinal uses of honey and honey-based
products throughout history. By using ethnographic methods, his aim is to become
a PhD student and examine how indigenous people have traded down knowledge about
the medicinal use of honey as oral history.
Alejandra,
Tobias and Rikard, form the core of Living Antibiotics, and their jointly
competence spans from research to entrepreneurship, from microbiology to the

humanities and from ideas to applications.

Other Ways You Can
Help
If you just can't contribute, please get the word out and make some

noise about our campaign by using the Indiegogo share tools!

HONEY HUNTERS ELIXIR

Have you heard about HONEY HUNTERS ELIXIR? You can pre-order the first edition of HONEY HUNTER´S ELIXIR by selecting the ELIXIR option among the ""perks"" on the right side of this page!

Our delivery carrier is based on
honey and bee-pollen. These carriers were chosen to mimic their natural
environment, to give the bacteria food during their transportation and to make
them ready for fight.
We would like to deliver tiny
warriors (the lactic acid bacteria) ready to fight against unwanted microbes.
The warriors will need to be carried by something and this is going to be designed
to suit the different environments.
One of the easiest ways to carry our
tiny warriors is using a food vehicle. Therefore we’ll introduce these
bacterial warriors and deliver them by food and beverages containing honey and
bee-pollen. We have been investigating the food vehicles the latest 10 years
and have very good alternatives for that. All vehicles will comprise the tiny
warriors in high numbers prepared in carriers that will be carefully developed
to suit the different environments and to mimic nature. At present
Our recent research in the field
shows that the lactic acid bacteria can be used in the fight against dangerous
bacteria and a case study showed that the lactic acid bacteria in a combination
of honey is more effective than antibiotics.
These novel findings could
revolutionize both the academic world and the pharmaceutical industry. The
discovery and research results have led to attention in media worldwide.
Despite this, the journey has not been without obstacles and still it is
extremely difficult to obtain funding to develop the basic idea
column2: to develop a natural alternative to

column1: antibiotics and spread this worldwide to the people that need it most.
Why will we start to develop a medical alternative for treating wounds?
Whereas honey has a number of uses,
it is very well known in folk medicine for its beneficial actions within the
wound environment. However, our research has shown that the main reason for its
historical use in wounds as a folk medicine is not the “honey” itself but the
presence of the living beneficial bacteria that we discovered.
We would like to start with the
management of wounds as this has a great impact on public health and economy.
It has been estimated that 4 million people in Europe suffer from wounds, which
exceeds the number of patients with cancer and cerebro-vascular disease.
Chronic wounds often remain unhealed for years, and sometimes decades in a
person.
One of the major complications to
the healing of a wound is the substantial presence of unwanted bacteria and
infections. These wound infections are estimated to cost a normal European
hospital €20 million annually. There are also very often reports about overuse
of antibiotics in wound management. Thus, this is of global concern as we are
facing an emerging risk of antibiotic resistance.
Intentions with the crowdfunding
The aim of this crowdfunding project
is to collect financial means of preparing a natural alternative to antibiotics
based on the research on lactic acid bacteria and their applications for
animals and humans, while creating the conditions for social entrepreneurship
i.e. opportunities to spread the actual products to non-profit organizations.
To reach this purpose we need:
To create a natural
solution for antibiotics and thus help people who need a simple and sustainable
alternative. We know that the 13 lactic acid bacteria kill all germs that they
are exposed to. But to gain acceptance, we first and foremost need human
studies to back up our findings.
To distribute
knowledge and raise awareness of this folk medicine throughout the world. We
want to back everything up with the historical background by anthropological PhD
studies of indigenous people and cultures that use honey medically in order to
reach the ""best practice"".
To go against the
conventional pharmaceutical industry. We want to give back to the people and do
not want to base the discovery as profit-driven but rather to become a social
enterprise/assistance company. Over time, we want to start a fund for
developing countries.
Budget
The running costs for reaching the
first goal of the project is 365,000 USD to fund
the two first years and to be able to share products with non-profit
organizations. But the project needs to be funded for a longer time in order to
continuously fight global antibiotic resistance.
The contributions and perks will
cover more research and development, materials, travel expenses,
anthropological studies, production of pilot products and perks, a constant
communication with the funders during the project time and production for
non-profit organizations.
Project owners
The researchers and entrepreneurs
involved are Alejandra Vasquez and Tobias Olofsson, responsible for the
research and development of pilot products. Richard Edbertsson will be in
charge of the anthropology studies and communication of the project.
The project's unique mission
The idea is to develop natural
alternatives to antibiotics, easily available medical products based on the
unique discovery and research by PhD Alejandra Vásquez and PhD Tobias Olofsson
that wild fresh honey contains the largest concentration of collaborating beneficial
bacteria. And to give back this knowledge to the people that need the once well-known
ancient folk medicine.Who are we?
We are at the crossroads between
tradition and innovation. Our products will be created in the encounter between
nature and research.
We sit on a broad knowledge base
that extends between all areas related to the new discovered honeybee lactic
acid bacteria. As researchers with empirical data that supports our statements,
we never guess, but always give an informed answer based on facts.
Innovators and entrepreneurs – In 2007, Tobias and Alejandra started together with the
university a spin-off company ​​with a view to commercialize the applications
of their discovery and translate it into actual products in the areas of
functional foods, veterinary and human medicine. They retained the majority of
the shares in order to be able to fulfill their visions combining research with
entrepreneurship. In 2010 they launched their first product H13 with help of
non-profit organizations in Sweden. H13 is ""Wild fresh honey on the go”. It
mimics wild fresh honey and H stands for honey and 13 stands for the 13 living
Lactic Acid Bacteria.
PhD, Alejandra Vásquez – born in
Valparaiso, Chile. She came to Sweden with her parents as a foreigner at the age of 13 in the middle of
the 80s. After a challenging trip she reached her dream to
become a researcher at Lund University, Sweden. She is a Medical Microbiologist
with a PhD in engineering that works with basic and applied microbiological
research and with innovation in mind.
PhD, Tobias Olofsson – born in Höganäs,
Sweden. He grew up in a nature-interested family. His beekeeping grandfather
(Tage Kimblad) introduced him to the world of honeybees and honey. He is a
molecular biologist with a PhD in engineering that works by developing research
ideas and innovation in mind together with Alejandra.
Ethnographer, Rikard Edbertsson – He came in contact with Alejandra
and Tobias a couple of years ago and is a part of their research group as well
as their spin-off company. He holds a M.A. in History and a B.Sc. in Social Anthropology
and is especially interested in the medicinal uses of honey and honey-based
products throughout history. By using ethnographic methods, his aim is to become
a PhD student and examine how indigenous people have traded down knowledge about
the medicinal use of honey as oral history.
Alejandra,
Tobias and Rikard, form the core of Living Antibiotics, and their jointly
competence spans from research to entrepreneurship, from microbiology to the
humanities and from ideas to applications.Other Ways You Can
Help
If you just can't contribute, please get the word out and make some

noise about our campaign by using the Indiegogo share tools!HONEY HUNTERS ELIXIRHave you heard about HONEY HUNTERS ELIXIR? You can pre-order the first edition of HONEY HUNTER´S ELIXIR by selecting the ELIXIR option among the ""perks"" on the right side of this page!",10.0,1,"1 Campaign
|","Helsingborg, Sweden",https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/living-antibiotics/pica

This is a very serious mission with a silly name. We are developing/improving a cloud based diagnostic intelligence system where one can take a selfie of one's tongue, upload it and get a diagnosis of one's health condition accurately. At first, using the ancient Chinese system of classification, It will tell assess your overall health and recommend foods and exercises to improve it. Next we will add the traditional Indian assessment and many other capabilities to give you a fantastic health and wellness management tool. 

The tongue is an amazing organ and the ancient medical systems in China and India  divide the tongue into 7 regions representing various organs of the body. Next the color, cracks, and distribution and thickness of the layer of coating on our tongues tells them both about current condition of the organs as well as any developing early signs. The system, using complex pattern recognition algorithms, neural networks and Artificial intelligence integrated with thousands of years of knowledge in the Chinese and Indian medical systems', will provide a quick diagnosis of ones health. While not a substitute for a lab tests, this capability can be very useful as a feedback and preventive tool for most of us.
column2: >During this building and improving stage, when you send us the picture of our tongue, we will run it thru the system and see the results it produces. Then we will have a human Health practitioner
column3: > who is a trained specialist also look at it who will either confirm or correct the diagnosis and will send the diagnosis to you within 7 days. This will help us get you the best results today and help us teach and validate the system.
column4: >When the system is ready, we will give you an app for free and you will be able to assess your condition easily and immediately everyday
column7:
> for Labs or your doctor but a handy, convenient way to take primary responsibility for your own wellness.

This will be great tool for most of us and will help us keep track of our wellness. But most critical use of this technology will be amongst very poor populations, Refugee camps and War zones where the health care providers struggle to keep up with needs. Such a quick, cheap and easy app based tool will help them prioritize care to the most at risk. 

We are partnering with Universities, Mathematics Institutes and Hospitals in few countries in a collaborative fashion to make this system understand many many disease systems, translate Traditional analysis for modern health care providers and have high confidence medical validity. 

And your tongue and your $10 make this possible. Once you pledge your $ 10, we will tell you how to take the picture and where to send it…and send you the diagnostic of what your tongue is telling you about your health, both by what the system and what a human expert says.The more tongues the system does, the better it gets at diagnosis. We need millions of tongues…so Showme Tongue and please tell your friends on your Facebook page about the super smart, sensible and helpful thing you did. Help spread the word. This will be for yours and millions of peoples wellness.

And all for $ 10. Really!  And for $ 30 or $ 100 you get other fantastic services at highly discounted prices. Try them!!!

column5: >FINE CHOCOLATE THAT INDULGES YOUR SENSES, TREATS YOUR BODY &amp
column6:
SOOTHES YOUR SOUL

The Chocolate Therapy Story...

It all started 4 years ago. As chocolate lovers, health enthusiasts and foodies, my husband David and I, were continually frustrated by bad chocolate so we set out to create a new kind of chocolate eating experience. Using our vast experience in retail  (mine with Starbucks for over 17 years) and manufacturing (David has over 30 years executive management experience in the automotive industry) combined  with hundreds of hours of research and education later, Chocolate Therapy was born at our kitchen table. 

With a long list of antioxidant-rich, therapeutic ingredients (Green Tea, Cinnamon, Olive Oil, etc.)  that enhance the inherent health benefits of chocolate, using our entrepreneurial spirit and 50 years of combined experience we have created an innovative line of sweet ""remedies"" that includes everything from truffles to molded chocolates and meltaways. We use some of the finest chocolate available combined with other high-quality ingredients to improve the chocolate-eating experience and help people get a good dose of healthy antioxidants. Help us reinvent how people nationwide think about chocolate by supporting the national expansion of Chocolate Therapy and get your chocolate fix in the process! 

Chocolate Therapy Today...

Today we have 2 retail stores in the Boston area featuring our handmade collection of over 50 confections, which showcase an array of antioxidant-rich flavor combinations, such as coconut oil and sesame seeds and even beets, mandarin orange and black pepper, but we want to go from being a local shop to a household name. Over the last 4
column10: > years, our business has grown tremendously. We’ve been fortunate to

column1: receive several awards (New England Dessert Showcase Best Chocolatier/Confectionary and Taste of MetroWest Best Dessert), major press (Tasting Table, Boston Globe, etc.) have built a celebrity following and
created collections for
retailers.
column9: >We are passionate about giving back to our community and have taught thousands of Girl Scouts the art of chocolate-making and many at-risk youth valuable business skills. In addition, many couples and individuals have fallen in love with our signature wine and chocolate experiences.
column14:
>How You Can Help...

In order to meet growing demand, we need more equipment, space and supplies. Most people don't know that high-quality chocolate is very expensive and that there are many costs that go into making the perfect chocolate and running a small business. With your help, we can blow our $50,000 goal out of the water and completely change the way people think about and eat chocolate!

I ate the seeds from a scotch bonnet pepper at work one day...

Welcome to my funds raiser! I have been a chef as long as I can remember, and a chile head even longer. Somewhere along my bounce from kitchen to kitchen, here and there, I began making hot sauce. First for friends, then co-workers and then for the customers I see everyday. Next, people started to ask me where they could buy my sauces...Well, here we are.

<div>I really want to share my love for great food and even better hot sauce with everybody (whether they like it or not! Ha!). It's pretty much that simple. I sure would like to have you guys along for the ride! So, with much love and respect to everyone who has helped and believed in me so fa<span style=""background-color: initial

column2: >This is a grand, new adventure, and I'm not certain how it will pan out. But I am certain that with your support we can bring a great product to shelves and tables all over and be sucessful at it. Just as it has been an exciting step for me to make the decision to get this sauce to the people, you deciding to join in will be huge as well! thank you!

column1: The Lowdown:
We are looking to bring in around $2500 USD. We've got a few big things on our wishlist that will really help get this venture going.

Truth be told, as a food business, we have some licensing and insurance costs to negotiate. Canning license, Process authority, Liability, Labeling. Fun stuff! And not with out a price...Your support can help set us on course, and get new flavors to the People!

Another important addition to our aresenal would be a high-volume commercial blender. This could really amp up our output and speed it up to boot! We are looking into getting a vitamix, which is about as good as it gets, but it'll set us back. That's why your help could get us over the hump. Whether we reach our goal or not, your support will surely get some of the paperwork and hoops tied up. Let's see what happens, yeah?!

Our Impact Together...

Our mindset here at Ol'Dirty Sheets is to make not only simple and beautifully crafted sauces(and other spicy culinary concoctions, one day soon we hope!), but to have a positive impact on our world, our culture and our environment. Our sincerest hope is that we can all come together in this, both personally and finacially, and that is a big consideration in this campaign. We crazy folk here at Ol'Dirty Sheets' think that our world is our responsibility as a people, each and every, no one can go it alone!

Although there are risks with any new venture, We've got some solid footing and expertise to build on. We've spent the better part of the last 5 years developing recipes and doing market research for our expanding line of delicious sauces, and more than 25 years of Culinary experience to hold this ship together. We are really looking forward to bringing the heat, and it's so close that our tounges are already stinging!
We would love any help that you can give us, if that's a few spare dollars or helping to spread the word about our saucy visions! Thank you all so much, we look forward to making this

/>I'm Charles Hunter.  Here's my story:  On my way back

column1: from work, one car ran in the back of me, and then seconds later another car
hit the car in the back causing a double car impact. I was a little
banged up which caused me to go to therapy at least three times a week. My wife
just had our second daughter, I wanted to be at home with her, but I had to do my
therapy sessions. They would bring out a muscle simulator, heating pads, and
cooling packs, and my therapist would hand massage the area that needed it.
Each one of these components had helped a great deal and not one time, I had to
get a prescription. I was very sore and swollen and in lots of pain with my
neck, my back, shoulders and experiencing migraine headache, and sore muscles. Over a
course of three months, I was back to normal. All those different components used to
help my muscles, joints, soreness and pain to alleviate. These are the very
same components that they used on me in my physical therapy sessions (I did not
receive any type of side effect after each session). I began to feel better and
better each session. Also, taking notice of my peers having the same type of
complaints as me.  Surely, it’s nothing fun being involved in a car accident nor any other ailment. I speak with people on day to day
bases, and its nothing fun hearing about other people’s similar conditions. HELP IS FINALLY HERE!!!

column2: >Working along side with the Physical Therapist, Doctors, Chiropractors, Athletes, and Military etc., together we can give the same

column1: level of relief to the user. <b>Because countless number of people deal with sore muscles, tenderness, stress, aches, pain, cramps, headaches, fever, chills, arthritis, and many other ailments from time to time no matter what the cause may be. What makes this product so unique
column2: IT IS PORTABLE! The battery powered device will have a long lasting battery use (estimated time) of 6-8 hours. Portable therapy anytime and anywhere. Its unique design comes with a LED remote control labeled panel for easy therapy access use.  I came up with this product called The Miracle Vest Unit by

column1: combining all these elements used in each therapy session, now these components will be ALL-IN-ONE!

column2: >Numerous doctors and physical therapist have expressed the need for this product. They see how it can help their clients in numerous ways.  Also, fitness trainers have also requested to have their clientele to be partakers of the working prototype process. C.A. Hunter Enterprises is very excited to bring this product to market in 2015.   We received our Design Patent in May 2014.   Our prototype is almost ready.  With your help and support we can do it!

We are looking for 2000 sponsors to help us with via ""MVU ThinkTank"".  The Think Tank will be a group of supports that provide input for future products and be listed as sponsors of C.A. Hunter Enterprises ventures.

>We are Team CrampsAWAY!

All of us here at CrampsAWAY are very active and many of us are ex-college athletes. We all still participate in endurance and team sports like: basketball, football, soccer, tennis, triathlons, marathons, volleyball, running, swimming, golf, water polo, weightlifting, and more!

Like you, we have all experienced painful muscle cramps during and after exercise and competition.

Like you, we have tried everything to relieve cramps including heat, stretching, massage, painkillers, muscle relaxers, etc

We set out on a mission to fix all that...we wanted to bring cramp relief to everyone!

Through research and testing, our scientists debunked traditional thinking about cramps. We discovered the real causes of cramping and developed a patent-pending formula that resets the neuromuscular connections, stopping your cramps and preventing them from returning.

Our solution is made of all natural, food safe ingredients. NSF International has confirmed that CrampsAWAY is Free from banned substances! This gives athletes everywhere peace of mind to confidently use it.

Frequently Asked Questions
Q: Is CrampsAWAY safe?
A: Yes, it is completely safe. It is made of all-natural, food-grade ingredients. The CrampsAWAY formulation contains ingredients that you would typically find in many other household food items.
Q: When do I use CrampsAWAY? Can it only be used when I am cramping?

A: You can use CrampsAWAY prior to any physical activity to help prevent cramping from happening in the first place. If you find yourself beginning to experience a muscle cramp, take CrampsAWAY immediately to relieve the cramp in less than a minute! Simply swish it in your mouth for 60 seconds and then swallow! It's that simple!
Q: What kind of muscle cramps does CrampsAWAY get rid of?
A: All kinds! Foot cramps, hand cramps, leg cramps, calf cramps, back cramps, and more! CrampsAWAY will get rid of muscle cramps in 60 seconds or less!
Q: I'm a competitive college or professional athlete. Is CrampsAWAY certified for athletes?
A: CrampsAWAY has been tested and approved by NSF International as being free from all banned substances. Athletes can use CrampsAWAY with confidence at any level of competition.
Q: If one dose is effective, is it even more effective to take more than one dose?

A: CrampsAWAY is most effective if taken prior to physical activity or sleep, and during the onset of a muscle cramp. If you take a single dose, you should not experience cramping for at least two hours. It is not necessary to take more than a single dose at a time since there is no evidence of additional effectiveness. If your cramping doesn't subside, it may be due to more serious illness or injury and we recommend speaking with your personal physician.

Why CrampsAWAY?

World, meet Crampy™! Crampy is the pesky little guy that bites into your muscle just as it begins to cramp! Meeting Crampy can be really scary! Removing Crampy is the top priority for Team CrampsAWAY!FIGHT THE BITE!™
We want everyone to perform at peak levels without cramps affecting the outcome of your games, scores, and races.
We know how important it is to do your best when you exercise and compete.
We know what it's like to train hard and aim for a personal best or improve your strength and endurance.
We know how frustrating it can be to fall short of your goals due to muscle cramps.
Our mission: Bring pain relief to everyone suffering from muscle cramps!
Your contribution to our campaign will give you access to the start of something truly special.
We have chosen crowdfunding because we want to control our own manufacturing here in the USA, rather than outsourcing production overseas.
We feel that ensuring the high-quality of CrampsAWAY is too important to put in the hands of a manufacturer who has never been in your shoes...or cleats.
We care deeply about the performance, taste, and effectiveness of CrampsAWAY and we think you'll find that passion in each and every serving.
We know we can't do this without YOU!Be among the first to experience true muscle cramp relief and forever banish Crampy from your life!
What We Need & What You GetWe need you to share your excitement about using CrampsAWAY!
Tell your family.
Tell your friends.
Tell your neighbors.
Tell your social networks.
We want to tell the WORLD that muscle cramps were an unsolvable problem... until NOW!
We are raising money to allow us to manufacture our new formula at scale.

CrampsAWAY is all-natural and has no banned substances. However, we need funding to go through the process of becoming officially ""Certified for Sport"" by NSF International. This key certification will make it easier to bring CrampsAWAY to all of your favorite professional athletes and sports teams.
We need to finalize and perfect our packaging so we can get this amazing formula into everyone's hands
Demand for CrampsAWAY will be HUGE and we need to set up distribution partners to be able to reach all of the key retail, internet, and sports markets
We need to finalize our website and web store to make CrampsAWAY accessible to all in need of cramp relief
All funds will go toward getting CrampsAWAY out the door and into your hands
We are so excited about you trying out CrampsAWAY that we can't get this going fast enough!
Our Perks
We have tons of awesome things to give you...along with some very unique and exciting perks!
Get some CrampsAWAY: They will be sold in packs of 3 or 9. Buy them early for a steep discount!

Support your favorite teams or Individual athletes: You can give your favorite high school, college, and professional teams and athletes an edge over their competition! Don’t let your favorite teams or athletes fall short due to muscle cramps… tell us who needs CrampsAWAY™ and we will use our athlete contacts to get it to them!
Support your favorite Military unit: Choose a contribution level and we'll send CrampsAWAY to the men and women who fight for us all over the world!
Be Famous: Various levels of support will get you onto our corporate website as an early supporter. You can even get your picture on our website Hall of Fame! At minimum, you'll be famous to us...

Dinner from DOOOOWNTOWN: Spend an evening with our team at a private dinner party...no cramps allowed! We'll wine & dine you and tell you all of our crazy stories of how this all came about! This package will be very limited and exclusive, but worth it! As part of the perk, we'll fly you into San Francisco and put you up for the night!

We Like, We Like to PARTY: Join our official Launch Party and leave your cramps behind. We'll fly you into an undisclosed location where we'll throw one heck of a shindig, celebrating the official send-off of our first products. The location will be a major sporting event where we'll partake in all of the wild fun surrounding that event! We'll be sure to put you up in a beautiful hotel where you can sleep off all of the partying we did the night before! We will likely even have a celebrity guest or two...Trust us, this will be ONE OF A KIND!
Hurdles to Overcome

As in any new business, there are always hurdles to overcome. Just like any ahtlete, we have done the work to reduce our business risk as much as possible. We fully understand that there are always obstacles to overcome when you make it to the big time...or the big game. We just want to ensure that cramps aren't one of them!
Here is a short list of the items we see as potential risks and challenges, and how we plan to overcome them:

Manufacturing and Distribution: We have settled on a short list of USA-based suppliers and are working hard to finalize packaging and design. We have highly skilled designers and marketers on our team that are focusing on getting us ready to launch. The initial orders from this campaign will give us the necessary funding to ensure our first production run meets volume requirements. In addition, it will give us the flexibility to partner with the right USA-based suppliers that align with our vision of continuous high quality and obtaining the NSF International’s “Certified for Sport” and Natural Products Association’s “Good Manufacturing Practices” certifications.

Retail and web store setup: We have excellent contacts that are primed and ready to go place CrampsAWAY in some of the largest U.S. retail stores. We need to show strong growth in order to get prime placement on the shelves of these retailers. The campaign will help us show that there is tremendous need and market interest for a true cramps killer. In addition, our marketing and design teams will set-up our web stores on key sites like Amazon.com and our own CrampsAWAY.com.

Short Summary

MAIZANAS goal is to transform Mexican cuisine from commercial fast food to a real authentic experience we want to connect you to the true Mexican roots.

We currently produce tortillas out of organic corn from Mexican fields. Our tortillas are preservative and additives free. Our production process keeps the corn flavor 100% natural and we do not add flour, salt, or anything else but corn. A real experience!

We currently sell organic tortillas made from blue, red and white corn to organic stores in Mexico but our objective is to take Maizanas to the United States and to expand to other products such  tortilla chips, salsas and moles.

What We Need
<div>
<span style=""letter-spacing: 0px
column2: >$20,000 will help us build the distribution infrastructure we need (buy tortilla factory equipment in Monterrey, a city close to the US border, buy freezers, adequate packaging, and supplies needed to send our product to US supermarkets).

column1: We need your help to raise this funds and make OUR DREAM come true. We want the world to experience the real, authentic Mexican cuisine and have a positive impact on Mexican corn farmers.

Where we stand

Currently we have a huge demand from the Mexican market. We sell to over 15 stores in Mexico and we have received awesome feedback about Maizanas and its authentic flavor.

Currently we outsource the tortilla factory but our goal is to establish our own factory in Monterrey. Monterrey is a strategic location because it is close to the United States which will help us export Maizanas.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are excited about delicious food and feel like this is a cool project please help us spread the word!
Thank you!

","Feet, Meet Soniped
Upgrade Your Regimen with Sonic Power!

Look, we know you and your pumice have had some great times. We just want to help you take it to the next level. Take the hands and hassle out of your beauty regimen and put the power of sonic oscillation to work for you!
Real Results!
We’ve gone from flaming torches to electricity…
From chiseling tablets to checking Emails...
So why are we still fooling with hand held pumice stones?Let Soniped rejuvenate that stone age pedicure routine!
The first ever hands-free, sonic-powered at-home pedicure device.

No hassle, no mess and no awkward maneuvering in the shower! Soniped is truly a first in its class, offering hands-free pampering for unmatched convenience and comfort that softens all parts of your feet including heels, sides and big toes.
We're so sure you'll love your Soniped, we even offera 30-Day Money Back Softness Guarantee!DON'T DELAY!!
Lotions: Smūth and Sūth
For best results (and an extra dollop of sweet-scented smoothness!) use your Soniped in conjunction with one of two pedicure boosting lotions: Smūth and Sūth.
Sonic Wave Technology

Harnessing the power of oscillating sonic wave technology at more than 300 movements per second, Soniped attaches to any bathtub or shower floor to scrupulously slough away dry and rough skin, safely and without the mess of needless cords, cables or attachments.

Treat your feet AND your friends with the gift of Soniped. You'll love its hands free design and sonic powered softness, how it whips your feet into soft, sandal-ready perfection in minutes, and they'll love having such a thoughtful friend.  Everyone wins!

Who are we?

After the last war on Gaza strip, the need for home nursing services has been increased for many clients whom suffering from chronic diseases, injuries and fractures and their only choice is to look for care in the hospital.

Due to the shortage of long term care that is provided and taking on consideration that care at home provides privacy to clients as in a familiar environment to them.

So, we decided to establish our center on that base, our services include
column2:
regular visits to give injections, care for injuries and decreasing discomfort, provided by 24 hours shifts, whether you need us once a week , two daily hour or all day long we will be at your service. Our goal is to be the best in care giving and home nursing.

What is home nursing?

Home nursing is a group of support and care services provided by professional care givers for elder clients, physically or mentally disable at their homes.

This includes:-

1. Elder clients need care and support through their daily life.

2. Clients who need special care after surgical procedures or rehabilitation including physiotherapy.

3. Clients who need special care and rehabilitation including physiotherapy.

4. Clients who need special care at home as IV medications and injections

5. Physically weak clients who need clinical care.

6. Clients with chronic diseases.

7.  bedridden patients

8. comprehensive nursing care and rehabilitation throughout the hour.

Our mission:-

We seek to predict a leading position in personal care and services sector through providing care by health care professional that are highly qualified at nursing and home care, a team of various specialties provides care around the clock, we also seek to devote our efforts to ensure customer satisfaction through adopting common vision enables to meet the needs of our society to the fullest.

The center includes many specialists:-

•Doctors 

•Nurses

•Physiotherapist

•Psychologist 

•Laboratory physician 

•Pharmacists
We take pride in providing services to a wide range of nursing and care in the privacy of your home, and include these services.

Short Summary
Hello,
We're Brad Keller and Daniel O'Neill, co-directors of the 2016 Freestyle (Frisbee) Players Association World Championships.
In August of 2016,  120 top athletes from 15 nations will arrive in New York City to compete in the premier freestyle disc event of the year.
Your contribution will help make this event a total success, and give these international competitors and spectators an experience they'll never forget.
What We Need &

Running a tournament of this scale and importance comes with a lot of expenses. While our campaign goal of $15,000 will only cover a part of the cost, achieving it will be instrumental toward our success. Your contributions will help to pay for:
Outdoor/Indoor site fees
As a token of our appreciation for your support, we have a few gifts to offer for varying levels of donation. (Any of our perk items can be held for pick-up at the event!)
The Impact
column4: '>How often do you get to participate in the development of a fast-growing sport?

column1: Recognized
column2: > this year by the International Olympic Committee
column3: >, disc sports are now played competitively

column1: With the Freestyle World Championships coming to New York City, we have the perfect venue to take advantage of the current momentum of disc sports popularity, and grow the sport of Freestyle worldwide.

Challenges

Producing any public event in New York City is a challenge. The bureaucracy of scheduling, financing, and running an event of this magnitude is daunting.

But our experienced team has successfully organized and produced over a dozen disc events in New York City, including The Big Apple Jam, Disc Over New York, Drastic Plastic (1996 FPAW), the Eastern National Championships, and others.
Under the auspices of the Freestyle Players Association, we have the technical assistance and support to produce this world class event.
- SPREAD THE WORD! Tell your friends and family, and start making your plans to attend our event (August 3-6, 2016)
- Post or Share our Indiegogo link on your own social media page(s)
-If you or someone you know has a business or restaurant, consider a partnership with us! Email frisbeenyc@gmail.com
-Volunteer your time for the production, set-up, and breakdown of the event
- Like our Facebook Page, Twitter, and visit our website: frisbeenyc.com
- Host a competitor in your home during the tournament
","Short Summary
Hello,
We're Brad Keller and Daniel O'Neill, co-directors of the 2016 Freestyle (Frisbee) Players Association World Championships.
In August of 2016,  120 top athletes from 15 nations will arrive in New York City to compete in the premier freestyle disc event of the year.
Your contribution will help make this event a total success, and give these international competitors and spectators an experience they'll never forget.
What We Need & What You Get

Running a tournament of this scale and importance comes with a lot of expenses. While our campaign goal of $15,000 will only cover a part of the cost, achieving it will be instrumental toward our success. Your contributions will help to pay for:
Outdoor/Indoor site feesInsuranceFood & BeverageTransportationT-shirts & DiscsTrophies & AwardsPromotions & MarketingYouth Outreach & Programming
As a token of our appreciation for your support, we have a few gifts to offer for varying levels of donation. (Any of our perk items can be held for pick-up at the event!)
The Impact How often do you get to participate in the development of a fast-growing sport?
Well... THIS is your chance!
Recognized this year by the International Olympic Committee, disc sports are now played competitively in over 60 countries.

With the Freestyle World Championships coming to New York City, we have the perfect venue to take advantage of the current momentum of disc sports popularity, and grow the sport of Freestyle worldwide.
Challenges Producing any public event in New York City is a challenge. The bureaucracy of scheduling, financing, and running an event of this magnitude is daunting.

But our experienced team has successfully organized and produced over a dozen disc events in New York City, including The Big Apple Jam, Disc Over New York, Drastic Plastic (1996 FPAW), the Eastern National Championships, and others.
Under the auspices of the Freestyle Players Association, we have the technical assistance and support to produce this world class event.
Other Ways You Can Help
- SPREAD THE WORD! Tell your friends and family, and start making your plans to attend our event (August 3-6, 2016)
- Post or Share our Indiegogo link on your own social media page(s)
-If you or someone you know has a business or restaurant, consider a partnership with us! Email frisbeenyc@gmail.com
-Volunteer your time for the production, set-up, and breakdown of the event
- Like our Facebook Page, Twitter, and visit our website: frisbeenyc.com
- Host a competitor in your home during the tournament",0.0,0,"1 Campaign

","Tantus, Inc. is a small company with a big commitment to sexual health. For nearly 20 years, Tantus has manufactured the safest, most pleasurable silicone toys possible for a diverse set of needs and body types. Like all of our sexual health products, we believe vibrators should be accessible, user-friendly, and should work
for any body. But we couldn’t find a tech savvy vibrator that met our
standards.
That's why we've made Rumble, a vibrator to please every body.
WHY A VIBRATOR?
Every able bodied person at some point in their lives – if they
live long enough – is going to become less able bodied. But being less able
bodied does not diminish your sexual needs, wants, or desires. And the fact is,
vibrators can be great tools to help you enjoy a better quality of life.
VIBRATORS UNTIL NOW
For the last four years, Tantus has brainstormed how to make the
best vibrator. We’ve worked out hygienic cleaning, ergonomic hand holds,
lightweight feel with heavyweight vibration, but then we recognized more needs.
As an industry, sex toy manufacturers have dictated whose body
parts and which body zones deserve to be vibrated. We need to stop
restricting our reach to specific sexes, genders, and abilities, and start
acknowledging the diversity of bodies and sexual desires.
Vibrators, just like all personal electronics, are gender
neutral.
Vibration can bring pleasure to any body.
Vibrators should be safe and effective for every body.
Features & Benefits

ounces, so anyone can hold it.

ergonomic. The
indent on the Rumble’s back holds your hand securely, making it comfortable for

rumbly motor which gives it the deep, powerful vibration that
is so effective in a personal vibrator.
Rumble has a quiet
motor because privacy is important.
Rumble has smart design. The speed controls are
right where your thumb rests, while the on/off button is where you won’t

Rumble features 14
different speeds, so you can find the setting that’s best for you.
It’s cordless and rechargeable so
you can use Rumble anywhere.
Three removable silicone heads allow you to customize your Rumble experience.

body.

opinion, than any other person in our industry. She bootstrapped herself in
order to make it in the industry and brought a unique sense of health and quality
to adult toys.
-Michael Blacksmith, CEO
Tantus
Tantus is part of a new generation of companies dedicated to
research and development, top quality materials, attention to detail, and
consumer satisfaction.
-Tristan Taormino, Author,
Director, Radio Personality
There once was a time when the intelligent warnings by the
makers of Tantus about toxic off-gassing from cheap sex toys fell on deaf ears.
Not so any more.
-Midori, Author,
Artist, Sex Educator
Tantus sets the gold standard for silicone sex toys.  Their
innovative designs and their dedication to creating products that are not only
fun but safe, makes them stand out in a field with a lot of competition.
-Hardy Haberman, Author,
Sex Educator
I always steer people who ask me for sex toy recommendations
right to Tantus products. It’s obvious that a lot of thought about anatomy,
design and sexual response is put into each piece. But beyond that I feel good
knowing that Tantus is a responsible company using materials that won’t harm me
or the environment.
-Diana Cage, Author",9.0,0,"1 Campaign

Have you ever taken a 5-HOUR Energy (or similar) shot to help you feel more focused and/or energized?  We have too.  Some work
column2:
some are hype.  Most of them taste awful, and, all of them have one thing in common...you have to drink them.  There hasn't been much choice in the energy supplement category, until NOW.  EliteOps Energy Strips are portable, convenient, and effective.  You can carry them anywhere and you don't need to ingest liquid of any kind.  Join us in our energy ""revolution"" and help us change the face of the energy supplement category.

SHORT SUMMARY

column1: Innovation in the energy supplement category has been
relegated to increased caffeine levels or new flavor introductions.  There hasn’t been any real innovation,
until now.  EliteOps Energy
Strips take the “shot” out of energy shots.

EliteOps Energy Strips are edible, dissolvable strips that provide 100mg of caffeine and 100% of the recommended daily allowance of B-vitamins in a portable, efficient, and convenient manner.  Just peel open an individually wrapped strip, place it on (or under) your tongue and in seconds the strip dissolves giving you energy and focus for hours.

We started our “soft” launch in the South Florida area on June 1st, 2015.  Our goal was to secure between 100-200 retail locations so we could test our marketing and advertising efforts and gauge whether we could generate customer support for the product and brand.

As of August 31st, we are in over 300 locations and our marketing and advertising efforts are generating consumer support in terms of same store sales.  Thanks to some sampling and social media campaigns, we have had requests about the product from across the country.  We’ve landed distribution here in Florida.  We have a distributor partner in Alaska.  We have an opportunity with some regional chain retailers.  And, we secured a military distributor who is helping to bring our product onto Army and Air Force bases across the country...and we haven't even ""officially"" launched the product yet.

The National Convenience Store convention and trade show (NACS) is coming up in October, in Las Vegas.  That is when we plan to “officially” launch our product on a national basis.  We are asking you to help us make a BIG first impression by funding our “coming out” party.  Distributors and buyers from convenience stores across the nation will be in Las Vegas, attending NACS, and we want get our product and brand name in front of them.  Besides showcasing the product at the trade show, we want to invite some of the industry ""elite"" to a party.  With your help, we can network with and entertain buyers and distributors introducing them to our product and hopefully convincing them that they need to carry us in their locations.
WHAT WE NEED &

We are looking to raise $25,000 to help get ourselves and our product out to Las Vegas.   The money will also be used to invite and entertain select industry VIPs, convenience store buyers, channel distributors, some influential media personnel, and, a few of YOU who want to join us in one of Vegas’ premier nightclubs.

What will you get?  For starters, you’ll get our undying gratitude.  You will also get to be part of the very beginning of an energy supplement revolution.  Up until now, innovation in the energy supplement category has been “new” or “improved” flavors, or, products that have increased the levels of caffeine, either directly or by adding additional supplements like guarana.  EliteOps Energy Strips are edible, dissolvable strips that deliver 100mg of caffeine and a blend of B-Vitamins in an efficient, portable, easy-to-use manner, all without the need for liquid of any kind.

But, we’re not asking you to help us out of the goodness of your heart.  No.  We have some of our products and cool swag for you…we have perks available at every level…from a retail package of our product to caps to polo shirts to a limited edition messenger bag to aVIP party invite where you can join us in Las Vegas.
THE “WHY”

Why is this project important to us?  We are a self-funded company.  We developed, packaged, manufactured, and launched this product with our own funds.  We have some sales behind us, and a lot more sales in front of us, but we want to prove to retailers and distributors that the energy supplement consumer will not only understand this product, but, they will use the product and become brand advocates for us.  By helping to fund our project, you’ll also be helping us build our success story…and helping us spread the word about EliteOps Energy Strips.


THE ""HOW TO"" AND MY PERSONAL THANKS

If you just want to contribute monetarily to our campaign, type in your amount and click ""contribute now"".  If you want to claim a PERK, just click on the perk you want and it will take you to the ""shipping"" information page.  This may seem like superfluous information, but if you've seen our pitch video, you will have noticed my gray hairs...I'm a digital immigrant...most of the friends I'm hitting up to contribute are digital immigrants...we have a tendency to need instructions.  :)  

If you've gotten this far into my pitch, thank you.  If you're a digital native and you've gotten this far into my pitch, an even bigger thank you.  

EliteOps Energy Strips work, and, they have the potential to completely change the energy supplement category.  I hope you see the same vision I do, and, I hope you're able to help us launch this product successfully.  Contribute if you can.  Help us spread the word about the product and this campaign.  Check out our website for more information (www.eliteopsenergy.com) and follow us on Facebook (EliteOpsEnergy).  My sincere thanks - Ray.

The Mind Body Harmonizer is an electronic AC brain stimulation tool to help people relax, avoid stress and improve concentration.  Students at University have found it helped them concentrate and avoid distracting thoughts. It can also
column2: >be useful as a tool to assist with meditation. See Testimonials from past users below. Many users reported it was useful for coping with the stresses of life!  It offers 40hz stimulation which is rarely available for AC simulators!
>They are now available at http://harmonizer.ca

column1:
We would like to manufacture 1000 units or more. This funding will help us manufacture them.  Such devices have been around since the early 1900s. This is an upgrade that makes use of modern neuro-science.  The discoveries and waveforms are open sourced to help promote further research.

We are back in Production as of February 15 2016 due to Private Investment outside the Indiegogo Campaign.  However if you invest you can take advantage of a $50 reduction in price for for the first 25 units of investment in Indiegogo.
See http://harmonizer.ca/price for the full price sales page.
<em style=""background-color: initial

I funded the first 100 units with my own money. We have successfully produced 100 working units of the Mind Body Harmonizer in 2015.  They were done without using foreign manufacturing and were made on Vancouver Island in Canada.  They all sold, we have testimonials of their effectiveness and there were No Returns.  All the units worked as advertised.  We know how to manufacture!  All we need now is investment to produce 1000 units or more.  These also will be made in Canada.

Please visit the site http://harmonizer.ca where you will find all the technical details including open source brain stimulation waveforms and a completed instruction manual you can download. Its also designed to be easy to operate in the dark.  There are no critical displays so blind people can operate them too. Its been tested!
<div>
The Harmonizer is based on traditional AC Brain Stimulation tools for relaxing and reducing stress. AC stimulation has been found to be completely safe after over 100 years of use worldwide
column4: >(Not to be confused with DC stimulation which can be hazardous because it can polarize the brain, whereas AC stimulation has been proven to be harmless since 1902).

column1: <div>

AC Brain Stimulation was developed in 1902 in France and later refined in the 1980s by Bob Beck. In the 1990s, Bob, an electrical engineer designed and published documentation on a number of mild electronic stimulation devices used on the ear lobes for relaxation, concentration and stress relief.  We have improved upon Bob’s original design to make it gentler and more versatile and we used modern brain research to improve the design by selecting stimulation frequencies based on real science.

We worked with Bob Beck’s open source design and consulted modern neuro-science knowledge to come up with a more effective tool for Relaxation and Stress Relief, and we added a Meditation Assistance Frequency.  We manufacture the improved device under the name Mind Body Harmonizer.  We have open sourced the design in the spirit of Bob Beck’s work.
Our design uses the traditional frequencies of stimulation recommended by Bob Beck including 0.5 hz, 100hz and 14.3 hz.
Our modern neuroscience based Innovation:

We added 40 Hz based on the brain research funded by the Dalai Lama studying Buddhist Meditation and Brain Wave Frequencies. The research showed that experienced monks at the peak of meditation have dominant brain waves at 40 Hz.  Later we discovered that German research showed that gentle 40 Hz stimulation can trigger lucid dreaming.   As we learned more it seemed obvious that 40 Hz needed to be added to the standard set of relaxation device frequencies for many reasons …
http://www.peakachievement.com/articles/40_Hertz_History.htm
If you read the article there are many reasons to expect that 40 Hz may be more effective at deep relaxation as well as meditation.
40 Hz brain waves are present in healthy individuals under the age of 65.  They decrease as we age and when the brain does not function optimally.

Our innovation is called “Harmonic Resonance” because 40 Hz stimulation is used in an attempt to encourage a higher brainwave frequency by resonance. Our preference is to keep the machine an inexpensive consumer device with no medical claims.  This allows us to keep the price low and eliminates the product from the ""medical"" category, with its strict regulations.

In the Standard setting, the machine uses a natural brain frequency of 40 hertz which is the Gamma brainwave frequency of a healthy brain.  40 Hz brainwaves are associated with meditation.  The study below shows that German researchers were able to trigger lucid dreams using 40 Hz applied to the forehead.  Some purchasers are experimenting with this application.  The harmonizer is mainly meant for relaxation and stress reduction without drugs.  It can also be used to assist with learning meditation.  It may or may not induce lucid dreaming … open to amateur self experimenters.  We have no feedback yet on this application.  We encourage amateur self experimentation and collaboration.  There are no other Bob Beck type relaxation devices offering 40 hertz.

column5: >Please visit the site http://harmonizer.ca
column8: >where you will find all the technical details including open source brain stimulation waveforms.

column1: <div>

column2: >Please note this device is not recommended for people suffering from Guillain-Barre syndrome (GBS) or Multiple Sclerosis (MS).

>

* Kenneth Ian Faulkner Soutar is my legal name but in real life I go by Ian Soutar in my day to day life on Vancouver Island or Ian Faulkner on Facebook.
>Clare Menzies, a London Ontario user in 2015 ...

>I received my Harmonizer from my wonderful mum (Nutan) on one of my rest and retreat visits to her place. I have chronic pain, herniated disk, and have been diagnosed with PTSD and anxiety. For years I was on conventional medications for these “disorders” and they only made the symptoms seem exaggerated and I felt awful on them. So in the last 5 years I have been treating holistically instead. This addition of the harmonizer has cleared the brain fog. It has restored my thinking to a point where I feel focused and connected. I use the meditation or relax settings. Thank you so much for this device it is a major tool I use for managing …

>I want you to know that I am pleased with the Harmonizer. I’m coming to the end of my two-week period of using it twice a day. So far I’ve just been using the Standard 40 hertz frequency. I haven’t yet explored the other two. I would say that the greatest benefit so far has been not getting into a negative state that hangs on for hours or days. There must be more firing of the synapses and I now have help in dealing with stress, without all the complexity of trial and error as well as the side effects from medication.
I also feel that my stress level has gone down and there are times that the Harmoniser has promoted a state of relaxation that allows pleasant images to float through my mind and then a good night’s sleep. Conversely, when I use it in the morning, along with my coffee it helps me to wake up, Some time I’ll have to try the Harmoniser without the coffee!.
So far I don’t think it’s helped me with my memory, although there might be a small change. My short-term memory certainly has deteriorated. And also when I made the huge mistake of getting laser done on my throat for sleep apnea, my thyroid was almost non-functioning for a long time and my sleep apnea became so bad that my oxymetry reading went down to the 60’s. at night. Before that mutilation my oxygen level was always normal, despite the sleep apnea So you see, Ian, my poor brain has endured a lot. Anyway, I hope some of this will be helpful to you

column1: Alexa Hansen, Student from Victoria, user in 2015-16

I use the Mind Body Harmonizer primarily as a study tool. The standard frequency has been awesome for increasing my ability to concentrate. My mind clears of extraneous thoughts and allows me to concentrate on the task at hand. The effect is really quite shockingly good.
Definitely give it a try.

<div>
<div>

AC Brain Stimulation was developed in 1902 in France and later refined in the 1980s by Bob Beck. In the 1990s, Bob, an electrical engineer designed and published documentation on a number of mild electronic stimulation devices used on the ear lobes for relaxation, concentration and stress relief.  We have improved upon Bob’s original design to make it gentler and more versatile and we used modern brain research to improve the design by selecting stimulation frequencies based on real science.

Please visit the site http://harmonizer.ca where you will find all the technical details including open source brain stimulation waveforms.
Please note this device is not recommended for people suffering from Guillain-Barre syndrome (GBS) or Multiple Sclerosis (MS).

TESTIMONIALS
Clare Menzies, a London Ontario user in 2015 ...

I received my Harmonizer from my wonderful mum (Nutan) on one of my rest and retreat visits to her place. I have chronic pain, herniated disk, and have been diagnosed with PTSD and anxiety. For years I was on conventional medications for these “disorders” and they only made the symptoms seem exaggerated and I felt awful on them. So in the last 5 years I have been treating holistically instead. This addition of the harmonizer has cleared the brain fog. It has restored my thinking to a point where I feel focused and connected. I use the meditation or relax settings. Thank you so much for this device it is a major tool I use for managing …
Monica from Victoria BC user in 2015

I want you to know that I am pleased with the Harmonizer. I’m coming to the end of my two-week period of using it twice a day. So far I’ve just been using the Standard 40 hertz frequency. I haven’t yet explored the other two. I would say that the greatest benefit so far has been not getting into a negative state that hangs on for hours or days. There must be more firing of the synapses and I now have help in dealing with stress, without all the complexity of trial and error as well as the side effects from medication.I also feel that my stress level has gone down and there are times that the Harmoniser has promoted a state of relaxation that allows pleasant images to float through my mind and then a good night’s sleep. Conversely, when I use it in the morning, along with my coffee it helps me to wake up, Some time I’ll have to try the Harmoniser without the coffee!.So far I don’t think it’s helped me with my memory, although there might be a small change. My short-term memory certainly has deteriorated. And also when I made the huge mistake of getting laser done on my throat for sleep apnea, my thyroid was almost non-functioning for a long time and my sleep apnea became so bad that my oxymetry reading went down to the 60’s. at night. Before that mutilation my oxygen level was always normal, despite the sleep apnea So you see, Ian, my poor brain has endured a lot. Anyway, I hope some of this will be helpful to you
Cheers, Monica
Alexa Hansen, Student from Victoria, user in 2015-16

I use the Mind Body Harmonizer primarily as a study tool. The standard frequency has been awesome for increasing my ability to concentrate. My mind clears of extraneous thoughts and allows me to concentrate on the task at hand. The effect is really quite shockingly good.
Definitely give it a try.
